S04bsu022_u:6_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasminsamaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśabhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:6_2_0: āyuṣmatā cāśvajitā / āyuṣmatā ca bāṣpeṇa / āyuṣmatā ca mahānāmnā / āyuṣmatā ca bhadrikeṇa / āyuṣmatā ca yaśodevena / āyuṣmatā
S04bsu022_u:6_2_1: ca vimalena / āyuṣmatā ca subāhunā / āyuṣmatā ca pūrṇena / āyuṣmatā ca gavāṃpatinā / āyuṣmatā corubilvākāśyapena /
S04bsu022_u:6_3: āyuṣmatā ca nadīkāśyapena / āyuṣmatā ca gayākāśyapena / āyuṣmatā ca śāriputreṇa / āyuṣmatā ca mahāmaudgalyāyanena /
S04bsu022_u:6_4: āyuṣmatā ca mahākāśyapena / āyuṣmatā ca mahākātyāyanena /
S04bsu022_u:6_5: āyuṣmatā ca kaphilena / āyuṣmatā ca kauṇḍinyena / āyuṣmatā ca cunandena / āyuṣmatā ca pūrṇamaitrāyaṇīputreṇa /
S04bsu022_u:6_6: āyuṣmatā cāniruddhena / āyuṣmatā ca nandikena / āyuṣmatā ca kasphilena / āyuṣmatā ca subhūtinā / āyuṣmatā ca revatena / āyuṣmatā ca khadiravanikena /
S04bsu022_u:6_7_0: āyuṣmatā cāmogharājena / āyuṣmatā ca mahāpāraṇikena / āyuṣmatā ca bakkulena / āyuṣmatā ca nandena / āyuṣmatā ca rāhulena /
S04bsu022_u:6_7_1: āyuṣmatā ca svāgatena / āyuṣmatā cānandena / evaṃpramukhairdvādaśabhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ dvātriṃśatā ca bodhisattvasahasraiḥ
S04bsu022_u:7_0_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīmupaniśritya viharati sma satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjitaśca tisṛṇāṃ
S04bsu022_u:7_0_1: pariṣadāṃ rājñāṃ rājakumārāṇāṃ rājamantriṇāṃ rājamahāmātrāṇāṃ rājapādamūlikānāṃ kṣatriyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatyamātyapārṣadyānāṃ
S04bsu022_u:7_1: lābhī ca bhagavān prabhūtānāṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyamāsvādanīyākalpikānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:7_2: lābhāgryayaśogryaprāptaśca bhagavān sarvatra cānupaliptaḥ padma iva jalena /
S04bsu022_u:7_3_0: udāraśca bhagavataḥ kīrtiśabdaśloko loke 'bhyudgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavit paraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
S04bsu022_u:7_3_1: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān pañcacakṣuḥsamanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:7_4: sa imaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ sadevakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśramaṇabrāhmaṇīn prajān sadevamānuṣān svayaṃ vijñāya sākṣātkṛtya upasaṃpadya viharati sma /
S04bsu022_u:7_5: saddharmaṃ deśayati sma ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ vrahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:8_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān rātryāṃ madhyame yāme buddhālaṃkāravyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:8_1_0: samanantarasamāpannasya ca bhagavata imaṃ buddhālaṃkāravyūhaṃ nāma samādhimatha tatkṣaṇameva bhagavata upariṣṭānmūrdhnaḥ
S04bsu022_u:8_2: sā sarvā śuddhāvāsān devabhavanānyavabhāsya maheśvaradevaputrapramukhānaprameyān devaputrān saṃcodayāmāsa /
S04bsu022_u:8_3: tataśca tathāgataraśmijālānniścārya imāḥ saṃcodanāgāthā niścaranti sma /
S04bsu022_u:lal_1.2_1: devātidevaṃ naradevapūjyaṃ dharme svayaṃbhuṃ vaśinaṃ śrayadhvam //
S04bsu022_u:10_0_0: samanantaraspṛṣṭāśca khalu punaste śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ tasyā buddhānusmṛtyasaṅgājñānālokāyā raśmyā ābhiścaivaṃrūpābhirgāthābhiḥ
S04bsu022_u:10_0_1: saṃcoditāḥ samantataḥ praśāntāḥ samādhervyutthāya tān buddhānubhāvenāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāgaṇanāsamatikrāntakalpātikrāntān buddhān
S04bsu022_u:10_1: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāni buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhātparṣanmaṇḍalāni yāśca dharmadeśanāstā āsan,
S04bsu022_u:11_0_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ rātrau praśāntāyāmīśvaraśca nāma śuddhāvāsakāyiko devaputro maheśvaro nāma nandaśca sunandaśca candanaśca
S04bsu022_u:11_0_1: mahitaśca praśāntaśca praśāntavinīteśvaraścaite cānye ca saṃbahulāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā atikrāntātikrāntairvarṇaiḥ
S04bsu022_u:11_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte tasthuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:11_2_0: ekānte sthitāśca te śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - asti bhagavan lalitavistaro nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ sūtrānto
S04bsu022_u:11_3_0: tadyathā - bhagavatā padmottareṇa ca dharmaketunā ca dīpaṃkareṇa ca guṇaketunā ca mahākareṇa ca ṛṣidevena ca śrītejasā ca
S04bsu022_u:11_3_1: satyaketunā ca vajrasaṃhatena ca sarvābhibhuvā ca hemavarṇena ca atyuccagāminā ca pravāhasāgareṇa ca puṣpaketunā ca vararūpeṇa
S04bsu022_u:11_3_2: ca sulocanena ca ṛṣiguptena ca jinavaktreṇa ca unnatena ca puṣpitena ca ūrṇatejasā ca puṣkareṇa ca suraśminā ca maṅgalena
S04bsu022_u:11_3_3: ca sudarśanena ca mahāsiṃhatejasā ca sthitabuddhidattena ca vasantagandhinā ca satyadharmavipulakīrtinā ca tiṣyeṇa ca puṣyeṇa
S04bsu022_u:11_3_4: ca lokasundareṇa ca vistīrṇabhedena ca ratnakīrtinā ca ugratejasā ca brahmatejasā ca sughoṣeṇa ca supuṣṣeṇa ca sumanojñaghoṣeṇa
S04bsu022_u:11_3_5: ca suceṣṭarūpeṇa ca prahasitanetreṇa ca guṇarāśinā ca meghasvareṇa ca sundaravarṇena ca āyustejasā ca salīlagajagāminā ca
S04bsu022_u:11_3_6: lokābhilāṣitena ca jitaśatruṇā ca saṃpūjitena ca vipaśyinā ca śikhinā ca viśvabhuvā ca kakucchandena ca kanakamuninā ca kāśyapena
S04bsu022_u:11_4: taṃ bhagavānapyetarhi saṃprakāśayet bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:11_5_0: asya ca mahāyānodbhāvanārthaṃ sarvaparapravādināṃ ca nigrahārthaṃ sarvabodhisattvānāṃ codbhāvanārthaṃ sarvamārāṇāṃ cābhibhavanārthaṃ
S04bsu022_u:11_5_1: sarvabodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ vīryārambhasaṃjananārthaṃ saddharmasya cānuparigrahārthaṃ triratnavaṃśasyānuparigrahārthaṃ
S04bsu022_u:11_6: adhivāsayati sma bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena sadevakasya lokasyānukampāmupādāya /
S04bsu022_u:12_0_0: atha khalu devaputrā bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā bhagavataḥ
S04bsu022_u:12_0_1: pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya divyaiścandanacūrṇairagurucūrṇairmāndārapuṣpaiścābhyavakīrya tatraivāntardadhuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:13_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāmeva rātryāmatyayena ca karīro maṇḍalamātravyūhastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:13_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavān prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdadbodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaḥ śrāvakasaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:13_2_0: niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayati sma - iti hi bhikṣavo rātrau praśāntāyāmīśvaro nāma śuddhāvāsakāyiko devaputro maheśvaraśca
S04bsu022_u:13_2_1: nāma nandaśca sunandaśca candanaśca mahitaśca praśāntaśca vinīteśvaraścaite cānye ca saṃbahulāḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāḥ
S04bsu022_u:13_3: atha khalu te bodhisattvāste ca mahāśrāvakā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocan - tatsādhu bhagavan,
S04bsu022_u:13_5: tadbhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca etarhi cāgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
S04bsu022_u:13_6: adhivāsayati sma bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyānukampāmupādāya /
S04bsu022_u:lal_1.7_1: śriyāvabhāsyeha ca jetasāhvayaṃ vanaṃ mudā me 'ntikamabhyupāgatāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_1.8_0: maheśvaraścandana īśa nando praśāntacitto mahitaḥ sunandanaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_1.9_0: praṇamya pādau pratidakṣiṇaṃ ca kṛtvaiva māṃ tasthurihāgrato me /
S04bsu022_u:lal_1.9_1: pragṛhya caivāñjalimaṅgulībhiḥ sagauravā māmiha te yayācuḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_1.10_0: idaṃ mune rāganisūdanāḍhya vaipulyasūtraṃ hi mahānidānam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_1.10_1: yadbhāṣitaṃ sarvatathāgataiḥ prāg lokasya sarvasya hitārthametat //
S04bsu022_u:lal_1.11_1: paraṃ mahāyānamidaṃ prabhāṣayan parapravādānnamuciṃ ca dharṣayan //
S04bsu022_u:lal_1.12_1: sarve ca tuṣṭā muditā udagrāḥ puṣpāṇi cikṣepuravāptaharṣam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_1.13_0: tadbhikṣavo me śṛṇuteha sarve vaipulyasūtraṃ hi mahānidānam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_1.13_1: yadbhāṣitaṃ sarvatathāgataiḥ prāg lokasya sarvasya hitārthamevam //
S04bsu022_u:20_0_0: tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamaḥ sulalitavistaro nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ sūtrānto mahāvaipulyaḥ? iha bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya tuṣitavarabhavanāvasthitasya
S04bsu022_u:20_0_19: devamanuṣyeṣu puṇyatejastejitasya mahāpuruṣadinakarasya kṛṣṇapakṣāpagatasya śuklapakṣapratipūrṇasya manāpapriyadarśanasya
S04bsu022_u:20_0_26: sudattadānasya sukṛtapūrvayogasya sukṛtādhikārasya dattasatyaṃkārasya paryeṣitasarvakuśalamūlasya vāsitavāsanasya niryāṇamiva
S04bsu022_u:20_0_28: kāyikena caturvidhaṃ vācā trividhaṃ manasā sucaritavato daśakulakarmapathādānasevitavataḥ catvāriṃśadaṅgasamanvāgatasamyakprayogamāsevitavataḥ
S04bsu022_u:20_0_31: buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasreṣu dānāni dattavataḥ ardhacaturtheṣu pratyekabuddhakoṭīśateṣu kṛtādhikāravataḥ aprameyāsaṃkhyeyān
S04bsu022_u:20_0_33: sthitasya śvetaketunāmno devaputrottamasya sarvadevasaṃghaiḥ saṃpūjyamānasya raśmyāyamaparamitaścyuto martyasya lokotpanno
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.3_0: smara kulakulīnā śamathaṃ śīlavrataṃ kṣamā damaṃ caiva /
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.4_0: smara smara anantakīrte saṃpūjitā ye ti buddhaniyutāni /
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.5_0: cyava cyava hi cyutividhijñā jaramaraṇakleśasūdanā virajā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.6_1: sādhu bhava prajñātṛpta tarpaya janatāṃ ciratṛṣārtām //
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.7_0: kiṃ cāpyaninditayaśa(stvaṃ) dharmaratirato na cāsi kāmarataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.7_1: atha ca punaramalanayanā anukampā sadevakaṃ lokam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.8_0: kiṃ cāpi devanayutāḥ śrutvā dharmaṃ na te vitṛpyante /
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.9_0: kiṃ cāpi vimalacakṣo paśyasi buddhān daśādiśi loke /
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.9_1: dharmaṃ śṛṇoṣi ca tatastaṃ dharmavaraṃ vibhaja loke //
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.10_0: kiṃ cāpi tuṣitabhavanaṃ tava puṇyaśriyābhiśobhate śrīmān /
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.10_1: atha ca puna karuṇamānasa pravarṣa jambudhvaje varṣam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.12_0: nihatā ti mārakarmā jitāstvayānye kutīrthikā nāthā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.12_1: kena sakalagata ti bodhī kālo 'yaṃ mā upekṣasva //
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.13_0: kleśāgninā pradīpte loke tvaṃ vīra meghavad vyāpya /
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.14_0: tvaṃ vaidya dhātukuśala cirāturān satyavaidya satyavān /
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.17_0: samudīkṣante pālāścaturo ye tubhya dāsyate pātram /
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.17_1: śakrāśca brahma nayutā ye jātaṃ tvāṃ grahīṣyanti //
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.19_0: yatraiva bhājane 'smin maṇiratnaṃ tiṣṭhate bhavati śrīmān /
S04bsu022_u:lal_2.20_1: codenti karuṇāmanasaṃ ayaṃ sa kālo mā upekṣasva //
S04bsu022_u:28_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattva evaṃ dharmakālasaṃcoditaḥ saṃstato mahāvimānānniṣkramya dharmoccayo nāma mahāprāsādo yatra niṣadya bodhisattvastuṣitebhyo devebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati sma,
S04bsu022_u:28_2: abhiruhya ca sudharme siṃhāsane niṣīdati sma /
S04bsu022_u:28_3: atha ye devaputrā bodhisattvasya sabhāgāḥ samayānasaṃprasthitāste 'pi tameva prāsādamabhirohanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:28_4: ye ca daśadiksaṃnipatitā bodhisattvāḥ sabhāgacaritā bodhisattvasya devaputrāśca,
S04bsu022_u:28_5: te 'pi taṃ prāsādamabhiruhya yathāpratyarheṣu siṃhāsaneṣu svakasvakeṣu niṣīdanti,
S04bsu022_u:29_0: iti hi bhikṣavo dvādaśabhirvarṣairbodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣimavakramiṣyatīti //
S04bsu022_u:30_0: atha śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā jambudvīpamāgatya divyaṃ varṇamantardhāpya brāhmaṇaveṣeṇa brāhmaṇān vedānadhyāpayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:30_3: yaiḥ samanvāgatasya dve gatī bhavato na tṛtīyā /
S04bsu022_u:30_4: sacedagāramadhyāvasati, rājā bhavatī cakravartī caturaṅgo vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:30_6: tadyathā - cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam /
S04bsu022_u:31_0_0: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī cakraratnena samanvāgato bhavati? iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadeva poṣadheyaṃ
S04bsu022_u:31_0_1: ca pañcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātasyopavāsoṣitasyopariprāsādatalagatasya stryāgāraparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati /
S04bsu022_u:31_1: sahasrāraṃ sanemikaṃ sanābhikaṃ suvarṇavarṇakarmālaṃkṛtaṃ saptatālamuccaiḥ samantād dṛṣṭvāntaḥpuraṃ rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya taddivyaṃ cakraratnameva bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:31_2_0: śrutaṃ khalu mayā yasya kila rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadeva poṣadheyaṃ pañcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātasyopavāsoṣitasyopariprāsādatalagatasya
S04bsu022_u:31_2_1: stryāgāraparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati,
S04bsu022_u:31_3: sa bhavati rājā cakravartī / nūnamahaṃ rājā cakravartī yannvahaṃ divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ mīmāṃsayeyam /
S04bsu022_u:31_4_0: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikta ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā taddivyaṃ
S04bsu022_u:31_4_1: cakraratnaṃ prārthayedevaṃ cāvedayet - pravartayasva bhaṭṭa divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ dharmeṇa mādharmeṇa /
S04bsu022_u:31_5: atha taddivyaṃ cakraratnaṃ rājñā kṣatriyeṇa mūrdhābhiṣiktena pravartitaṃ samyageva ṛddhau vihāyasā pūrveṇa vrajati /
S04bsu022_u:31_6: anveti rājā cakravartī sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
S04bsu022_u:31_7: yatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe taddivyaṃ cakraratnaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate,
S04bsu022_u:31_8: tatra rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto vāsaṃ kalpayati sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
S04bsu022_u:31_9: atha ye te bhavanti pūrvasyāṃ diśi rājāno maṇḍalinaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:31_10: te rūpyapātrīṃ vā [Vaidya_12] suvarṇacūrṇaparipūrṇāmādāya svarṇapātrīṃ vā rūpyacūrṇaparipūrṇāmādāya rājānaṃ cakravartinaṃ pratyuttiṣṭhanti - ehi deva svāgataṃ devāya,
S04bsu022_u:31_11: idaṃ devasya rājyamṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:31_13: evamukte rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktastrātā tān rājño maṇḍalina etadavocat - kārayantu bhavantaḥ svakāni rājyāni dharmeṇa /
S04bsu022_u:31_15: mādattādāsyatha, mā kāmeṣu mithyā cariṣyatha, mā mṛṣā vakṣyatha, yāvanmā bhe vijite adharmamutpadyate,
S04bsu022_u:31_16: mādharmacāriṇo rocetha / evaṃ khalu rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ vijayati /
S04bsu022_u:31_17: pūrvāṃ diśaṃ vijitaḥ pūrvaṃ samudramavagāhya pūrvaṃ samudramavatarati /
S04bsu022_u:31_18: pūrvaṃ samudramavatīrya samyageva ṛddhyā vihāyasā dakṣiṇena vrajati /
S04bsu022_u:31_19: anveti rājā cakravartī sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
S04bsu022_u:31_24: pratyuttīrya samyageva ṛddhyā vihāyasā rājadhānīmāgatyopari antaḥpuradvāre 'kṣatamevāsthāt /
S04bsu022_u:31_25: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaścakraratnena samanvāgato bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:32_0: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī hastiratnena samanvāgato bhavati? iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavaddhastiratnamutpadyate /
S04bsu022_u:32_1: sarvaśvetaṃ saptāṅgasupratiṣṭhitaṃ svarṇacūḍakaṃ svarṇadhvajaṃ svarṇālaṃkāraṃ hemajālapraticchannaṃ ṛddhimantaṃ vihāyasā gāminaṃ vikurvaṇādharmiṇaṃ yaduta bodhirnāma nāgarājā /
S04bsu022_u:32_2: yadā ca rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktastaddhastiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmo bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:32_3_0: atha sūryasyābhyudgamanavelāyāṃ taddhastiratnamabhiruhya imāmeva mahāpṛthivīṃ samudraparikhāṃ samudraparyantāṃ samantato
S04bsu022_u:32_4: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī hastiratnena samanvāgato bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:33_0: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī aśvaratnena samanvāgato bhavati? atha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavadaśvaratnamutpadyate /
S04bsu022_u:33_1: sarvanīlaṃ kṛṣṇaśirasaṃ muñjakeśamādṛtavadanaṃ svarṇadhvajaṃ svarṇālaṃkāraṃ hemajālapraticchannaṃ ṛddhimantaṃ vihāyasā gāminaṃ vikurvaṇādharmiṇaṃ yaduta bālāhako nāmāśvarājam /
S04bsu022_u:33_2: yadā ca rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto 'śvaratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmo bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:33_3: atha sūryasyābhyudgamanavelāyāmaśvaratnamabhiruhya imāmeva mahāpṛthvīṃ samudraparikhāṃ samudraparyantāṃ samantanto 'nvāhiṇḍya rājadhānīmāgatya praśāsanaratiḥ pratyanubhavati /
S04bsu022_u:33_4: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartīṃ aśvaratnena samanvāgato bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:34_0: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartīṃ maṇiratnena samanvāgato bhavati? iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavanmaṇiratnamutpadyate śuddhanīlavaiḍūryamaṣṭāṃśaṃ suparikarmakṛtam /
S04bsu022_u:34_1: tasya khalu punarmaṇiratnasyābhayā sarvamantaḥpuramavabhāsyena sphuṭaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:34_2: yadā ca rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktastaṃ [Vaidya_13] maṇiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmo bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:34_3: atha rātryāmardharātrasamaye 'ndhakāratamisrāyāṃ taṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre ucchrāpayitvā udyānabhūmiṃ niryāti subhūmidarśanāya /
S04bsu022_u:34_4: tasya khalu punarmaṇiratnasyābhayāsarvāvantaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyamavabhāsena sphuṭībhavati sāmantena yojanam /
S04bsu022_u:34_5: ye khalu punastasya maṇiratnasya sāmantake manuṣyāḥ prativasanti,
S04bsu022_u:34_7: anyonyaṃ paśyanti, anyonyamāhuḥ - uttiṣṭha bhadramukhāḥ karmāntāni kārayataḥ āpaṇāni prasārayata,
S04bsu022_u:34_9: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto maṇiratnena samanvāgato bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:35_0: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī strīratnena samanvāgato bhavati? iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavatstrīratnamutpadyate /
S04bsu022_u:35_1: sadṛśī kṣatriyā nātidīrghā nātihrasvā nātisthūlā nātikṛśā nātigaurī nātikṛṣṇā abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā /
S04bsu022_u:35_4: kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśā / śītalakāle cāsyā uṣṇasaṃsparśāni gātrāṇi bhavanti,
S04bsu022_u:35_6: sā rājānaṃ cakravartinaṃ muktvā nānyasmin manasāpi rāgaṃ karoti kiṃ punaḥ kāyena /
S04bsu022_u:35_7: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī strīratnena samanvāgato bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:36_0: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī gṛhapatiratnena samanvāgato bhavati? iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavad gṛhapatiratnamutpadyate paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī divyacakṣuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:36_1: sa tena divyacakṣuṣā sāmantena yojanaṃ sasvāmikāni nidhānāni paśyati,
S04bsu022_u:36_5: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī gṛhapatiratnena samanvāgato bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:37_0: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī pariṇāyakaratnena samanvāgato bhavati? iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhāṣibhiktasya pūrvavatpariṇāyakaratnamutpadyate paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī /
S04bsu022_u:37_2: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī pariṇāyakaratnena samanvāgato bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:37_4: bhavati cāsya putrasahasraṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
S04bsu022_u:37_7: vāntachandarāgo netā ananyadevaḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ceti /
S04bsu022_u:38_0: tathā anye 'pi devaputrā jambudvīpamāgatya pratyekabuddhebhya ārocayanti sma - riñcata mārṣā buddhakṣetram /
S04bsu022_u:39_0: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena rājagṛhe mahānagare golāṅgulaparivartane parvate mātaṅgo nāma pratyekabuddho viharati sma /
S04bsu022_u:39_1: sa taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā kardama iva śilāyāṃ prasthāya vihāyasā saptatālamātramatyudgamya ca tejodhātuṃ samāpadyolkeva parinirvāṇo 'yam /
S04bsu022_u:40_0: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena vārāṇasyāṃ ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve pañca pratyekabuddhaśatāni viharanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:40_1: te 'pi taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā vihāyasā saptatālamātramatyudgamya tejodhātuṃ samāpadyolkeva parinirvānti sma /
S04bsu022_u:40_6: abhayadattāśca tasmin mṛgāḥ prativasanti iti tadagreṇa mṛgadāvasya mṛgadāva iti saṃjñodapādi /
S04bsu022_u:41_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvastuṣitavarabhavanasthitaścatvāri mahāvilokitāni vilokayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:41_1: katamāni catvāri? tadyathā - kālavilokitaṃ dvīpavilokitaṃ deśavilokitaṃ kulavilokitam /
S04bsu022_u:42_0: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ kālavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma? na bodhisattva ādipravṛtte loke sattvasaṃvartanīkālasamaye mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāmati,
S04bsu022_u:42_1: atha tarhi yadā vyakto lokaḥ susthito bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:42_2: jāti prajñāyate, jarā prajñāyate, vyādhi prajñāyate, maraṇaṃ prajñāyate, tadā bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāmati /
S04bsu022_u:43_0: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo dvīpavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma? na bodhisattvā pratyantadvīpā upapadyante,
S04bsu022_u:43_1: na purvavidehe, nāparagodānīye, na cottarakurau / atha tarhi jambudvīpa evopapadyante /
S04bsu022_u:44_0: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvo deśavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma? na bodhisattvāḥ pratyantajanapadeṣūpapadyante,
S04bsu022_u:44_1: yeṣu manuṣyā andhajātyā jaḍā eḍamūkajātīyā abhavyāḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāmarthaṃ jñātum /
S04bsu022_u:45_0: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ kulavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma? na bodhisattvā hīnakuleṣūpapadyante caṇḍālakuleṣu vā veṇukārakule vā rathakārakule vā puṣkasakule vā /
S04bsu022_u:45_1: atha tarhi kuladvaye evopapadyante brāhmaṇakule kṣatriyakule ca /
S04bsu022_u:45_8: tamarthaṃ ca saṃpratītya bodhisattvastuṣitavarabhavanasthaścatvāri mahāvilokitāni vilokayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:46_0: evaṃ cāvalokya tūṣṇīmabhūt / iti hi bhikṣavaste devaputrāḥ bodhisattvasyānyonyaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - katamasmin kularatne kiyadrūpāyāṃ jananyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ pratiṣṭhateti /
S04bsu022_u:46_1: tatra kecidāhuḥ - idaṃ vaidehīkulaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:46_4_0: tatkasmāt? tathā hi - tanna [Vaidya_15] mātṛśuddhaṃ pitṛśuddhaṃ aplutaṃ cañcalamanavasthitaṃ parittapuṇyābhiṣyanditaṃ na
S04bsu022_u:47_0: apare tvāhuḥ - idaṃ punaḥ kauśalakulaṃ mahāvāhanaṃ ca mahāparivāraṃ ca mahādhanaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:47_3: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi - kauśalakulaṃ mātaṅgacyutyupapannaṃ na mātṛpitṛśuddham /
S04bsu022_u:47_4: hīnādhimuktikaṃ na ca kuloditaṃ na cāparimitadhanaratnanidhisamutthitam /
S04bsu022_u:48_0: apare tvāhuḥ - idaṃ vaṃśarājakulaṃ ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:48_3: kiṃ kāraṇam? tathāhi - vaṃśarājakulaṃ prākṛtaṃ ca caṇḍaṃ ca na cojjvalitatejasaṃ parapuruṣajanmāvṛtaṃ ca na mātṛpitṛsvatejaḥ karmābhinirvṛttaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:49_0_0: apare 'pyāhuḥ - iyaṃ vaiśālī mahānagarī ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ramaṇīyā cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca vitardiniryūhatoraṇagavākṣaharmyakūṭāgāraprāsādatalasamalaṃkṛtā
S04bsu022_u:49_3: kiṃ kāraṇam? tathā hi - teṣāṃ nāsti parasparanyāyavāditā,
S04bsu022_u:49_6: ahaṃ rājeti / na ca kasyacicchiṣyatvamabhyupagacchati na dharmatvam /
S04bsu022_u:50_0: apare tvevamāhuḥ - idaṃ pradyotakulaṃ mahābalaṃ ca mahāvāhanaṃ ca paracamūśirasi vijayalabdhaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:50_3: kiṃ kāraṇam? tathā hi - te caṇḍāśca capalāśca raudrāśca paruṣāśca sāhasikāśca,
S04bsu022_u:50_4: na ca karmadarśinaḥ / tena tadapyapratirūpamasya bodhisattvasya garbhapratisaṃsthānāyeti /
S04bsu022_u:51_0: apara evamāhuḥ - iyaṃ mathurā nagarī ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca /
S04bsu022_u:51_4: kiṃ kāraṇam? tathāhi - sa rājā mithyādṛṣṭikulavaṃśaprasūto dasyurājā /
S04bsu022_u:51_5: na yujyate caramabhavikasya bodhisattvasya mithyādṛṣṭikule upapattum /
S04bsu022_u:52_0_0: apare 'pyāhuḥ - ayaṃ hastināpure mahānagare rājā pāṇḍavakulavaṃśaprasūtaḥ śūro vīryavān varāṅgarūpasaṃpannaḥ parasainyapramardakānāṃ
S04bsu022_u:52_2: kiṃ kāraṇam? tathā hi - pāṇḍavakulaprasūtaiḥ kulavaṃśo 'tivyākulīkṛto [Vaidya_16] yudhiṣṭhiro dharmasya putra iti kathayati,
S04bsu022_u:52_3: bhīmaseno vāyoḥ, arjuna indrasya, nakulasahadevāvaśvinoriti / tena tadapi kulamapratirūpamasya bodhisattvasya garbhasaṃsthānāyeti /
S04bsu022_u:53_0: apara āhuḥ - iyaṃ mithilā nagarī atīva ramaṇīyā maithilasya rājñaḥ sumitrasya nivāsabhūmiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:54_0: evaṃ bhikṣavaste bodhisattvā devaputrāśca sarvasmin jambudvīpe ṣoḍaśajānapadeṣu yāni kāniciduccoccāni rājakulāni,
S04bsu022_u:54_2: teṣāṃ cintāmanaskāraprayuktānāṃ jñānaketudhvajo nāma devaputro 'vaivartiko bodhāya kṛtaniścayo 'sminmahāyāne /
S04bsu022_u:54_3: sa tāṃ mahatīṃ bodhisattvadevaparṣadametadavocat - etanmārṣā etameva bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya pariprakṣyāmaḥ - kīdṛgguṇasaṃpanne kule caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyata iti /
S04bsu022_u:54_4: sādhviti te sarve kṛtāñjalipuṭā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya paryaprākṣuḥ - kīdṛgguṇasaṃpanne satpuruṣakularatne caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyata iti /
S04bsu022_u:55_0: tato bodhisattvastaṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ devagaṇaṃ ca vyavalokya etadavocat - catuṣṣaṣṭyākārairmārṣāḥ saṃpannakulaṃ bhavati yatra caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyate /
S04bsu022_u:55_15: śīlavacca tatkulaṃ bhavati / prajñāvacca tatkulaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:55_16: amātyāvekṣitaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati bhogān paribhunakti /
S04bsu022_u:55_17: avandhyaśilpaniveśanaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati bhogān paribhunakti /
S04bsu022_u:55_20: kṛtajñaṃ ca kṛtaveditaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:55_61: anavadyaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati sarvajātivādadoṣaiḥ sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām /
S04bsu022_u:55_62: ebhirmārṣāścatuṣṣaṣṭyākāraiḥ samanvāgataṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati yasmiṃścaramaḥ bhaviko bodhisattva utpadyate /
S04bsu022_u:56_0: dvātriṃśatā mārṣā guṇākāraiḥ samanvāgatā sā strī bhavati yasyāḥ striyāścaramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ kukṣāvavakrāmati /
S04bsu022_u:56_1: katamairdvātriṃśatā? yaduta abhijñātāyāṃ striyāṃ kukṣau caramabhaviko bodhisattvo 'vakrāmati /
S04bsu022_u:56_2_0: abhilakṣitāyā acchidropacārāyā jātisaṃpannāyāḥ kulasaṃpannāyā rūpasaṃpannāyā nāmasaṃpannāyā ārohapariṇāhasaṃpannāyā aprasūtāyāḥ
S04bsu022_u:56_2_1: śīlasaṃpannāyāḥ tyāgasaṃpannāyāḥ smitamukhāyāḥ pradakṣiṇagrāhiṇyā vyaktāyā vinītāyā viśāradāyā bahuśrutāyāḥ paṇḍitāyā aśaṭhāyā
S04bsu022_u:56_2_2: amāyāvinyā akrodhanāyā apagaterṣyāyā amatsarāyā acañcalāyā acapalāyā amukharāyāḥ kṣāntisaurabhyasaṃpannāyā hryapatrāpyasaṃpannāyā
S04bsu022_u:56_2_3: mandarāgadveṣamohāyā apagatamātṛgrāmadoṣāyāḥ pativratāyāḥ sarvākāraguṇasaṃpannāyāḥ striyāḥ kukṣau caramabhaviko bodhisattvo
S04bsu022_u:56_3: ebhirmārṣā dvātriṃśatākāraiḥ samanvāgatā sā strī yasyāḥ striyāḥ kukṣau caramabhaviko bodhisattvo 'vakrāmati /
S04bsu022_u:57_0: na khalu punarmārṣāḥ kṛṣṇapakṣe bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣāvavakrāmati,
S04bsu022_u:57_1: api tu śuklapakṣe / evaṃ pañcadaśyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ puṣyanakṣatrayoge poṣadhaparigṛhītāyā mātuḥ kukṣau caramabhaviko bodhisattvo 'vakrāmati /
S04bsu022_u:58_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvāste ca devaputrā bodhisattvasyāntikādimāmevarūpāṃ kulapariśuddhiṃ mātṛpariśuddhiṃ ca śrutvā cintāmanaskārā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:58_1_0: katamaṃ kulaṃ evaṃguṇasamanvāgataṃ bhavedyāvadvidhamanena satpuruṣeṇa nirdiṣṭam? teṣāṃ cintāmanaskāraprayuktānāmetadabhūt
S04bsu022_u:58_1_1: - idaṃ khalvapi śākyakulaṃ ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:58_2_0: rājā śuddhodano mātṛśuddhaḥ [Vaidya_18] pitṛśuddhaḥ patnīśuddho 'parikṛṣṭasaṃpannāyāḥ svākārasuvijñāpakaḥ puṇyatejastejito
S04bsu022_u:58_3_0: sarvaśākyaviṣaye caikarājā pūjito mānitaḥ śreṣṭhigṛhapatyamātyapāriṣadyānāṃ prāsādiko darśanīyo nātivṛddho nātitaruṇo 'bhirūpaḥ
S04bsu022_u:58_3_1: sarvaguṇopetaḥ śilpajñaḥ kālajña ātmajño dharmajñastattvajño lokajño lakṣaṇajño dharmarājo dharmeṇānuśāstā avaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ
S04bsu022_u:58_5_0: rājñaśca śuddhodanasya māyā nāma devī suprabuddhasya śākyādhipaterduhitā navataruṇī rūpayauvanasaṃpannā aprasūtā apagataputraduhitṛkā
S04bsu022_u:58_5_1: surūpā salekhyavicitreva darśanīyā devakanyeva sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitā apagatamātṛgrāmadoṣā satyavādinyakarkaśā aparuṣā acapalānavadyā
S04bsu022_u:58_5_2: kokilasvarā apralāpinī madhurapriyavādinī vyapagatākhilakrodhamadamānadarpapratighā anīrṣukā kālavādinī tyāgasaṃpannā śīlavatī
S04bsu022_u:58_5_3: patisaṃtuṣṭā pativratā parapuruṣacintāmanaskārāpagatā samasaṃhataśiraḥkarṇanāsā bhramavarasadṛśakeśī sulalāṭī subhrūrvyapagatabhrukuṭikā

S04bsu022_u:118_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhavat - katamasmin gṛhe māyādevī sukhamanupakliṣṭā viharediti /

S04bsu022_u:124_2: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāvyūhasya samādheranubhāvena sarveṣu teṣu gṛheṣu māyādevīmupadarśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:124_3: abhyantaragataśca bodhisattvo māyādevyāḥ kukṣau dakṣiṇe pārśve paryaṅkamābhujya niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
