S04bsu022_u:126_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ devaparṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - ye 'pi tāvaccāturmahārājakāyikā devāste 'pi tāvanmanuṣyāśrayagatatvena nirvidyāpakramanti /
S04bsu022_u:126_1: kaḥ punarvādo ye tadanye udāratamā devāḥ trāyatriṃśā vā yāmā vā tuṣitā vā /
S04bsu022_u:126_2: tatkathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bodhisattvaḥ śucirnirāmagandhaḥ sattvaratnaḥ saṃtuṣitāddevanikāyāccyutvā durgandhe manuṣyāśraye daśamāsān mātuḥ kukṣau sthita iti /
S04bsu022_u:127_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando buddhānubhāvena bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvajjugupsanīyaśca mātṛgrāmastathāgatenokto yāvadrāgacaritaśca /
S04bsu022_u:127_2: kathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva tuṣitāddevanikāyāccyavitvā manuṣyāśraye (durgandhe) māturdakṣiṇe (pārśve) kukṣāvupapanna iti /
S04bsu022_u:127_3: nāhaṃ bhagavan idamutsahe evaṃ vaktaṃ yathaiva pūrve bhagavatā vyākṛtamiti /
S04bsu022_u:127_4: bhagavānāha - icchasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭuṃ yo mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya paribhogo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:127_6: ayaṃ sugata samayaḥ, yattathāgatastaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamupadarśayed yaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ vetsyāmaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:128_1: yad brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhamaṣṭaṣaṣṭibrahmaśatasahasrairbrahmaloke 'ntarhito bhagavataḥ purataḥ pratyasthāt /
S04bsu022_u:128_2: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte 'sthāt prāñjalībhūto bhagavantaṃ namasyan /
S04bsu022_u:128_3_0: tatra khalu bhagavān jānanneva brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāmantrayate sma - gṛhītastvayā brahman sa bodhisattvaparibhogo daśamāsiko
S04bsu022_u:128_3_1: yo mama pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:128_5: evametat sugata / bhagavānāha - kva sa idānīṃ brahman? upadarśaya tam /
S04bsu022_u:128_7: bhagavānāha - tena hi tvaṃ brahman upadarśaya taṃ daśamāsikaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogam,
S04bsu022_u:129_0: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatistān brāhmaṇānetadavocat - tiṣṭhatu tāvadbhavanto yāvadvayaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamānayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:130_0: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatirbhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā bhagavataḥ purato 'ntarhitastatkṣaṇameva brahmaloke pratyasthāt /
S04bsu022_u:131_0: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ subrahmāṇaṃ devaputrametadavocat - gaccha tvaṃ mārṣā ito brahmalokamupādāya yāvattrāyatriṃśadbhavanam - śabdamudīraya,
S04bsu022_u:132_1_0: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiścaturaśītyā devakoṭyā nayutaśatasahasraḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ parigṛhya
S04bsu022_u:132_1_1: mahati brāhme vimāne triyojanaśatike pratiṣṭhāpyānekairdaivakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ samantato 'nuparivārya jambūdvīpamavatārayati
S04bsu022_u:133_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ mahāsaṃnipāto 'bhūt bhagavatsakāśe gantum /
S04bsu022_u:133_1: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo divyairvastrairdivyairmālyairdivyairgandhairdivyaiḥ puṣpairdivyairvādyairdivyaiśca paribhaugairabhisaṃskṛto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:133_2_0: tāvanmaheśākhyaiśca devaiḥ parivṛto 'bhūd yacchakro devānāmindraḥ sumerau(samudre) sthitvā dūrata eva mukhe tālacchatrakaṃ
S04bsu022_u:133_3: na ca śaknoti sma draṣṭum / tatkasmāt? maheśākhyā hi devā brāhmaṇāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:134_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstaṃ divyaṃ vādyanirghoṣamantardhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:134_1: tatkasmāt? yatsahaśravaṇādeva jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā unmādamāpatsyanta iti //
S04bsu022_u:135_0: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ - kathaṃ devānāmindra kariṣyāmo na labhāmahe ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭum /
S04bsu022_u:135_1: sa tānavocat - kimahaṃ mārṣāḥ kariṣyāmi? ahamapi na labhe draṣṭum /
S04bsu022_u:135_2: api tu khalu punarmārṣā bhagavatsamīpamupanītaṃ drakṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:135_3: te tadā āhuḥ - tena hi devānāmindra tathā kuru yathāsya kṣipraṃ darśanaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu022_u:135_4: śakra āha - āgamayata mārṣā muhūrtaṃ yāvadatikrāntātikrāntatamā devaputrā bhagavantaṃ pratisaṃmodayante sma /
S04bsu022_u:136_0: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ taiścaturaśītyā devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraistaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:136_1: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaścaturasraścatuṣṭhūṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:137_0: dāraka uccaistvena / tasya khalu punaḥ kūtāgārasya madhye paryaṅkaḥ prajñaptaḥ tadyathāpi nāma ṣaṇmāsajātasya dārakasya bhittīphalakaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:137_1: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhoga evaṃ varṇasaṃsthāno yasya na kaścit sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sadṛśo 'sti ākṛtyā vā varṇena vā /
S04bsu022_u:137_2: devāḥ khalvapi taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptā abhuvan /
S04bsu022_u:137_4: sa ca tathāgatasyāntika upanīto 'tīva bhāsate tapati virocate sma /
S04bsu022_u:137_5: tadyathāpi nāma dvinirdhāntaṃ suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa supariniṣṭhitamapagatakācadoṣam,
S04bsu022_u:137_6: evaṃ (tasmin samaye) sa kūṭāgāro virājate sma /
S04bsu022_u:137_7: tasmin khalu punarbodhisattvaparibhoge paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto yasya sadevake loke nāsti kaścit sadṛśo varṇena vā saṃsthānena vā anyatra kambugrīvāyā [Vaidya_49] bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu022_u:137_9: tattasya bodhisattvaparyaṅkasyāgrato na bhāsate sma tadyathāpi nāma vātavṛṣṭyābhihataḥ kṛṣṇakambalaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:137_10: sa khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāra uragasāracandanamayo yasyaikasuvarṇadharaṇī sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ kṣamate,
S04bsu022_u:137_12: tādṛśa eva dvitīyaḥ kūṭāgāraḥ kṛto yastasmin prathame kūṭāgāre 'bhyantarataḥ asakto 'baddhasthitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:137_13: tādṛśa eva tṛtīyo 'pi kūṭāgāro yastasmin dvitīye kūṭāgāre 'bhyantare 'sakto 'baddhasthitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:137_14: sa ca paryaṅkastasmin gandhamaye tṛtīye kūṭāgāre vyavasthitaḥ saṃpraticchannaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:137_15: tasya khalu punaruragasāracandanasyaivaṃrūpo varṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma abhijātasya nīlaivaḍūryasya /
S04bsu022_u:137_16: tasya khalu punargandhakūṭāgārasyopari samantādyāvanti kāniciddivyātikrāntāni puṣpāṇi santi,
S04bsu022_u:137_17: tāni sarvāṇi tasmin kūṭāgāre bodhisattvasya pūrvakuśalamūlavipākenānuprāptānyeva jāyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:137_18: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo dṛḍhasāro 'bhedyo vajropamaḥ sparśena ca kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:137_19: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge ye kecit kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ bhavanavyūhāste sarve tasmin saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:138_0: yāmeva ca rātriṃ bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāntastāmeva rātrimadha āpaskandhamupādāya aṣṭaṣaṣṭiyojanaśatasahasrāṇi mahāpṛthivīṃ bhittvā yāvad brahmalokaṃ padmabhyudgatamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:138_1: na ca kaścittaṃ padmaṃ paśyati sma anyatra sārathinarottamāddaśaśatasāhasrikācca mahābrahmaṇaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:138_2: yacceha trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātāvojo vā maṇḍo va raso vā,
S04bsu022_u:138_3: tatsarvaṃ tasmin mahāpadme madhubinduḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:139_0: tamenaṃ mahābrahmā śubhe vaiḍūryabhājane prakṣipya bodhisattvasyopanāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:139_1: taṃ bodhisattvaḥ parigṛhya bhuṅkte sma mahābrahmaṇo 'nukampāmupādāya /
S04bsu022_u:139_2: nāsti sa kaścit sattvaḥ sattvanikāye yasya sa ojobinduḥ paribhuktaḥ samyak sukhena pariṇāmedanyatra caramabhavikādbodhisattvāt sarvabodhisattvabhūmiparipūrṇāt /
S04bsu022_u:139_3_0: kasya ca karmaṇo vipākena sa ojobindurbodhisattvasyopatiṣṭhate sma? dīrgharātraṃ khalvapi bodhisattvena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ
S04bsu022_u:139_3_1: caratā glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo bhaiṣajyaṃ dattamāśatparāṇāṃ sattvānāmāśāḥ paripūritāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:139_5: nityaṃ cāgrapuṣpamagraphalamagrarasaṃ tathāgatebhyastathāgatacaityebhyastathāgataśrāvakasaṃghebhyo mātāpitṛbhyaśca dattvā paścādātmanā paribhuktam /
S04bsu022_u:139_6: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mahābrahmā bodhisattvasya taṃ madhubindumupanāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:140_0: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre yāni kānicit santyatikrāntātikrāntāni māyāguṇaratikrīḍāsamavasṛtasthānāni,
S04bsu022_u:140_1: tāni sarvāṇi tasmin prādurbhāvāni saṃdṛśyante sma bodhisattvasya pūrvakarmavipākena /
S04bsu022_u:141_0: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge śatasahasravyūhaṃ nāma vāsoyugaṃ prādurbhūtam /
S04bsu022_u:141_1: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yasya tatprādurbhavedanyatra caramabhavikād bodhisattvāt /
S04bsu022_u:141_2: [Vaidya_50] na ca te kecana udārodārā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā ye tasmin kūṭāgāre na saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:141_3: sacetkūṭāgāraparibhoga evaṃ suparibhoga evaṃ supariniṣpannaḥ sāntarabahirevaṃ supariniṣṭhita evaṃ mṛdukaśca /
S04bsu022_u:141_5_0: na tu tasyopamā saṃvidyate / dharmatā khalveṣā bodhisattvasya pūrvakeṇa ca praṇidhānena iyaṃ cetanā ṛddhāvavaśyaṃ bodhisattvena
S04bsu022_u:141_5_1: mahāsattvena manuṣyaloka upapattavyamabhiniṣkramya cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayitavyam /
S04bsu022_u:141_9: na hi caramabhavikasya bodhisattvasya kalalārbudaghanapeśībhāvaṃ kāyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:141_10: atha tarhi sarvāṅgapratyaṅgalakṣaṇasaṃpannaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇa eva prādurbhavati /
S04bsu022_u:141_11: svapnāntaragatā ca bodhisattvamātā māyādevī mahānāgakuñjaramavakrāntaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
S04bsu022_u:142_0_0: tasya khalu punastathā niṣaṇṇasya śakro devānāmindraścatvāraśca mahārājāno 'ṣṭāviṃśatiśca mahāyakṣasenāpatayo guhyakādhipatiśca
S04bsu022_u:142_0_1: nāma yakṣakulaṃ yato vajrapāṇerutpattiste bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitamanubaddhā bhavanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:142_1: santi khalu punaścatasro bodhisattvaparicārakā devatāḥ - utkhalī ca nāma samutkhalī ca nāma dhvajavatī ca nāma prabhāvatī ca nāma /
S04bsu022_u:142_2: tā api bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitaṃ rakṣanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:142_3: śakro 'pi devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrairdevaputraśatairbodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jñātvā satataṃ samitamanubadhnāti sma /
S04bsu022_u:143_1: tadyathāpi nāma parvatamūrdhani rātrāvandhakāratamisrāyāṃ mahānagniskandho yojanādapi dṛśyate sma,
S04bsu022_u:143_3: evameva bodhisattvasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyātmabhāvo 'bhinirvṛtto 'bhūt prabhāsvaro 'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:143_4: sa tasmin kūṭāgāre paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇo 'tīva śobhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:143_6: bodhisattvasya mātā ca nidhyāya sthitā paśyati sma kukṣigataṃ bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:143_7: tadyathāpi nāma mahato 'bhrakūṭādvidyuto niḥsṛtya mahāntamavabhāsaṃ saṃjanayanti,
S04bsu022_u:143_8: evameva bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena ca taṃ prathamaṃ ratnakūṭāgāramavabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:143_12: tamavabhāsya yatra cāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavati sma tadavabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:143_14: sarvaṃ gṛhamavabhāsya gṛhasyopariṣṭānniḥsṛtya pūrvāṃ diśamavabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:143_15: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāṃ uttarāmadha ūrdhvaṃ samantāddaśadiśaḥ krośamātramekaikasyāṃ diśi mātuḥ kukṣigato bodhisattvaḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena cāvabhāsayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:144_1_0: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaścatvāro mahārājāno 'ṣṭāviṃśacca mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrayakṣaśataiḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye
S04bsu022_u:144_1_1: bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca /
S04bsu022_u:144_2: tadā bodhisattvastānāgatān viditvā dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimabhyutkṣipya ekāṅgulikayā āsanānyupadarśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:144_4: paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jātarūpamiva vigrahaṃ hastaṃ cālayantaṃ vicālayantam utkṣipantaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayantam /
S04bsu022_u:144_6: niṣaṇṇāṃśca tān viditvā bodhisattvo dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:144_7: yadā ca prakramitukāmā bhavanti tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva vicintitaṃ vijñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:144_8: saṃcārya vicārayati sma / mātaraṃ ca na bādhate sma / tadā teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitāḥ sma vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
S04bsu022_u:144_9: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:144_10: ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo yadbodhisattvo rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ saṃcārya vicārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:144_11: vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃstaṃ pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:144_12: punaraparaṃ yadā bodhisattvasya keciddarśanāyāgacchanti sma striyo vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā,
S04bsu022_u:145_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ san sattvān pratisaṃmodanakuśalo bhavati smeti /
S04bsu022_u:145_1: na ca kaściddevo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā yaḥ śaknoti sma bodhisattvaṃ pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmoditum /
S04bsu022_u:145_2: atha tarhi bodhisattva eva tāvat pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmodate sma,
S04bsu022_u:146_0: nirgate khalu punaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye madhyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite atha khalu śakro devānāmindro niṣkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:146_1: abhiniṣkrāntāśca trāyatriṃśaddevaputrā bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S04bsu022_u:146_3: tāṃśca bodhisattvo dūrata evāgacchato dṛṣṭvā dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ devāṃśca trāyatriṃśān pratisaṃmodate sma /
S04bsu022_u:146_5: na ca śaknoti sma bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindro bodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum /
S04bsu022_u:146_6: niṣīdati sma śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu /
S04bsu022_u:146_7: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:146_8: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma,
S04bsu022_u:146_10: tatasteṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma - asmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃmodate sma /
S04bsu022_u:146_11: ekaikaścaivaṃ saṃjānīte sma - mayaiva sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
S04bsu022_u:147_1: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre śakrasya devānāmindrasya trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ ca pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:147_2: na khalu punaranyatraivaṃ pariśuddho bodhisattvaparibhogo bhavati yathā mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya /
S04bsu022_u:147_3: yadā ca bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrāḥ prakramitukāmā bhavanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:147_4: tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:147_5: saṃcārya vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:147_6: mātaraṃ ca na bādhate sma / tadā śakrasya devānāmindrasyānyeṣāṃ ca trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
S04bsu022_u:147_7: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:148_0_0: nirgate ca khalu punarbhikṣavo madhyāhnakālasamaye sāyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiranekairbrahmakāyikairdevaputraśatasahasraiḥ
S04bsu022_u:148_0_1: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtastaṃ divyamojobindumādāya yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmati sma bodhisattvaṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ
S04bsu022_u:148_1: samanvāharati sma bhikṣavaḥ bodhisattvo brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāgacchantaṃ saparivāram /
S04bsu022_u:148_2: punareva ca bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇapāṇimutkṣipya brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatiṃ brahmakāyikāṃśca devaputrān pratisaṃmodate sma /
S04bsu022_u:148_4: na ca śaktirasti bhikṣavo brahmaṇaḥ sahāpaterbodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum /
S04bsu022_u:148_5: niṣīdati sma bhikṣavo brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu /
S04bsu022_u:148_6: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:148_7: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma,
S04bsu022_u:148_9: tatasteṣāmekaikasyaivaṃ bhavati sma - mayā sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
S04bsu022_u:148_11: yadā ca brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā gantukāmā bhavanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:148_12: tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhumutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:148_13: saṃcārya vicārayati sma / saṃcārya vicārya avasādatākāreṇa pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:148_14: mātaraṃ ca na bādhate sma / tato brahmaṇaḥ sahāpatestadanyeṣāṃ ca brahmakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāmevaṃ bhavati sma - visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti /
S04bsu022_u:148_15: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva prakrāmanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:148_16: bodhisattvaśca smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:149_0_0: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarābhyo digbhyo 'dhastādupariṣṭāt santāddaśabhyo digbhyo bahūni
S04bsu022_u:149_0_1: bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca dharmasaṃgītisaṃgāyanāya ca /
S04bsu022_u:149_1: teṣāmāgatāgatānāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjya prabhāvyūhāni siṃhāsanānyabhinirmimīte sma /
S04bsu022_u:149_3: niṣaṇṇāṃścainān viditvā paripṛcchati sma paripraśnayati sma yadutāsyaiva bodhisattvasya mahāyānasya vistaravibhāgatāmupādāya /
S04bsu022_u:149_4: na ca tān kaścidanyaḥ paśyati sma anyatra sabhāgebhyo devaputrebhyaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:149_5: ayaṃ bhikṣavo heturayaṃ pratyayo yena bodhisattvaḥ praśāntāyāṃ rātryāṃ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjati sma /
S04bsu022_u:150_1: na khalu punarbhikṣavo māyādevī bodhisattvakukṣigate gurukāyatāṃ saṃjānīte sma anyatra laghutāmeva mṛdutāmeva saukhyatāmeva /
S04bsu022_u:150_3: na ca rāgaparidāhena vā dveṣaparidāhena vā mohaparidāhena vā paridahyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:150_4: na ca kāmavitarkaṃ vā vyāpādavitarkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:150_5: na ca śītaṃ na coṣṇaṃ vā jighatsāṃ vā pipāsāṃ vā tamo vā rajo vā kleśaṃ vā saṃjānīte sma paśyati vā /
S04bsu022_u:150_6: na cāsyā amanāpā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā vā ābhāsamāgacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:150_7: na ca pāpakān svapnān paśyati sma /
S04bsu022_u:150_8: na cāsyāḥ strīmāyā na śāṭhyaṃ nerṣyā na strīkleśā bādhante sma /
S04bsu022_u:150_9: pañcaśikṣāpadasamādattā khalu punaḥ śīlavatī daśakuśalakarmapathe pratiṣṭhitā tasmin samaye bodhisattvamātā bhavati sma /
S04bsu022_u:150_10: na ca bodhisattvamātuḥ kvacit puruṣe rāgacittamutpadyate sma,
S04bsu022_u:150_12: ye ca kecitkapilāhvaye mahāpuravare anyeṣu vā janapadeṣu devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍabhūtāviṣṭāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā vā,
S04bsu022_u:150_13: te sarve bodhisattvamātuḥ sahadarśanādeva svasthāḥ smṛtipratilabdhā bhavanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:150_15: ye ca kecinnānārogaspṛṣṭāḥ sattvā bhavanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:150_17_0: cakṣurogeṇa vā śrotrarogeṇa vā ghrāṇarogeṇa vā jihvārogeṇa vā oṣṭharogeṇa vā dantarogeṇa kaṇṭharogeṇa vā galagaṇḍarogeṇa
S04bsu022_u:150_18: teṣāṃ bodhisattvamātā dakṣiṇapāṇiṃ mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:150_19: te sahapratiṣṭhāpite pāṇau vigatavyādhayo bhūtvā svakasvakāni gṛhāṇi gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:150_20: antato māyādevī tṛṇagulmakamapi dharaṇitalādabhyutkṣipya glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo 'nuprayacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:150_22: yadā ca māyādevī svaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ pratyavekṣate sma,
S04bsu022_u:150_24: tadyathāpi nāma supariśuddha ādarśamaṇḍale mukhamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /
S04bsu022_u:150_25: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭā udagrā āttamanā pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā bhavati sma /
S04bsu022_u:151_0: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mātuḥ kukṣigatasyādhiṣṭhitaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ divyāni tūryāṇi abhi(nirmāya) pranadanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:151_2: kālena devā varṣanti sma / kālena vāyavo vānti sma / kālena ṛtavo nakṣatrāṇi ca parivartante sma /
S04bsu022_u:151_3: kṣemaṃ ca rājyaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sumanākulamanubhavati sma /
S04bsu022_u:151_4: sarve ca kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare śākyā anye ca sattvāḥ khādanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:151_5: pibanti sma, (ramante sma,) krīḍanti sma, pravicārayanti sma, dānāni ca dadanti sma, puṇyāni ca kurvanti sma, kaumodyāmiva cāturmāsyāmekāntare krīḍāsukhavihārairviharanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:151_6: rājāpi śuddhodanaḥ saṃprāptabrahmacaryoparatarāṣṭrakāryo 'pi supariśuddhastapovanagata iva dharmamevānuvartate sma /
S04bsu022_u:152_1: evaṃrūpeṇa bhikṣava ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato 'sthāt /
S04bsu022_u:152_2: tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - drakṣyasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ yatra bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato vyāhārṣīt /
S04bsu022_u:152_4: darśayati sma tathāgata āyuṣmata ānandasya śakrasya devānāmindrasya caturṇāṃ ca lokapālānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ ca devamanuṣyāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:152_5: dṛṣṭvā ca te tuṣṭā abhūvan udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:152_6: sa ca brahmā sahāpatiḥ punareva brahmaloke samāropya pratiṣṭhāpayati sma caityārtham /
S04bsu022_u:153_0: tatra khalu bhagavān punarapi bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma - iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāsakukṣigatena bodhisattvena ṣaṭtriṃśannayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ triṣu yāneṣu paripācitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.23_0: bodhisattva agrasattva mātukukṣisaṃsthitaḥ prakampitā ca ṣaḍvikāra medinī sakānanā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.23_1: suvarṇavarṇa ābha mukta sarvāpāya śodhitā praharṣitāśca devasaṃgha dharmagañju bheṣyate /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.24_0: suṃsaṃsthito mahāvimānu naikaratnacitrito yatra vīru āruhitva tiṣṭhate vināyakaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.24_1: gandhottamena candanena pūrito virocate yasyaikakarṣu trisahasramūlyaratnapūrito //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.25_0: mahāsahasralokadhātu heṣvi bhindiyitvanā udāgato guṇākarasya padmaojabinduko /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.25_1: so saptarātra puṇyateja brahmaloki udgato gṛhītva brahma ojabindu bodhisattva nāmayī //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.26_0: na asti sarvasattvakāyi bhuktu yo jareya taṃ anyatra bhūri bodhisattva brahmakalpasaṃnibhe /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.26_1: anekakalpa puṇyateja ojabindu saṃsthito bhujitva sattva kāyacitta jñānaśuddha gacchiṣu //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.27_0: śakra brahma lokapāla pūjanāya nāyakaṃ trīṇi kāla āgamitva bodhisattvamantikam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.27_1: vandayitva pūjayitva dharma śṛṇute varaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ karitva sarva gacchiṣū yathāgatā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.29_0: ye ca iṣṭidārakāsu duḥkhitā tadā abhūt bhūtaspṛṣṭa kṣiptacitta nagna pāṃśumrakṣitā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.29_1: te ca sarva dṛṣṭva māya bhonti labdhacetanā smṛtīmatīgatīupeta gehi gehi gacchiṣu //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.30_0: vātato va pittato va śleṣmasaṃnipātakaiḥ ye ca cakṣuroga śrotraroga kāyacittapīḍitā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.30_1: naikarūpa naikajāti vyādhibhiśca ye hatā sthāpite sma māya mūrdhni pāṇi bhonti nirjarā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.31_0: athāpi vā tṛṇasya tūli bhūmito gṛhītvanā dadāti māya āturāṇa sarvi bhonti nirjarā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.31_1: saukhyaprāpti nirvikāra gehi gehi gacchiṣu bhaiṣajyabhūti vaidyarāji kukṣisaṃpratiṣṭhite //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.32_0: yasmi kāli māyadevi svātanuṃ nirīkṣate adṛśāti bodhisattva kukṣiye pratiṣṭhitam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.32_1: yathaiva candra antarīkṣa tārakai parīvṛtaṃ tathaiva nāthu bodhisattvalakṣaṇairalaṃkṛtam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.33_0: no ca tasya rāga doṣa naiva moha bādhate kāmachandu naiva tasya īrṣi naiva hiṃsitā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.33_1: tuṣṭacitta hṛṣṭacitta prīti saumanasthitā kṣudhāpipāsa śīta uṣṇa naiva tasya bādhate //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.34_0: aghaṭṭitāśca nityakāla divyatūrya vādiṣu pravarṣayanti divyapuṣpa gandhaśreṣṭha śobhanā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.34_1: deva paśyi mānuṣāśca mānuṣā amānuṣāṃ no viheṭhi no vihiṃsi tatra te parasyaram //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.35_0: ramanti sattva krīḍayanti annapānudenti ca ānandaśabda ghoṣayanti hṛṣṭatuṣṭamānasāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.35_1: kṣamā rajoanākulā ca kāli deva varṣate tṛṇāśca puṣpa oṣadhīya tasmi kāli rohiṣu //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.36_0: rājagehi saptarātra ratnavarṣa varṣito yato daridrasattva gṛhya dāna denti bhuñjate /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.36_1: nāsti sattva yo daridra yo ca āsi duḥkhito bherumūrdhni nandaneva eva sattva nandiṣu //
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.37_0: so ca rāju śākiyāna poṣadhī upoṣito rājyakāryu no karoti dharmameva gocarī /
S04bsu022_u:lal_6.37_1: tapovanaṃ ca so praviṣṭa māyādevī pṛcchate kīdṛśenti kāyi saukhya agrasattva dhārati //
S04bsu022_u:160_0: iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāseṣu nigateṣu bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye pratyupasthite rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhodyāne dvātriṃśatpūrvanimittāni prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:160_1: katamāni dvātriṃśat? sarvapuṣpāṇi suṅgībhūtāni na puṣpanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_2: puṣkariṇīṣu cotpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇyabhyudgatāni kuḍmalībhūtāni na puṣpanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_3: tadā ca puṣpaphalavṛkṣā dharaṇītalādabhyudgamya kṣārakajātā na phalanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_5: viṃśati ca ratnanidhānaśatasahasrāṇyutplatya vyavasthitāni dṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_8: himavatparvatapārśvācca siṃhapotakā āgatyāgatyābhinadantaḥ kapilāhvayapuravaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya dvāramūleṣvavatiṣṭhante sma,
S04bsu022_u:160_10: pañcaśatāni pāṇḍarāṇāṃ hastiśāvakānāmāgatya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāgrakaraiścaraṇāvabhilikhanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_11: mekhalībaddhakāśca devadārakā rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāntaḥpure utsaṅgenotsaṅgamanuparivartamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_12: gaganatalagatārdhakāyā nāgakanyā nānāpūjopakaraṇaparigṛhītā adhyālambamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_13: daśa ca nāgakanyāsahasrāṇi mayūrāṅgahastakaparigṛhītā gagatatale 'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_14: daśa ca pūrṇakumbhasahasrāṇi kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvanti saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_15: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi gandhodakabhṛṅgāraparigṛhītā mūrdhni dhārayantyo 'vasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_16: daśa ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi chatradhvajapatākāparigṛhītā avasthitāḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_17: bahūni cāpsaraḥśatasahasrāṇi śaṅkhabherīmṛdaṅgapaṇavaiḥ ghaṇṭāvasaktaiḥ pratīkṣamāṇānyavasthitāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_19: sarvanadī ca prasravaṇāni ca na vahanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_22: ratnajālaparisphuṭaṃ ca rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhaṃ saṃsthitamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:160_24: kūṭāgāraprāsādatoraṇadvārakataleṣu ca maṇiratnānyabhipralambamānāni ca saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_29: utkūlanikūlāśca pṛthivīpradeśāḥ samāḥ samavasthitāḥ sarvavīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakarathyāntarāpaṇamukhāni ca pāṇitalamṛṣṭānīva puṣpābhikīrṇāni virocante sma /
S04bsu022_u:160_31: sarvaśālavanadevatāśca patreṣvardhakāyānabhinirmāya namyamānāḥ sthitāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:161_1: atha khalu māyādevī bodhisattvasya janmakālasamayaṃ jñātvā bodhisattvasyaiva tejonubhāvena rātryāṃ prathame yāme rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramya gāthābhirabhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.1_0: deva śṛṇu hi mahyaṃ bhāṣato yaṃ mataṃ me aciraciracireṇā jāta udyānabuddhiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.1_1: yadi ca tava na roṣo naiva doṣo na mohaḥ kṣipramahu vrajeyā krīḍaudyānabhūmim //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.2_0: tvamiha tapasi khinno dharmacittaprayukto ahu ca cirapraviṣṭā śuddhasattvaṃ dharentī /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.2_1: drumavara pratibuddhāḥ phullitā śālavṛkṣāḥ yukta bhaviya devā gantumudyānabhūmim //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.3_0: ṛtupravara vasanto yoṣitāṃ maṇḍanīyo bhramaravaravighuṣṭāḥ kokilabarhigītāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.3_1: śuciruciravicitrā bhrāmyate puṣpareṇuḥ sādhu dadahi ājñāṃ gacchamo mā vilambaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.5_0: nīlagirinikāśāṃ meghavarṇānubaddhāṃ viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ gajānām /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.6_0: himarajatanikāśāṃ muñjakeśāṃ sukeśāṃ viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ hayānām /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.7_1: viṃśati ca sahasrān yojayadhvaṃ suśīghraṃ māya saparivārāṃ rakṣathā apramattā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.8_0: maṇikanakaniṣiktāṃ lumbinīṃ kārayadhvaṃ vividhavasanaratnaiḥ sarvavṛkṣāṃ pravethā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.8_1: vividhakusumacitraṃ nandanaṃ vā surāṇāṃ vadatha ca mama śīghraṃ sarvametaṃ vidhāya //
S04bsu022_u:162_0: vacanamimu niśamyā pāriṣadyaiḥ kṣaṇena vāhana kṛta sajjā lumbinī maṇḍitā sā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.9_0: jaya jaya hi narendrā āyu pālehi dīrghaṃ sarva kṛtu yathoktaṃ kāru deva pratīkṣa //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.10_0: so ca naravarendro hṛṣṭacitto bhavitvā gṛhavaramanuviṣṭo iṣṭikānevamāha /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.10_1: yasya ahu manāpo yā ca me prītikāmā sā mi kuruta ājñāṃ maṇḍayitvātmabhāvam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.11_0: varasurabhisugandhāṃ bhāvaraṅgāṃ vicitrāṃ vasana mṛdumanojñāṃ prāvṛṇothā udagrāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.11_1: urasi vigalitānāṃ muktahārā bhavethā ābharaṇavibhūṣāṃ darśayethādya sarvāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.12_1: bhūya kuruta harṣaṃ devakanyāna yūyaṃ śrutva madhuraghoṣaṃ devatāpi spṛheyuḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.13_0: ekarathavaresmiṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ māyadevī mā ca puruṣa istrī anya tatrāruheyā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.13_1: nāri vividhavarmā taṃ rathaṃ vāhayantāṃ mā ca pratikūlaṃ mā manāpaṃ śruṇeṣyā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.14_0: hayagajarathapattīṃ sainyaśrīmadvicitrāṃ dvāri sthita nṛpasyā śrūyate uccaghoṣāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.15_1: māya yada gṛhāto nirgatā dvāramūlaṃ ghaṇṭa śatasahasrā tāḍitā maṅgalārtham //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.16_0: so ca ratha vicitro maṇḍitaḥ pārthivena api ca marusahasrairdivyasiṃhāsanebhiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.16_1: caturi ratanavṛkṣā patrapuṣpopapetā abhinaditamanojñāṃ haṃsakrauñcān mayūrān //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.17_1: maruvadhu gaganesmiṃ taṃ rathaṃ prekṣayante divyamadhuraghoṣaṃ śrāvayantyaḥ stuvanti //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.18_0: upaviśati yadā sā māya siṃhāsanāgre pracalita trisahasrā medinī ṣaḍvikāram /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.18_1: puṣpa maru kṣipiṃsū ambarāṃ bhrāmayiṃsū adya jagati śreṣṭho jāyate lumbinīye //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.19_0: caturi jagatipālāstaṃ rathaṃ vāhayante tridaśapatirapīndro mārgaśuddhiṃ karoti /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.19_1: brahma puratu gacchī durjanāṃ vārayanto amaraśatasahasrāḥ prāñjalīkā namante //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.20_0: nṛpati muditacitto vīkṣate tāṃ viyūhāṃ tasya bhavati evaṃ vyakta yaṃ devadevo /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.20_1: yasya caturi pālā brahma sendrāśca devāḥ kuruta vipulapūjāṃ vyakta yaṃ śuddhabhāvī //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.21_0: nāsti tribhavi sattvo yaḥ sahetpūjametāṃ deva atha ca nāgāḥ śakra brahmā ca pālāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.21_1: mūrdha tada phaleyā jīvitaṃ cāsya naśyet ayu puna atidevaḥ sarvapūjāṃ sahāti //
S04bsu022_u:164_0_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo māyādevī caturaśītyā hayarathasahasraiḥ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaiḥ parivṛtā caturaśītyā gajarathasahasraiḥ
S04bsu022_u:164_0_2: ṣaṣṭyā ca śākyakanyāsahasraiḥ puraskṛtā catvāriṃśatā ca sahasrai [Vaidya_61] rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya jñātikulaprasūtaiḥ śākyaiḥ
S04bsu022_u:164_1: ṣaṣṭyā ca sahasrai rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyāntaḥpureṇa gītavādyasamyaktūryatāḍāvacarasaṃgītisaṃpravāditena parivṛtā,
S04bsu022_u:164_3_0: caturaśītyā ca nāgakanyāsahasraiḥ caturaśītyā ca gandharvakanyāsahasraiḥ caturaśītyā ca kinnarakanyāsahasraiḥ caturaśītyā
S04bsu022_u:164_5: sarvavṛkṣāśca tasmin vanavare akālapatrapuṣpaphalāni dadanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:164_6: devaiśca tathā tadvanaṃ samalaṃkṛtamabhūt tadyathāpi nāma miśrakāvanaṃ devānāṃ samalaṃkṛtam /
S04bsu022_u:165_0_0: atha khalu māyādevī lumbinīvanamanupraviśya tasmādrathavarādavatīrya naramarukanyāparivṛtā vṛkṣeṇa vṛkṣaṃ paryaṭantī vanādvanaṃ
S04bsu022_u:165_0_1: caṃkramyamāṇā drumād drumaṃ nirīkṣamāṇā anupūrveṇa yenāsau plakṣo mahādrumaratnavarapravaraḥ suvibhaktaśākhaḥ samapatramañjarīdharo
S04bsu022_u:165_0_4: kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśe dharaṇītale saṃsthitaḥ pūrvajinajanetryābhinivāsitaḥ devasaṃgītyanugītaḥ śubhavimalaviśuddhaḥ śuddhāvāsadevaśatasahasraiḥ
S04bsu022_u:166_0: atha sa plakṣavṛkṣo bodhisattvasya tejonubhāvenāvanamya praṇamati sma /
S04bsu022_u:166_1: atha māyādevī gaganatalagateva vidyut dṛṣṭiṃ dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya plakṣaśākhāṃ gṛhītvā salīlaṃ gaganatalaṃ prekṣamāṇā vijṛmbhamānā sthitābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:166_2: atha tasmin samaye ṣaṣṭyapsaraḥśatasahasrāṇi kāmāvacaradevebhya upasaṃkramya māyādevyā upasthāne paricaryāṃ kurvanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:167_0: evaṃrūpeṇa khalu puna ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato 'sthāt /
S04bsu022_u:167_1: sa paripūrṇānāṃ daśānāṃ māsānāmatyayena māturdakṣiṇapārśvānniṣkramati sma smṛtaḥ saṃprajānannanupalipto garbhamalairyathā nānyaḥ kaściducyate 'nyeṣāṃ garbhamala iti /
S04bsu022_u:168_0: tasmin khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samaye śakro devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāpatiḥ purataḥ sthitāvabhūtām,
S04bsu022_u:168_1: yau bodhisattvaṃ paramagauravajātau divyakāśikavastrāntaritaṃ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaiḥ smṛtau saṃprajñau pratigṛhṇāte sma /
S04bsu022_u:169_1: taṃ brahmā sahāpatirbrahmakāyikāśca devaputrā abhyutkṣipya brahmalokaṃ caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ copanāmayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:169_3: atha tahi bodhisattvaṃ devatāḥ prathamataraṃ pratigṛhṇanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:170_1: samanantarāvatīrṇasya ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāpṛthivīṃ bhittvā mahāpadmaṃ prādurabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:170_2: nandopanandau ca nāgarājānau gaganatale 'rdhakāyau [Vaidya_62] sthitvā śītoṣṇe dve vāridhāre 'bhinirbhiṃttvā bodhisattvaṃ snāpayataḥ sma /
S04bsu022_u:170_3: śakrabrahmalokapālāḥ pūrvaṃgamāścānye ca bahavo devaputrāḥ śatasahasrā ye bodhisattvaṃ jātamātraṃ nānāgandhodakamuktakusumaiḥ snāpayantyabhyavakiranti sma /
S04bsu022_u:170_4: antarikṣe ca dve cāmare ratnacchatraṃ ca prādurbhūtam /
S04bsu022_u:170_5: sa tasmin mahāpadme sthitvā caturdiśamavalokayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:171_0_0: tasmin khalu punaḥ samaye bodhisattvaḥ pūrvakuśalamūlavipākajenāpratihatena divyacakṣuprādurbhūtena divyena cakṣuṣā sarvāvantaṃ
S04bsu022_u:171_0_1: trisāhastraṃ mahāsāhastraṃ lokadhātuṃ sanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṃ sadevamānuṣaṃ paśyati sma /
S04bsu022_u:171_1: sarvasattvānāṃ ca cittacaritaṃ ca prajānāti sma /
S04bsu022_u:171_2: jñātvā ca vyavalokayati sma - asti tvasau kaścitsattvo yo mayā sadṛśaḥ śīlena vā samādhinā vā prajñayā vā kuśalamūlacaryayā vā /
S04bsu022_u:171_3: yadā ca bodhisattvaḥ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau na kaṃcitsattvamātmatulyaṃ paśyati sma,
S04bsu022_u:171_4_0: atha tasminsamaye bodhisattvaḥ siṃha iva vigatabhayabhairavo 'saṃtrastaḥ astambhī sucintitaṃ smṛtvā cintayitvā sarvasattvānāṃ
S04bsu022_u:171_4_1: cittacaritāni jñātvā aparigṛhīto bodhisattvaḥ pūrvāṃ diśamabhimukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrāntaḥ - pūrvaṃgamo bhaviṣyāmi sarveṣāṃ
S04bsu022_u:171_5: tasya prakramata uparyantarīkṣe 'parigṛhītaṃ divyaśvetavipulachatraṃ cāmaraśubhe gacchantamanugacchanti sma - yatra yatra ca bodhisattvaḥ padamutkṣipati sma,
S04bsu022_u:171_7: dakṣiṇāṃ diśamabhimukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrāntaḥ - dakṣiṇīyo bhaviṣyāmi devamanuṣyāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:171_9: saptame sthitvā siṃha ivāhlādanātmikāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate sma - ahaṃ loke jyeṣṭho 'haṃ loke śreṣṭhaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:171_10: iyaṃ me paścimā jātiḥ / kariṣyāmi jātijarāmaraṇaduḥkhasyāntam /
S04bsu022_u:171_11: uttarāṃ diśamabhimukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrāntaḥ - anuttaro bhaviṣyāmi sarvasattvānām /
S04bsu022_u:171_12: adhastāddiśamabhimukhaḥ sapta padāni prakrāntaḥ - nihaniṣyāmi māraṃ ca mārasenāṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:171_13: sarvanairayikāṇāṃ ca nirayāgnipratighātāya saha dharmameghavṛṣṭiṃ varṣiṣyāmi,
S04bsu022_u:171_16: urdhvaṃ cāvalokayati sma - ullokanīyo bhaviṣyāmi sarvasattvānām /
S04bsu022_u:171_18: atha tasmin samaye ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ svareṇābhivijñāpto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:172_2: tadā asyemānyevaṃrūpāṇi ṛddhiprātihāryāṇi bhavanti - tasmin khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samaye saṃhṛṣitaromakūpajātāḥ sarvasattvā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:172_3: mahataśca pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvo 'bhūt bhairavasya romaharṣaṇasya /
S04bsu022_u:172_5: sarvartukālikāśca [Vaidya_63] vṛkṣāstasmin samaye trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau saṃkusumitāḥ phalitāśca /
S04bsu022_u:172_7: apagatameghācca gaganācchanaiḥ sūkṣmasūkṣmo devaḥ pravarṣati sma /
S04bsu022_u:172_12: paramasukhasaṃsparśayā ca sarvasattvakāyacittasukhasaṃjananyā lokottarayā anekaśatasahasravarṇaprabhayā sarvatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ parisphuṭo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:172_23: āvīcimādiṃ kṛtvā sarvanairayikāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvakāraṇād duḥkhaṃ tasminsamaye prasrabdham /
S04bsu022_u:173_0: yadā ca bodhisattvo jātamātraḥ sapta padāni prakrānto 'bhūt,
S04bsu022_u:173_3: tāvanmahābalavegasamanvāgato hi bhikṣavo jātamātro bodhisattvaḥ sapta padāni prakrānto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:173_4: sarvalokāntarikāśca tasmin samaye mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:174_0_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandaḥ utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ
S04bsu022_u:174_3: eṣo 'haṃ bhagavaṃścatuṣpañcakṛtvo 'pi daśakṛtvo 'pi yāvatpañcāśatkṛtvo 'pi śatakṛtvo 'pi yāvadanekaśatasahasraśo 'pyahaṃ bhagavan buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi /
S04bsu022_u:175_1_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - bhaviṣyanti khalu punarānanda anāgate 'dhvani kecidbhikṣavo 'bhāvitakāyā abhāvitacittā
S04bsu022_u:175_1_1: abhāvitaśīlā abhāvitaprajñā bālā apaṇḍitā ābhimānikā uddhatā unnatā asaṃvṛtā vikṣiptacittāḥ kāṅkṣāparīttā vicikitsābahulā
S04bsu022_u:175_2: te na śraddāsyanti imāmevaṃrūpāṃ bodhisattvasya garbhāvakrāntipariśuddhim /
S04bsu022_u:175_3: te 'nyonyamekānte saṃnipātyaivaṃ vakṣyanti - paśyata bho yūyametadapūjyamānaṃ bodhisattvasya kila mātuḥ kukṣigatasyoccāraprasrāvamaṇḍoparimiśrasya īdṛśī vibhūtirāsīt /
S04bsu022_u:175_4: sa ca kila abhiniṣkrāman māturdakṣiṇāyāḥ kukṣeranupalipto garbhamalenābhūditi /
S04bsu022_u:175_5: kathametadyojyate? na punaste mohapuruṣā evaṃ jñāsyanti - na sukṛtakarmaṇāṃ sattvānāmuccāraprasrāvamaṇḍe kāyaḥ saṃbhavatīti /
S04bsu022_u:175_7: garbhāvasthitaśca sattvānukampayā hi bodhisattvo manuṣyaloke upapadyate,
S04bsu022_u:175_11: vayaṃ tu manuṣyamātrāḥ / na vayaṃ samarthāstatsthānaṃ paripūrayitumiti kausīdyamāpadyeran /
S04bsu022_u:175_12: na khalu punasteṣāṃ mohapuruṣāṇāṃ dharmastainyakānāmevaṃ bhaviṣyati - acintyo hi sa sattvaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:175_14: api tu khalvānanda buddhaṛddhiprātihāryamapi te tasmin kāle nāvakalpayiṣyanti,
S04bsu022_u:175_16: paśya ānanda kiyantaṃ te mohapuruṣā bahvapuṇyābhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskariṣyanti,
S04bsu022_u:175_17: ye buddhadharmān pratikṣepsyanti lābhasatkāraślokābhibhūtā uccāralagnā lābhasatkārābhibhūtā itarajātīyāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:176_0: ānanda āha - mā maivaṃrūpā bhagavan anāgate 'dhvani bhikṣavo bhaviṣyanti ya imāmevaṃ bhadrikāṃ sūtrāntāṃ pratikṣepsyanti pratipakṣaṃ pakṣanti ca /
S04bsu022_u:177_0: bhagavānāha - evaṃrūpāśca te ānanda sūtrāntāṃ prapikṣepsyanti,
S04bsu022_u:178_0: ānanda āha - kā punarbhagavan teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāmasatpuruṣāṇāṃ gatirbhaviṣyati? ko 'bhisaṃparāyaḥ?
S04bsu022_u:179_0: bhagavānāha - yā gatirbuddhabodhimantardhāyāpyatītānāgatapratyutpannāṃśca buddhān bhagavato 'tyākhyāya tāṃ te gatiṃ gamiṣyanti /
S04bsu022_u:180_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandaḥ saṃharṣitaromakūpajāto namo buddhāya ityuktvā bhagavantametadavocatmūrchā me bhagavan kāyasyābhūdimaṃ teṣāmasatpuruṣāṇāṃ samudācāraṃ śrutvā /
S04bsu022_u:181_3: te tena viṣamena samudācāreṇavīcau mahānarake prapatiṣyanti /
S04bsu022_u:181_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? ye kecidānanda bhikṣavo vā bhikṣuṇyo vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntān śrutvā nādhimokṣyanti na śraddhāsyanti na prativetsyanti,
S04bsu022_u:181_5: te cyutāḥ samānā avīcau mahānarake prapatiṣyanti /
S04bsu022_u:181_7: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? aprameyo hyānanda tathāgato gambhīro vipulo duravagāhaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:181_10: amoghaṃ ca teṣāṃ jīvitam, amoghaṃ ca teṣāṃ mānuṣyam, sucaritacaraṇāśca te, ādattaṃ ca taiḥ sāram, muktāśca te tribhyo 'pāyebhyaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:181_15: prasannāśca te 'grasattvaiḥ, saṃchinnāstairmārapāśāḥ, nistīrṇaśca taiḥ saṃsārāṭavīkāntāraḥ,
S04bsu022_u:181_19: dakṣiṇīyāśca te pūjārhāḥ, durlabhaprādurbhāvāśca te loke,
S04bsu022_u:181_21: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi - te sarvaloke imamevaṃ sarvalokavipratyanīkaṃ tathāgatadharmaṃ śraddadhanti /
S04bsu022_u:181_22: na te ānanda sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhavanti /
S04bsu022_u:181_23: te cānanda sattvā mamaikajātipratibaddhāni mitrāṇi bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu022_u:181_24: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? kaścidānanda śravaṇādeva priyo bhavati manāpaśca na tu darśanena /
S04bsu022_u:181_25: kaścidānanda darśanenāpi priyo bhavati manāpaśca na tu khalu punaḥ śravaṇena /
S04bsu022_u:181_26: kaścidānanda darśanenāpi śravaṇenāpi priyo bhavati manāpaśca /
S04bsu022_u:181_27: teṣāṃ keṣāṃcidānanda ahaṃ darśanena vā śravaṇena vā priyo manāpo bhaveyaṃ niṣṭhāṃ tvaṃ tatra gacchethāḥ - na tāni mamaikajātipratibaddhāni mitrāṇi /
S04bsu022_u:181_28: dṛṣṭāste tathāgatena, mocayitavyāste tathāgatena, te samaguṇapratyaṃśāḥ, te tathāgataguṇapratyaṃśāḥ, te tathāgatena kartavyā upāsakāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:181_29: te tathāgataṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ, upāttāste tathāgatena / mamāntikāt khalvapyānanda pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāmeva tāvaccarato ye kecidbhayārditāḥ sattvā āgatya abhayaṃ pratiyācante sma,
S04bsu022_u:181_33: idaṃ tathāgato vijñāpayati / yadānanda tathāgatena yuṣmākaṃ karaṇīyaṃ kṛtam,
S04bsu022_u:181_36: gatvā ca sukhitā bhavanti adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ mitraṃ dṛṣṭvā /
S04bsu022_u:181_37: kaḥ punarvādo ye māṃ niśritya kuśalamūlānyavaropayanti /
S04bsu022_u:181_38: jñāsyantyānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ - pūrva mitrāṇyete sattvāstathāgatānām,
S04bsu022_u:181_40: tatkasmāt khalu punarānanda mitraṃ mitrasya priyaṃ ca manāpaṃ ca bhavati? tasyāpi (tadapi) priyameva bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:181_41: mitrasya yatpriyaṃ mitram, tadapi priyameva bhavati manāpaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:181_45: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda kasyacideva puruṣasyaikaputrako bhavet suvayāḥ pradakṣiṇagrāhī /
S04bsu022_u:181_47: sa tasmin pitari kālagate na hi vihanyeta pitṛmitrasuparigṛhītaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:181_48: evabheva ānanda ye kecinmama śraddhāsyanti tānahamupādadāmi /
S04bsu022_u:181_49: mitrāṇīva mama tāni / (te) mama śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ / bahumitraśca tathāgataḥ / tāni ca tathāgatasya mitrāṇi bhūtavādīni na mṛṣāvādīni /
S04bsu022_u:182_0: iti hi jāte bodhisattve gaganatalagatānyapsaraḥkoṭinayutaśatasahasrāṇi divyaiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanavastrābharaṇairmāyādevīmabhyavakiranti sma /
S04bsu022_u:182_3: tasmi kṣaṇi upetya tāṃ lumbinīṃ māyadevyabruvan
S04bsu022_u:182_4: mā khu jani viṣādu tuṣṭā bhavopasthāyikāṣte vayam //
S04bsu022_u:182_5: bhaṇahi kiṃ karaṇīyu kiṃ kurmahe kena kāryaṃ ca te
S04bsu022_u:182_7: api ca bhava udagra harṣānvitā mā ca khedaṃ janehi
S04bsu022_u:182_8: jarāmaraṇavighāti vaidyottamaṃ adya devī janeṣī laghum //
S04bsu022_u:182_9: yatha druma pariphulla saṃpuṣpitā śālavṛkṣā ime
S04bsu022_u:182_10: yatha ca marusahasra pārśve sthitā bhrāmayanto bhujān /
S04bsu022_u:182_11: yatha ca cali sasāgarā medinī ṣaḍvikārā iyaṃ
S04bsu022_u:182_12: divi divi ca vighuṣṭa lokottaraṃ tvaṃ janeṣī sutam //
S04bsu022_u:182_13: yatha ca prabha viśuddha vibhrājate svarṇavarṇa śubhā
S04bsu022_u:182_15: yatha ca śatasahasra śuddhā śubhā vītarāgāḥ surā
S04bsu022_u:182_16: namiṣu muditacittā adyo jane sarvaloke hitam //
S04bsu022_u:182_17: śakramapi ca brahmapālāpi cānyā ca yā devatā
S04bsu022_u:183_1: śakramapi ca brahma tau pāṇibhiḥ saṃpratīcchā muniṃ
S04bsu022_u:183_2: kṣetra śatasahasra saṃkampitā ābha muktā śubhā /
S04bsu022_u:183_3: api ca triṣu apāyi sattvā sukhī nāsti duḥkhaṃ puna
S04bsu022_u:183_6: padmu ruciracitru abhyudgato yatra (cakrāṅgacitrebhiḥ) padbhyāṃ sthito ('pi) nāyakaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:183_7: sapta pada kramitva brahmasvaro muñci ghoṣottamaṃ
S04bsu022_u:183_11: api ca uragarājā śītoṣṇa dve vāridhāre śubhe (vyamuñcatāntarīkṣe sthitāḥ)
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.31_0: prabhā ca rucirā muktā apāyāśca viśodhitāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.32_1: krama sapta padāṃ vīraḥ kramate balavīryavān //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.33_0: pādau nikṣipate yatra bhūmau padmavarāḥ śubhāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.35_0: vyavalokayitvā ca viśārado diśaḥ tato girāṃ muñcati arthayuktām /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.35_1: jyeṣṭho 'haṃ sarvalokasya śraṣṭho (loke vināyakaḥ) iyaṃ ca jātirmama paścimā (iti) //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.36_0: hāsyaṃ ca muktaṃ naranāyakena salokapālairmarubhiśca sendraiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.37_0: api coragendraiḥ sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ gandhogradhārāvisaraiḥ snapiṃsu /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.37_1: anye 'pi devā nayutā (sthitāḥ) 'ntarīkṣe snapiṃsu gandhāgrajine svayaṃbhum //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.38_0: śvetaṃ ca vipulaṃ chatraṃ cāmarāṃśca śubhāmbarān /
S04bsu022_u:184_2: vṛddhi vipula jātu devā suto bhūṣito lakṣaṇaiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:184_4: na ca bhavi pratiśatru jambudhvaje ekachatro bhavet //
S04bsu022_u:184_5: dvitiyu puruṣu gatva (rājñi) śuddhodane śleṣayitvā krame
S04bsu022_u:184_6: vṛddhi vipula deva jātā nṛpe śākiyānāṃ kule /
S04bsu022_u:184_8: sarvi balaupeta nagnāḥ samā duṣpradharṣā paraiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:184_9: aparu puruṣa āha devā śruṇā nandaśabdaṃ mamā
S04bsu022_u:184_11: api ca daśasahasra jātā hayāḥ kaṇṭhakasya sakhā
S04bsu022_u:184_14: nṛpati kramatalebhi cānvākramī sādhu devā jayā /
S04bsu022_u:184_15: ājñā khalu dadāhi gacchāma kiṃ vā karomo nṛpā
S04bsu022_u:184_16: tvamiha vaśitu prāptu bhṛtyā vayaṃ bhaṭṭa devā jayā //
S04bsu022_u:184_20: iyamapi suti devadevottame vṛddhi rājño gṛhe //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.44_0: naramarutasahasra ye harṣitā dṛṣṭva jāte guṇāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.44_1: bodhivara aśoka saṃprasthitāḥ kṣipra bhomā jināḥ //
S04bsu022_u:187_0: iti hi bhikṣavo jāte bodhisattve tatkṣaṇaṃ dānanisargaḥ punaruttari pravartate sma /
S04bsu022_u:187_5: pañca kareṇusahasrāṇi pañca piṅgasahasrāṇi prasūyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:187_6: tāni sarvāṇi rājñā śuddhodanena pustavaropitāni kumārasya krīḍārthaṃ dattānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:188_0_0: caturṇāṃ ca dvīpakoṭīśatasahasrāṇāṃ madhye pṛthivīpradeśe aśvatthayaṣṭiḥ prādurabhūdantardvīpe ca candanavanaṃ prādurbabhūva
S04bsu022_u:188_2: pañca ca nidhānasahasrāṇi dharaṇītalādutplutya mukhaṃ darśayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:188_3: iti hi ye kecidrājñaḥ śuddhodanasyārthābhipretā abhūvan,
S04bsu022_u:189_0: tato rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhūt - kimahaṃ kumārasya nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
S04bsu022_u:189_1: tato 'syaitadabhūt - asya hi jātamātreṇa mama sarvārthāḥ saṃsiddhāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:189_3: tato rājā bodhisattvaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkṛtya sarvārthasiddho 'yaṃ kumāro nāmnā bhavatu iti nāmāsyākārṣīt /
S04bsu022_u:190_0: iti hi bhikṣavo jāte bodhisattve mātuḥ kukṣipārśvamakṣatamanupahatamabhavadyathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
S04bsu022_u:190_2: pañcāpsaraḥ - sahasrāṇi divyagandhaparivāsitatailaparigṛhītāni bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:190_3: pañcāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyānulepanaparigṛhītāni bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:190_4: pañcāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyagandhodakaparipūrṇaghaṭāparigṛhītāni bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:190_5: paccāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyānulepanaparigṛhītani bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:190_6: pañcāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyadārakācīvaraparigṛhītāni bodhisatvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujārajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:190_7: pañcāpsaraḥ - sahasrāṇi divyadārakābharaṇaparigṛhītāni bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:190_8: pañcāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi divyatūryasaṃgītisaṃprabhaṇitena bodhisattvamātaramupasaṃkramya sujātajāte tāmaklāntakāyatāṃ ca paripṛcchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:190_9: yāvantaśceha jambudvīpe bāhyāḥ pañcabhijñā ṛṣayaste sarve gaganatalenāgatya rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya purataḥ sthitvā jayavṛddhiśabdamanuśrāvayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:191_0: iti hi bhikṣavo jātamātro bodhisattvaḥ saptarātraḥ lumbinīvane divyamānuṣyakaistūryatālāvacaraiḥ satkriyate sma,
S04bsu022_u:191_1: gurukriyate sma, mānyate sma, pūjyate sma, khādyabhojyasvādanīyāni [Vaidya_70] viśrāṇyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:191_3: dānāni ca dadanti sma, puṇyāni ca kurvanti sma / dvātriṃśacca brāhmaṇaśatasahasrāṇi dine dine saṃtarpyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:191_5: śakraśca devānāmindro brahmā ca tasyāṃ brāhmaṇaparṣadi māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāyāgrāsane niṣadyemāṃ maṅgalyāṃ gāthāmabhyabhāṣatām -
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.45_0: apāyāśca yathā śāntā sukhī sarvaṃ yathā jagat /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.45_1: dhruvaṃ sukhāvaho jātaḥ sukhe sthāpayitā jagat //
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.48_0: na bādhante yathā kleśā jātaṃ maitrajanaṃ jagat /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.49_0: yathā saṃpuṣpitāḥ śālā medinī ca samā sthitā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.53_0: yathā ca manujā devān devāḥ paśyanti mānuṣān /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.54_0: yathā ca jvalanaḥ śāntaḥ sarvā nadyaśca visthitāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.54_1: sūkṣmaṃ ca kampate bhūmiḥ bhavitā tattvadarśakaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:193_0: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptarātrajātasya bodhisattvasya mātā māyādevī kālamakarot /
S04bsu022_u:193_2: syāt khalu punarbhikṣavo yuṣmākamevaṃ bodhisattvāparādhena māyādevī kālagateti? na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu022_u:193_3: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? etat paramaṃ hi tasyā āyuṣpramāṇamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:193_4: atītānāmapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvānāṃ saptarātrajātānāṃ janetryaḥ kālamakurvanta /
S04bsu022_u:193_5: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? vivṛddhasya hi bodhisattvasya paripūrṇendriyasyābhiniṣkrāmato māturhṛdayaṃ sphuṭet /
S04bsu022_u:194_1: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase yādṛśenaiva vyūhena māyādevī kapilavastuno mahānagarādudyānabhūmimabhiniṣkrāntābhūt,
S04bsu022_u:194_2: tataḥ koṭīśatasahasraguṇottareṇa mahāvyūhena bodhisattvaḥ kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ prāvikṣat /
S04bsu022_u:194_3: tasya ca praviśataḥ pañca pūrṇakumbhasahasrāṇi gandhodakaparipūrṇāni purato nīyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:194_4: evaṃ pañcakanyāsahasrāṇi mayūrahastakamparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:194_5: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi tālavṛkṣakaparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:194_6: pañca sa kanyāsahasrāṇi gandhodakabhṛṅgāraparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:194_7: mārgamavasiñcanti sma / pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi vicitrapaṭalakaparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:194_8: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi navavicitrapralambanamālāparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:194_9: pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi ratnabhadrālaṃkāraparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:194_10: mārgaṃ śodhayanti sma / pañca ca kanyāsahasrāṇi bhadrāsanaparigṛhītāni purato gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:194_11: pañca ca brāhmaṇasahasrāṇi ghaṇṭāparigṛhītāni māṅgalyaśabdaṃ śrāvayantaḥ purato gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:194_12: viṃśati nāgasahasrāṇi sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāni purato gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:194_13: viṃśati hayasahasrāṇi suvarṇālaṃkārasaṃchannāni sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāni purato gacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:194_15: cattvāriṃśatpadātisahasrāṇi śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgurūpiṇāṃ saṃnaddhadṛḍhavarmakavacānāṃ bodhisattvaṃ gacchantamanugacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:194_16: gaganatalagatāni cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyānyabhijñātāni kāmāvacarāṇāṃ rūpāvacaradevaputrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi nānāprakrāramanekavyūhairbodhisattvasya pūjāṃ kurvanto 'nugacchanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:194_19: viṃśati ca devakanyāsahasrāṇi sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitāni ratnasūtraparigṛhītāni taṃ rathaṃ vahanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:194_20: dvayoścāpsarasormadhye ekā mānuṣī kanyā dvayormānuṣīkanyayormadhye ekāpsarā /
S04bsu022_u:194_22: na ca mānuṣā apsarasāṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā pramādamāpadyante sma yadidaṃ bodhisattvasya tejonubhāvena /
S04bsu022_u:195_0: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ kapilāhvaye puravare sarvārthasiddhāya pañcamātraiḥ śākyaśataiḥ pañcagṛhaśatāni nirmāpitānyabhūvan bodhisattvamuddiśya /
S04bsu022_u:195_1: te bodhisattvaṃ nagaraṃ praviśantaṃ svasvagṛhadvāramūle sthitvā kṛtāñjalipuṭā abhinatakāyāḥ sagauravā evamāhuḥ - iha bhoḥ sarvārthasiddha praviśa /
S04bsu022_u:195_2: iha bho devātideva praviśa / iha bhoḥ śuddhasattva praviśa /
S04bsu022_u:195_7: iha bho asamasama praviśa / iha bho asadṛśaguṇatejodhara lakṣaṇānuvyañjanasvalaṃkṛtakāya praviśeti /
S04bsu022_u:195_8: tataścopādāya kumārasyeha sarvārthasiddhaḥ sarvārthasiddha iti saṃjñāmagamat /
S04bsu022_u:196_0: tatra rājā śuddhodanasteṣāṃ sarveṣāmanuvartanārthaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sarvagṛheṣu praveśya caturṇāṃ māsānāmatyayādbodhisattvaṃ svagṛhe praveśayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:196_1: tatra ca nānāratnavyūho nāma [Vaidya_72] mahāprāsādastaṃ bodhisattvaḥ samārūḍho 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:196_2_0: tatra te bṛddhavṛddhāḥ śākyāḥ saṃnipatyaivaṃ mataṃ cārayanti sma - kā nu khalu samarthā bodhisattvaṃ gopāyituṃ kelayituṃ
S04bsu022_u:196_2_1: mamāyituṃ hitacittatayā maitracittatayā guṇacittatayā saumyacittatayā ceti /
S04bsu022_u:196_5: tatra mahallakamahallikāḥ śākyā evamāhuḥ - sarvā etā vadhūkā navā dahnāstaruṇyaḥ rūpayauvanamadamattāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:196_7: atha ca punariyaṃ mahāprajāpatī gautamī kumārasya mātṛsvasā /
S04bsu022_u:196_10: iti hi te sarve samagrā bhūtvā mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīmutsāhayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:196_11: iti hi mahāprajāpatī gautamī kumāraṃ saṃvardhayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:196_12: tatra bodhisattvasyārthe dvātriṃśaddhātryaḥ saṃsthāpitā abhuvan aṣṭāvaṅgadhātryaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:197_0: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ sarvaṃ śākyagaṇaṃ saṃnipātyaivaṃ mīmāṃsate sma - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ kumāro rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī,
S04bsu022_u:198_0: tena ca samayena himavataḥ parvatarājasya pārśve asito nāma maharṣiḥ prativasati sma pañcābhijñaḥ sārdhaṃ naradattena bhāgineyena /
S04bsu022_u:198_2: gaganatalagatāṃśca devaputrān buddhaśabdamanuśrāvayato 'mbarāṇi ca bhrāmayata itastataḥ pramuditān bhramato 'drākṣīt /
S04bsu022_u:198_4_0: sa divyena cakṣuṣā sarvaṃ jambudvīpamanuvilokayannadrākṣīt kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhe kumāraṃ jātaṃ
S04bsu022_u:198_5: dṛṣṭvā ca punarnaradattaṃ māṇavakamāmantrayate sma - yat khalu māṇavaka jānīyā jambudvīpe mahāratnamutpannam /
S04bsu022_u:198_6: kapilavastuni mahānagare rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhe kumāro jātaḥ śatapuṇyatejastejitaḥ sarvalokamahito dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:198_8: rājā bhaviṣyati caturaṅgaścakravartī vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājo jānapadasthāmavīryaprāptaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:198_10: tadyathā - cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
S04bsu022_u:198_11: evaṃ saptaratnasaṃpūrṇaśca / asya putrasahasraṃ bhaviṣyati śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
S04bsu022_u:198_12: sa imaṃ mahāpṛthivīmaṇḍalaṃ samudraparikhamadaṇḍenāśastreṇa svena (dharmeṇa) balenābhibhūyābhinirjitya rājyaṃ kariṣyatyaiśvaryādhipatyena /
S04bsu022_u:198_14: tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddho netā ananyaneyaḥ śāstā loke saṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:199_0: atha khalvasito maharṣiḥ sārdhaṃ naradattena bhāgineyena rājahaṃsa iva gaganatalādabhyudgamya samutplutya yena kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:199_1: upasaṃkramya ṛddhiṃ pratisaṃhṛtya padbhyāmeva kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ praviśya yena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:200_1: iti hi bhikṣavo 'sito maharṣiḥ paśyati sma rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhadvāre 'nekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni /
S04bsu022_u:200_2: atha khalvasito maharṣirdauvārikamupasaṃkramyaivamāha - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya,
S04bsu022_u:200_4: parameti dauvāriko 'sitasya maharṣeḥ pratiśrutya yena rājā śuddhodanastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:200_5: upasaṃkramya kṛtāñjalipuṭo rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha - yat khalu deva jānīyā ṛṣirjīrṇo vṛddho mahallako dvāre sthitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:200_6: evaṃ ca vadati - rājānamahaṃ draṣṭukāma iti /
S04bsu022_u:200_7: atha rājā śuddhodano 'sitasya maharṣerāsanaṃ prajñāpya taṃ puruṣamevamāha - praviśatu ṛṣiriti /
S04bsu022_u:200_8: atha sa puruṣo rājakulānniṣkramyāsitaṃ maharṣimevamāha - praviśeti /
S04bsu022_u:201_1: upasaṃkramya purataḥ sthitvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha - jaya jaya mahārāja,
S04bsu022_u:202_0: atha sa rājā śuddhodano 'sitasya maharṣerarghapādyamarcanaṃ ca kṛtvā sādhu suṣṭhu ca parigṛhya āsanenopanimantrayate sma /
S04bsu022_u:202_1: sukhopaviṣṭaṃ cainaṃ jñātvā sagauravaḥ supratīta evamāha - na smarāmyahaṃ tava ṛṣe darśanam /
S04bsu022_u:203_0: evamukte 'sito maharṣī rājānaṃ śuddhodanametadavocat - putraste mahārāja jātastamahaṃ draṣṭukāma ihāgata iti /
S04bsu022_u:204_0: rājā āha - svapiti maharṣe kumāraḥ / muhūrtamāgamaya yāvadutthāsyatīti //
S04bsu022_u:205_0: ṛṣiravocat - na mahārāja tādṛśā mahāpuruṣāściraṃ svapanti /
S04bsu022_u:206_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhasattvo 'sitasya maharṣeranukampayā jāgaraṇanimittamakarot /
S04bsu022_u:206_1: atha khalu rājā śuddhodanaḥ sarvārthasiddhaṃ kumāramubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānuparigṛhya asitasya maharṣerantikamupanāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:207_0_0: iti hi asito maharṣirbodhisattvamavalokya dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatamaśītyanuvyañjanasuvicitragātraṃ śakrabrahmalokapālātirekavapuṣaṃ
S04bsu022_u:207_0_1: dinakaraśatasahasrātirekatejasaṃ sarvāṅgasundaraṃ dṛṣṭvā codānamudānayati sma - āścaryapudgalo batāyaṃ loke prādurbhūta,
S04bsu022_u:207_1_0: mahāścaryapudgalo batāyaṃ loke prādurbhūtaḥ ityutthāyāsanātkṛtāñjalipuṭo bodhisattvasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
S04bsu022_u:207_2: so 'drākṣīdbodhisattvasya dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni yaiḥ samanvāgatasya puruṣapudgalasya dve gatī bhavato nānyā /
S04bsu022_u:207_4: sacetpunaragārādanagārikāṃ pravrajati tathāgato bhaviṣyati vighuṣṭaśabdaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:207_5: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā prārodīdaśrūṇi ca pravartayan gambhīraṃ ca niśvasati sma /
S04bsu022_u:208_1: adrākṣīdrājā śuddhodano 'sitaṃ maharṣiṃ rudantamaśrūṇi ca pravartayamānaṃ gambhīraṃ ca niśvasantam /
S04bsu022_u:208_2_0: dṛṣṭvā ca saṃharṣitaromakūpajātastvaritatvaritaṃ dīnamanā asitaṃ maharṣimetadavocat - kimidamṛṣe rodasi aśrūṇi ca pravartayasi
S04bsu022_u:208_2_1: gambhīraṃ ca niśvasasi? mā khalu kumārasya kācidvipratipattiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:209_0: evamukte 'sito maharṣī rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha - nāhaṃ mahārāja kumārasyārthena rodimi,
S04bsu022_u:209_2: kiṃ tvātmānamahaṃ rodimi / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? ahaṃ ca mahārāja jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:209_4: abhisaṃbudhya cānuttaraṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati apravartitaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā anyena vā punaḥ kenacilloke sahadharmeṇa /
S04bsu022_u:209_5: sadevakasya lokasya hitāya sukhāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇam /
S04bsu022_u:209_6: svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ sattvānāṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyati /
S04bsu022_u:209_7: asmāttaṃ dharmaṃ śratvā jātidharmāṇaḥ sattvā jātyā parimokṣante /
S04bsu022_u:209_15: evameva mahārāja kadācitkarhicidbahubhiḥ kalpakoṭinayutairbuddhā bhagavanto loke utpadyante /
S04bsu022_u:209_19: vayaṃ ca taṃ buddharatnaṃ na drakṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:209_20: ityeva tadahaṃ mahārāja rodimi paridīnamanā dīrghaṃ ca niśvasāmi yadahamimaṃ nārogye 'pi rādhayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu022_u:210_0: yathā hyasmākaṃ mahārāja mantravedaśāstreṣvāgacchati - nārhati sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāro 'gāramadhyāvasitum /
S04bsu022_u:210_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāro dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samānvāgataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:210_4: anena mahārāja prathamena mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇena samanvāgataḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:210_6: samavipulalalāṭaḥ / ūrṇā mahārāja sarvārthasiddhasya kumārasya bhruvo rmadhye jātā himarajataprakāśā /
S04bsu022_u:210_7: gopakṣmanetraḥ / abhinīlanetraḥ / samacattvāriṃśaddantaḥ / aviraladantaḥ / śukladantaḥ / brahmasvaro mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:210_8: rasarasāgravān / prabhūtatanujihvaḥ / siṃhahanuḥ / susaṃvṛttaskandhaḥ / saptotsadaḥ / citāntarāṃsaḥ / sūkṣmasuvarṇavarṇacchaviḥ / sthito 'navanatapralambabāhu /
S04bsu022_u:210_12_0: suvivartitoruḥ / eṇeyamṛgarājajaṅghaḥ / dīrghāṅguliḥ / āyatapārṣṇipādaḥ / utsaṅgapādaḥ / mṛdutaruṇahastapādaḥ / jālāṅgulihastapādaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:210_12_1: dīrghāṅguliradhaḥkramatalayormahārāja sarvārthasiddhasya kumārasya cakre jāte ci (arciṣmatī prabhāsvare site) sahasrāre sanemike
S04bsu022_u:210_14: anena mahārāja dvātriṃśattamena mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇena samanvāgataḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:210_15: na ca mahārāja cakravartināmevaṃvidhāni lakṣaṇāni bhavanti /
S04bsu022_u:211_0: saṃvidyante khalu punarmahārāja sarvārthasiddhasya kumārasya kāye 'śītyanuvyañjanāni,
S04bsu022_u:211_3: katamāni ca mahārāja tānyaśītyanuvyañjanāni? tadyathā - tuṅganakhaśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:211_4: tāmranakhaśca snigdhanakhaśca vṛttāṅguliśca anupūrvacitrāṅguliśca gūḍhaśiraśca gūḍhagulphaśca ghanasaṃdhiśca aviṣamasamapādaśca āyatapārṣṇiśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:211_5_0: snigdhapāṇilekhaśca tulyapāṇilekhaśca gambhīrapāṇilekhaśca ajihmapāṇilekhaśca anupūrvapāṇilekhaśca bimboṣṭhaśca noccavacanaśabdaśca
S04bsu022_u:211_6_0: pralambabāhuśca śucigātravastusaṃpannaśca mṛdugātraśca viśālagātraśca adīnagātraśca anupūrvonnatagātraśca susamāhitagātraśca
S04bsu022_u:211_6_1: suvibhaktagātraśca pṛthuvipulasuparipūrṇajānumaṇḍalaśca vṛttagātraśca mahārāja sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:211_7_0: suparimṛṣṭagātraśca ajihmavṛṣabhagātraśca anupūrvagātraśca gambhīranābhiśca ajihmanābhiśca anupūrvanābhiśca śucyācāraśca
S04bsu022_u:211_8_0: siṃhavikrāntagatiśca ṛṣabhavikrāntagatiśca haṃsavikrāntagatiśca abhipradakṣiṇāvartagatiśca vṛttakukṣiśca mṛṣṭakukṣiśca ajihmakukṣiśca
S04bsu022_u:211_9_0: tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraśca anupūrvadaṃṣṭraśca tuṅganāsaśca śucinayanaśca vimalanayanaśca prahasitanayanaśca āyatanayanaśca viśālanayanaśca
S04bsu022_u:211_10_0: citrabhrūśca asitabhrūśca saṃgatabhrūśca anupūrvabhrūśca pīnagaṇḍaśca aviṣamagaṇḍaśca vyapagatagaṇḍadoṣaśca anupahatakruṣṭaśca
S04bsu022_u:211_11_0: saṃgatamukhalalāṭaśca paripūrṇottamāṅgaśca asitakeśaśca sahitakeśaśca (susaṃgatakeśaśca) surabhikeśaśca aparuṣakeśaśca anākulakeśaśca
S04bsu022_u:212_0_0: atha khalu rājā śuddhodano 'sitasya maharṣeḥ sakāśātkumārasyedaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā saṃtuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāta
S04bsu022_u:lal_7.55_1: vaidya sarvasya lokasya vande 'hamapi tvāṃ vibho //
S04bsu022_u:213_0: iti hi bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodano 'sitaṃ maharṣi sārdhaṃ naradattena bhāgineyenānurūpeṇa bhaktena saṃtarpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:213_2: atha khalvasito maharṣistata evarddhyā vihāyasā prākramat,
S04bsu022_u:214_0: atha khalu dvayaṃ saṃkramya tatra khalvasito maharṣirnaradattaṃ māṇavakametadavocat - yadā tvaṃ naradatta śṛṇuyā buddho loke utpanna iti,
S04bsu022_u:214_1: tadā tva gatvā tasya śāsane pravrajeḥ /
S04bsu022_u:215_3: buddho nāma padaṃ kimetadiha bho harṣāvahaṃ prāṇināṃ
S04bsu022_u:215_4: prahlāda mama kāya eti sukhitaṃ śāntaṃ ca cittaṃ param //
S04bsu022_u:215_5: kiṃ devo tvasuro 'thavāpi sa bhaved garuḍo 'thavā kinnaraḥ
S04bsu022_u:215_7: divyā cakṣuṣa prekṣate daśa diśaḥ śailān mahīṃ sāgarān

S04bsu022_u:244_1_0: tadyathā - hastābharaṇāni pādābharaṇāni mūrdhābharaṇāni kaṇṭhābharaṇāni mudrikābharaṇāni karṇikāyākeyūrāṇi mekhalāsuvarṇasūtrāṇi
S04bsu022_u:244_1_1: kiṅkiṇījālāni ratnajālāni maṇipratyuptāni pādukā nānāratnasamalaṃkṛtā hārāḥ kaṭakā harṣā mukuṭāni /

S04bsu022_u:lal_9.1_0: sarveyaṃ trisahasra medinī sanagaranigamā pūrṇā kāñcanasaṃcitā bhavet surucira vimalā /

S04bsu022_u:255_2: taṃ tathā prapatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śubhāṅgo nāma tuṣitakāyiko devaputro dakṣiṇena karatalena parigṛhyotthāpayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:255_3: utthāpya ca gaganatalastho rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ taṃ ca mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ gāthābhirabhyabhāṣat -

S04bsu022_u:lal_10.4_0: netasya ācariya uttari vā triloke sarveṣu devamanujeṣvayameva jeṣṭhaḥ /

S04bsu022_u:259_0: atha viśvāmitro dārakācāryo vismitaḥ prahasitavadano nihatamānamadadarpa imāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:lal_10.8_0: vaktraṃ cāsya na paśyāmi mūrdhānaṃ tasya naiva ca /
S04bsu022_u:260_0: iti hi bhikṣavo daśa dārakasahasrāṇi bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ lipiṃ śiṣyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:260_1: tatra bodhisattvādhisthānena teṣāṃ dārakāṇāṃ mātṛkāṃ vācayatāṃ yadā akāraṃ parikīrtayanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:260_5: īkāre ītibahulaṃ jagaditi / ukāre upadravabahulaṃ jagaditi /
S04bsu022_u:260_8: okāre oghottaraśabdaḥ / aukāre aupapādukaśabdaḥ / aṃkāre amoghotpattiśabdaḥ / aḥkāre astaṃgamanaśabdo niścarati sma /
S04bsu022_u:260_20: ḍhakāre mīḍhaviṣayā iti / ṇakāre reṇukleśā iti / takāre tathatāsaṃbhedaśabdaḥ /

S04bsu022_u:262_2: ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo yacchikṣito 'pi bodhisattvo lipiśālāmupāgacchati sma /

S04bsu022_u:268_3: saṃvignamanāstatra bodhisattva ekākī advitīyo 'nucaṃkramyamāṇo 'nuvicaran jambuvṛkṣamapaśyat prāsādikaṃ darśanīyam /
S04bsu022_u:268_6: āsādya ca viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma /

S04bsu022_u:lal_11.1_0: vayamiha maṇivajrakūṭaṃ giriṃ merumabhyudgataṃ tiryagatyarthavaistārikaṃ gaja iva sahakāraśākhākulāṃ vṛkṣavṛndāṃ pradāritva nirdhāvitānekaśaḥ /

S04bsu022_u:274_4: sā śrī prāpya imaṃ hi śākyatanayaṃ nopaiti kāṃcitkalām //
S04bsu022_u:275_0: atha khalu te ṛṣayastasyā devatāyā vacanamupaśritya dharaṇītale pratiṣṭhante /
S04bsu022_u:275_1: te paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ dhyāyantamāniñjyamānena kāyena tejorāśimiva jvalantam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.5_1: ayaṃ taṃ prāpsyate dharmaṃ yajjagad hlādayiṣyati //
S04bsu022_u:281_0: atha khalu te ṛṣayo bodhisattvamābhirgāthābhirabhistutvā tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya vihāyasā prakrāntāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:281_1: rājāpi śuddhodano bodhisattvamapaśyan bodhisattvena vinā na ramate sma /
S04bsu022_u:281_2: so 'vocat - kumāraḥ kva gataḥ? nainaṃ paśyāmīti /
S04bsu022_u:281_4: tato 'nyatama amātyo bodhisattvaṃ paśyati sma jambucchāyāyāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇaṃ dhyāyantam /
S04bsu022_u:281_5: sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ ca tasmin samaye chāyā parivṛttābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:281_6: jambucchāyā ca bodhisattvasya kāyaṃ na vijahāti sma /
S04bsu022_u:281_7: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ tvaramāṇarūpo rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramya gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.10_1: yathā śakro 'thavā brahmā śriyā tejena śobhate //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.11_1: sainaṃ na jahate chāyā dhyāyantaṃ purūṣottamam //
S04bsu022_u:282_0: atha rājā śuddhodano yena sa jambuvṛkṣastenopasaṃkrāmat /

S04bsu022_u:lal_11.12_1: vepanti gātrāṇi mi paśyato imaṃ dhyāyantu tejo nu pradīpakalpam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.13_0: yadā cāsi mune jāto yadā dhyāyasi cārciman /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.13_1: ekadvirapi te nātha pādau vande vināyaka //
S04bsu022_u:284_0: tatra triphalavāhakā dārakāḥ śabdaṃ kurvanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:284_1: tānamātyā evamāhuḥ - mā śabdaṃ mā śabdaṃ kārṣṭeti /

S04bsu022_u:lal_11.15_0: grīṣme vasanta samudāgata jeṣṭhamāse saṃpuṣpite kusumapallavasaṃprakīrṇe /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.16_0: chando 'bhyuvāca parivāritu dārikebhiḥ hantā kumāra vani gacchama locanārtham /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.16_1: kiṃ te gṛhe nivasato hi yathā dvijasya hanta vrajāma vaya codananārisaṃgham //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.17_0: madhyāhnakālasamaye suviśuddhasattvaḥ pañcāśataiḥ parivṛtaiḥ saha ceṭakebhiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.17_1: na ca mātu naiva ca pituḥ prativedayitvā so 'buddha niṣkrāmiti gacchi kṛṣāṇagrāmam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.18_1: dṛṣṭvā kumāra pratibuddha dukhena cotto dhiksaṃskṛteti bahuduḥkha kṛṣī karoti //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.19_0: so jambuchāyamupagamya vinītacitto tṛṇakāni gṛhya svaya saṃstaru saṃstaritvā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.19_1: paryaṅkamābhujiya ujju karitva kāyaṃ catvāri dhyāna śubha dhyāyi sa bodhisattvaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.20_0: pañcā ṛṣī khagapathena hi gacchamānā jambūya mūrdhni na prabhonti parākrametum /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.20_1: te visthitā nihatamānamadāśca bhūtvā sarve samagrasahitā samudīkṣayanto //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.21_0: vaya meruparvatavaraṃ tatha cakravālān nirbhidya gacchama javena asajjamānāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.21_1: te jambuvṛkṣa na prabhoma atikrametuṃ ko nvatra heturayamadya bhaviṣyatīha //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.22_0: avatīrya medinitale ca pratiṣṭhihitvā paśyanti śākyatanayaṃ tahi jambumūle /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.22_1: jambunadārcisadṛśaṃ prabhatejaraśmiṃ paryaṅkabandhu tada dhyāyatu bodhisattvam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.23_0: te vismitā daśanakhā kariyāna mūrdhni praṇatā kṛtāñjalipuṭā nipatan krameṣu /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.23_1: sādho sujāta sumukhaṃ karuṇā jagasya śīghraṃ vibuddha amṛte vinayasva sattvān //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.24_0: parivṛtta sūrya na jahī sugatasya chāyā olambate drumavaraṃ yatha padmapatram /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.24_1: devā sahasra bahavaḥ sthita añjalībhiḥ vandanti tasya caraṇau kṛtaniścayasya //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.25_0: śuddhodanaśca svagṛhe parimārgamāṇaḥ saṃpṛcchate kva nu gataḥ sa hi me kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.25_1: mātṛsvasā avaci mārgata no labhāmi saṃpṛcchatā narapate kva gataḥ kumāraḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.26_0: śuddhodanastvaritu pṛcchati kāñcukīyaṃ dauvārikaṃ tathapi cāntajanaṃ samantāt /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.26_1: dṛṣṭaṃ kumāra mama kenaci niṣkramanto śṛṇute varūpagatu deva kṛṣāṇagrāmam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.27_0: so śīghrameva tvaritaṃ saha śākiyebhiḥ niṣkrāntu prekṣi kṛṣigrāmagiriṃ praviṣṭam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.27_1: yatha sūryakoṭiniyutāni samudgatāni tatha prekṣate hitakaraṃ śiriyā jvalantam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.28_0: mukuṭaṃ ca khaṅga tatha pāduka chorayitvā kṛtvā daśāṅguli śire abhivandite tam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.28_1: sādhū subhūtavacanā ṛṣayo mahātmā vyaktaṃ kumāra abhiniṣkrami bodhihetoḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.29_0: paripūrṇa dvādaśaśatā suprasannadevāḥ paccāśatā upagatā yatha śākiyānām /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.29_1: dṛṣṭvā ca ṛddhi sugate guṇasāgarasya saṃbodhicittu janayaṃ dṛḍhaāśayena //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.30_0: so kampayitva trisahasra aśeṣabhūmiṃ smṛtu saṃprajānu pratibuddha tataḥ samādheḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.30_1: brahmasvaraḥ pitaramālapate dyutīmān utsṛjya tāta kṛṣigrāmabhato gaveṣa //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.31_0: yadi svarṇakāryu ahu svarṇa pravarṣayiṣye yadi vastrakāryu ahameva pradāsyi vastrāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.31_1: atha dhānyakāryu ahameva pravarṣayiṣye samyakprayukta bhava sarvajage narendra //
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.32_0: anuśāsayitva pitaraṃ janapāriṣadyāṃ tasmin kṣaṇe puravaraṃ puna so pravekṣī /
S04bsu022_u:lal_11.32_1: anuvartamāna jagataḥ sthihate puresmiṃ naiṣmkramyayuktamanasaḥ suviśuddhasattvaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:292_0: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saṃvṛddhe kumāre rājā śuddhodano 'pareṇa samayena śākyagaṇena sārdhaṃ saṃsthāgāre niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:292_1: tatra te mahallakamahallakāḥ śākyā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāhuḥ - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt /
S04bsu022_u:292_2: ayaṃ sarvārthasiddhakumāro naimittikairbrāhmaṇaiḥ kṛtaniścayaiśca devairyadbhūyasaivaṃ nirdiṣṭo yadi kumāro 'bhiniṣkramiṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:292_4: uta nābhiniṣkramiṣyati rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturaṅgo vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:292_6: tadyathā - cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ strīratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnam /
S04bsu022_u:292_7: evaṃ saptaratnam / saṃpūrṇaṃ cāsya putrasahasraṃ bhaviṣyati śūrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
S04bsu022_u:293_0: tato rājā śuddhodana evamāha - yadyevaṃ tena hi vyavalokayata kamatā kanyā kumārasyānurūpā syāt /
S04bsu022_u:294_1: ekaika evamāha - mama duhitā anurūpā syāt kumārasya /
S04bsu022_u:295_0: rājā prāha - durāsadaḥ kumāraḥ / tat prativedayiṣyāmastāvat kumārasya, katamā te kanyā rocata iti /
S04bsu022_u:296_0: tataśca te sarve saṃnipatya kumārasyaināṃ prakṛtimārocayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:296_1: tān kumāra uvāca - saptame divase prativacanaṃ śroṣyatheti /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.2_0: kāmaguṇi na me 'sti chandarāgo na ca ahu śobhami istrigāramadhye /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.2_1: yannu ahu vane vaseya tūṣṇīṃ dhyānasamādhisukhena śāntacittaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:299_1: sa punarapi mīmāṃsopāyakauśalyamāmukhīkṛtya sattvaparipākamavekṣamāṇo mahākarūṇāṃ saṃjanayya tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.3_0: saṃkīrṇi paṅki padumāni vivṛddhimanti ākīrṇa rāja naramadhyi labhāti pūjām /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.3_1: yada bodhisattva parivārabalaṃ labhante tada sattvakoṭinayutānyamṛte vinenti //
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.4_0: ye cāpi pūrvaka abhūdvidu bodhisattvāḥ sarvebhi bhārya suta darśita istrigārāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.4_1: na ca rāgarakta na ca dhyānasukhebhi bhraṣṭāḥ hantānuśikṣayi ahaṃ pi guṇeṣu teṣām //
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.5_0: na ca prākṛtā mama vadhū anukūla yā syād yasyā na iṣyatu guṇā sada satyavākyam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.5_1: yā cinti mahyamabhirādhayate 'pramattā rūpeṇa janmakulagotratayā suśuddhā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.6_0: so gāthalekha likhite guṇaarthayuktā yā kanya īdṛśa bhave mama tāṃ varethā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.6_1: na mamārthu prākṛtajanena asaṃvṛtena yasyā guṇā kathayamī mama tāṃ varethā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.7_0: yā rūpayauvanavarā na ca rūpamattā mātā svasā va yatha vartati maitracittā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.7_1: tyāge ratā śramaṇabrāhmaṇadānaśīlā tāṃ tādṛśāṃ mama vadhūṃ varayasva tāta //
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.8_0: yasyā na mānu na khilo na ca doṣamasti na ca śāṭhya īrṣya na ca māya na ujjubhraṣṭā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.8_1: svapnāntare 'pi purūṣe na pare 'bhiraktā tuṣṭā svakena patinā śayate 'pramattā //
S04bsu022_u:300_0: na ca garvitā na pi ca uddhata na pragalbhā nirmāna mānavigatāpi ca ceṭibhūtā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.9_0: na ca garvitā na pi ca uddhata na pragalbhā nirmāna mānavigatāpi ca ceṭibhūtā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.9_2: na ca pānagṛddha na raseṣu na śabdagandhe nirlobhabhidhyavigatā svadhanena tuṣṭā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.10_0: satye sthitā na pi ca cañcala naiva bhrāntā na ca uddhatonnatasthitā hirivastrachannā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.10_1: na ca dṛṣṭimaṅgalaratā sada dharmayuktā kāyena vāca manasā sada śuddhabhāvā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.11_0: na ca styānamiddhabahulā na ca mānamūḍhā mīmāṃsayukta sukṛtā sada dharmacārī /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.11_1: śvaśrau ca tasya śvaśure yatha śāstṛpremā dāsī kalatra jani yādṛśamātmaprema //
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.12_0: śāstre vidhijña kuśalā gaṇikā yathaiva paścāt svapet prathamamutthihate ca śayyāta /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.12_1: maitrānuvarti akuhāpi ca mātṛbhūtā etādṛśīṃ mi nṛpate vadhukāṃ vṛṇīṣva //
S04bsu022_u:302_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodana imā gāthā vācayitvā purohitamāmantrayate sma - gaccha tvaṃ mahābrāhmaṇa kapilavastumahānagare /
S04bsu022_u:302_2: yasyā ete guṇāḥ saṃvidyante kṣatriyakanyāyā vā brāhmaṇakanyāyā vā vaiśyakanyāyā vā śūdrakanyāyā vā tāṃ kanyāmasmākaṃ prativedaya /
S04bsu022_u:302_3: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi kumāraḥ kulārthiko na gotrārthikaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.13_0: brāhmaṇīṃ kṣatriyāṃ kanyāṃ veśyāṃ śūdrīṃ tathaiva ca /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.13_1: yasyā ete guṇāḥ santi tāṃ me kanyāṃ pravedaya //
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.14_0: na kulena na gotreṇa kumāro mama vismitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.14_1: guṇe satye ca dharme ca tatrāsya ramate manaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:305_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa purohitastaṃ gāthālekhaṃ gṛhītvā kapilavastuni mahānagare gṛhādgṛhaṃ vyavalokayan gatvā hiṇḍan kanyāṃ paryeṣate sma /
S04bsu022_u:305_2: so 'nupūrveṇa vicaran yena daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:305_3_0: sa taṃ niveśanaṃ praviṣṭo 'drākṣīt kanyāmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśanīyāṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgatāṃ nātidīrghāṃ
S04bsu022_u:305_3_1: nātihrasvāṃ nātisthūlāṃ nātikṛśāṃ nātigaurāṃ nātikṛṣṇāṃ prathamayauvanāvasthāṃ strīratnamiva khyāyamānām /
S04bsu022_u:306_1: atha sā dārikā purohitasya caraṇau gṛhītvā evamāha - kena te mahābrāhmaṇa kāryam?
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.15_1: teneti gātha likhitā guṇaye vadhūnāṃ yasyā guṇāsti hi ime sa hi tasya patnī //
S04bsu022_u:309_0: atha sā dārikā taṃ gāthālekhaṃ vācayitvā smitamupadarśya taṃ purohitaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣat -
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.16_0: mahyeti brāhmaṇa guṇā anurūpa sarve so me patirbhavatu saumya surūparūpaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.16_1: bhaṇahi kumāru yadi kārya ma hū vilamba mā hīnaprākṛtajanena bhaveya vāsaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:311_0: atha sa khalu purohito rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiva tamarthamārocayati sma - dṛṣṭā mayā deva kanyā yā kumārasyānurūpā syāt /
S04bsu022_u:311_1: āha - kasyāsau? āha - daṇḍapāṇerdeva śākyasya duhitā /
S04bsu022_u:312_0: atha rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhavat - durāsadaḥ kumāraḥ śubhādhimuktaśca /
S04bsu022_u:313_0: atha khalu rājā śuddhodano 'śokabhāṇḍāni kārayati sma suvarṇamayāni rūpyamayāni nānāratnamayāni /
S04bsu022_u:313_1: kārayitvā ca kapilavastuni mahānagare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayāmāsa - saptame divase kumāro darśanaṃ dāsyati,
S04bsu022_u:314_0: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ saptame divase bodhisattvaḥ saṃsthāgāramupasaṃkramya bhadrāsane nyaṣīdat /
S04bsu022_u:314_1: rājāpi śuddhodano 'dṛśyapuruṣān sthāpayati sma - yasyāṃ dārikāyāṃ kumārasya cakṣuḥ saṃniviśet,
S04bsu022_u:315_0: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvantyaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagare dārikāstāḥ sarvā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya darśanāya aśokabhāṇḍakāni ca pratigṛhītum /
S04bsu022_u:316_1: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathāgatābhyastābhyo dārikābhyo 'śokabhāṇḍakānyanuprayacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:316_2: tāśca dārikā na śaknuvanti sma bodhisattvasya śriyaṃ tejaśca soḍhum /
S04bsu022_u:316_3: tā aśokabhāṇḍakāni gṛhītvā śīghraṃ śīghrameva prakrāmanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:317_0: atha daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
S04bsu022_u:317_1: sā dāsīgaṇaparivṛtā puraskṛtā yena saṃsthāgāro yena ca bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:317_4: tadā sā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya prahasitavadanā bodhisattvamevamāha - kumāra kiṃ te mayāpanītaṃ yastvaṃ māṃ vimānayasi?
S04bsu022_u:318_0: āha - nāhaṃ tvāṃ vimānayāmi, api tu khalu punastvamabhipaścādāgateti /
S04bsu022_u:319_0: sā prāha - idamahaṃ kumāra tavāntikādarhāmi? āha - imāni madīyānyābharaṇāni,
S04bsu022_u:319_1: gṛhyatām / sā āha - na vayaṃ kumāraṃ vyalaṃkariṣyāmaḥ? alaṃkariṣyāmo vayaṃ kumāram /
S04bsu022_u:320_0: tatastairguhyapuruṣai rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaiṣa vṛttānto nivedito 'bhūt - deva daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā,
S04bsu022_u:321_0: ityetatkhalu vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā śuddhodano daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya purohitaṃ dautyena preṣayati sma - yā te duhitā,
S04bsu022_u:322_1: asmākaṃ cāyaṃ kuladharmaḥ śilpajñasya kanyā dātavyā nāśilpajñasyeti /
S04bsu022_u:323_1: tato rājña etadabhavat - dvirapīdamahaṃ sahadharmeṇa coditaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:323_2: yadāpi mayoktaṃ kasmācchākyakumārāḥ kumārasyopasthānāya nāgacchantīti tadāpyahamabhihitaḥ - kiṃ vayaṃ maṇḍakasyopasthānaṃ kariṣyāma iti /
S04bsu022_u:325_0: rājā āha - alaṃ te kumāra anena /
S04bsu022_u:326_1: yāvattrirapi bodhisattvo rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ paripṛcchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:327_1: tato rājā śuddhodano bodhisattvāya tāṃ prakṛtimārocayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:327_2: tāṃ śrutvā bodhisattva āha - deva asti punariha nagare kaścidyo mayā sārdhaṃ samarthaḥ śilpena śilapamupadarśayitum?
S04bsu022_u:328_0: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ prahasitavadano bodhisattvamevamāha - śakyasi punastvaṃ putra śilpamupadarśayitum? sa āha - bāḍhaṃ śakyāmi deva /
S04bsu022_u:329_0: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ kapilavastuni mahānagaravare ghaṇṭāghoṣaṇāṃ kārayati sma - saptame divase kumāraḥ svaṃ śilpamupadarśayati /
S04bsu022_u:330_0: tatra saptame divase pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni saṃnipatitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:330_1: daṇḍapāṇeśca śākyasya duhitā gopā nāma śākyakanyā jayapatākā sthāpitābhūt - yo vā atra asidhanuṣkalāpayuddhasālambheṣu jeṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:331_0: tatra sarvapurato devadattaḥ kumāro nagarādabhiniṣkrāmati sma /
S04bsu022_u:331_1: śvetaśca hastī mahāpramāṇo bodhisattvasyārthe nagaraṃ praveśyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:331_2: tatra devadattaḥ kumāra īrṣyayā ca śākyabalamadena ca mattaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:331_3: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ vāmena pāṇinā śuṇḍāyāṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā capeṭayā ekaprahāreṇaiva hato 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:332_2: dṛṣṭvā ca paryapṛcchat - kenāyaṃ hata iti /
S04bsu022_u:332_5: sa taṃ hastināgaṃ lāṅgūle gṛhītvā nagaradvārādapakarṣati sma /
S04bsu022_u:333_2: dṛṣṭvā ca paryapṛcchat - kenāyaṃ hata iti /
S04bsu022_u:334_0_0: tataḥ kumāro rathasya evaikaṃ pādaṃ bhūmau prasārya pādāṅguṣṭhena taṃ hastināgaṃ lāṅgūle gṛhitvā sapta prākārān sapta ca
S04bsu022_u:334_1: yatra va pradeśe sa hastī patitastasmin pradeśe mahadbilaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ yatsāṃprataṃ hastigartetyabhidhīyate /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.17_1: sapta purāparikhā atikramya kṣiptu bahiḥ svapurātu ayaṃ hi //
S04bsu022_u:336_0: iti hi pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatāni nagarānniṣkamya yenānyatamaḥ pṛthivīpradeśo yatra śākyakumārāḥ śilpamupadarśayanti sma tenopasaṃkrāman /
S04bsu022_u:336_1: rājāpi śuddhodano mahallakamahallakāśca śākyā mahāṃśca janakāyo yenāsau pṛthivīpradeśastenopasaṃkrāman bodhisattvasya cānyeṣāṃ ca śākyakumārāṇāṃ śilpaviśeṣaṃ draṣṭukāmāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:337_0: tatra ādita eva ye śākyakumārā lipyāṃ paṭuvidhijñāste bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ lipiṃ viśeṣayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:337_1: tatra taiḥ śākyairviśvāmitra ācāryaḥ sākṣī sthāpito 'bhūt - sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo 'tra kumāro lipijñāne viśiṣyate yadi vā lekhyato yadi vā bahulipiniryāṇataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:337_2: atha viśvāmitra ācāryaḥ pratyakṣo bodhisattvasya lipijñāne smitamupadarśayannime gāthe 'bhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.19_1: yāvanti kecillipi sarvaloke tatraiṣa pāraṃgatu śuddhasattvaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.20_0: nāmāpi yūyaṃ ca ahaṃ ca teṣāṃ lipīna jānāma na cākṣarāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:lal_12.20_1: yānyeṣa jānāti manuṣyacandro ahamatra pratyakṣu vijeṣyate 'yam //
S04bsu022_u:338_2: tatrārjuno nāma śākyagaṇako mahāmātraḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanāsu pāraṃgataḥ,
S04bsu022_u:338_3: sa sākṣī sthāpito 'bhūt - sa tvaṃ vyavalokaya katamo 'tra kumāro viśiṣyate saṃkhyājñānata iti /
S04bsu022_u:338_6: na ca pariprāpayati sma / bodhisattvasyaika dvau trayaścatvāraḥ pañcadaśa viṃśattriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśacchataṃ yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapatkāle nikṣipanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:338_7: na ca pariprāpayanti sma / tato bodhisattva āha - uddiśata yūyam,
S04bsu022_u:338_9: na ca pariprāpayati sma / dvāvapi trayo 'pi pañcāpi daśāpi viṃśatyapi triṃśadapi catvāriṃśadapi pañcāśadapi yāvatpañcāpi śākyakumāraśatāni yugapaduddiśanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:338_10: na ca pariprāpayanti sma bodhisattvasya nikṣipataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:339_2: ahaṃ nikṣepsyāmīti / tatra pañcamātrāṇi śākyakumāraśatānyekavacanodāhāreṇāpūrvacaritaṃ samuddiśanti sma,
