S04bsu022_u:lal_15.89_0: ahameva tubhya gati gacchayamī yatha tvaṃ prayāsi amalā vimalā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.89_2: api cā kṛpā karuṇa saṃjaniya vyavalokayasva bhavanaṃ tvamidam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.90_0: vyavalokya caiva bhavanaṃ matimān madhurasvaro giramudīritavān /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.90_1: nāhaṃ pravekṣi kapilasya puraṃ aprāpya jātimaraṇāntakaram //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.91_1: yāvanna labdha varabodhi mayā ajarāmaraṃ padavaraṃ hyamṛtam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.92_0: yadasau jagatpradhāno niṣkrāntu bodhisattvo tasyā nabhe vrajanto stavayiṃsu apsarāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.92_1: eṣa maha dakṣiṇīyo eṣa maha puṇyakṣetraṃ puṇyarthikāna kṣetraṃ amṛtāphalasya dātā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.93_0: ena bahukalpakoṭī dānadamasaṃyamenā samudānitāsya bodhiḥ sattvakaruṇāyamānā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.93_1: eṣa pariśuddhaśīlo suvrata akhaṇḍacārī na ca kāma naiva bhogāṃ prārthentu śīlarakṣī //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.94_0: eṣa sada kṣāntivādī chidyanti aṅgamaṅge na ca krodhu naiva roṣaḥ sattvaparitrāyaṇārtham /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.94_1: eṣa sada vīryavanto avikhinna kalpakoṭyaḥ samudānitāsya bodhiryaṣṭā ca yakṣakoṭīḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.95_0: eṣa sada dhyānadhyāyī śāntapraśāntacitto dhyāyitva sarvakleśāṃ moceṣyi sattvakoṭīḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.95_1: eṣo asaṅga prājñaḥ kalpairvikalpamukto kalpairvimuktacitto jinu bheṣyate svayaṃbhūḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.96_0: eṣa sada maitracitto karuṇāya pāraprāpto mudito upekṣadhyāyī brāhme pathi vidhijñaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.97_0: śaraṇaṃ bhayārditānāṃ dīpo acakṣuṣāṇāṃ layano upadrutānāṃ vaidyaścirāturāṇām /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.97_1: rājeva dharmarājo indraḥ sahasranetro brahmasvayaṃbhubhūtaḥ kāyapraśabdhacitto //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.98_0: dhīraḥ prabhūtaprajño vīro viviktacittaḥ śūraḥ kileśaghātī ajitaṃjayo jitāriḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.98_1: siṃho bhayaprahīṇo nāgaḥ sudāntacitto ṛṣabho gaṇapradhānaḥ kṣāntaḥ prahīṇakopaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.100_0: ena jitu kleśamāro ena jitu skandhamāro ena jitu mṛtyumāro nihato 'sya deva(putra)māro /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.100_1: eṣa maha sārthavāho kupathapratisthitānāṃ aṣṭāṅgamārgaśreṣṭhaṃ deśeṣyate nacireṇā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.100_3: bhuvi divi ca saṃpraghuṣṭo jinu bheṣyate svayaṃbhūḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.100_5: yatpuṇya tvāṃ stavitvā bhoma yatha vādisiṃhaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:504_0: iti hi bhikṣavo 'bhiniṣkrānto bodhisattvo 'tikramya śākyānatikramya kroḍyānatikramya mallān maineyānāmanuvaineye niga me ṣaṭsu yojaneṣu /
S04bsu022_u:504_2: tato bodhisattvo kaṇṭhakādavatīrya dharaṇītale sthitvā taṃ mahāntaṃ devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragasaṃghaṃ visarjayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:504_3: visarjya cāsyaitadabhūt -imānyābharaṇāni kaṇṭhakaṃ ca chandakasya haste visarjayāmīti /
S04bsu022_u:505_2: yatra ca pradeśe chandako nivṛttastatra caityaṃ sthāpitamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:506_1: punaśca bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - kathaṃ ca nāma cūḍā ca pravrajyā ceti /
S04bsu022_u:506_2: sa khaḍgena cūḍāṃ chittvā antarikṣe kṣipati sma /
S04bsu022_u:506_3: sā ca trāyatriṃśatā devaiḥ parigṛhītābhūt pūjārtham /
S04bsu022_u:506_4: adyāpi ca trāyatriṃśatsu deveṣu cūḍāmaho vartate /
S04bsu022_u:507_0: punarapi bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - kathaṃ hi nāma pravrajyā ca kāśikāni vastrāṇi /
S04bsu022_u:507_2: śobhanaṃ syāt / atha śuddhavāsakāyikānāṃ devānāmetadabhūt - kāṣāyairbodhisattvasya kāryamiti /
S04bsu022_u:507_3: tatraiko devaputro divyaṃ rūpamantardhāpya lubdhakarūpeṇa kāṣāyavastraprāvṛto bodhisattvasya purato 'sthāt /
S04bsu022_u:507_4: atha bodhisattvastametadavocat - sacenme tvaṃ mārṣā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dadyāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:507_7: imāni mama / bodhisattva āha - ahaṃ tvāṃ yācāmi /
S04bsu022_u:507_8: tatastena lubdhakarūpiṇā devaputreṇa bodhisattvāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:507_9: kāśikāni gṛhṇīte sma / atha sa devaputro gauravajātastāni vastrāṇi ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham /
S04bsu022_u:507_10: tacchandakena dṛṣṭamabhūt / tatrāpi caityaṃ sthāpitam / adyāpi taccaityaṃ kāṣāyagrahaṇamityevaṃ jñāyate /
S04bsu022_u:508_0: yadā ca bodhisattvena cūḍāṃ chittvā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi prāvṛtāni,
S04bsu022_u:508_1: tasmin samaye devaputraśatasahasrā hṛṣṭāstuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ paramapramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā hīhīkārakilikilāprakṣveḍitānirnādanirghoṣaśabdamakārṣuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:509_0: tato 'ntaḥpurikābhiḥ kumāramapaśyantībhiḥ grīṣmikavārṣikahaimantikeṣu prāsādeṣvāsaneṣu ca gṛheṣu parimāgamāṇā yadā na paśyanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:509_2: tatra kāścitstriyaḥ paramaśokārtā hā tātehi krandanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:509_12: kāścidvikṣiptakeśyaḥ, kāścitkeśaṃ viluñcantyaḥ, kāścidūrdhvabāhavaḥ uccairutkrośanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:509_13: kāścinmṛgya iva digdhaviddhāḥ sahasā pradhāvantyo [Vaidya_165] rudanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:509_14: kāścinmārutakampitā iva kadalyaḥ pravikampyamānā rudanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:509_16: kāścijjālotkṣiptamatsyā iva pṛthivyāṃ parivartyamānā rudanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:509_17: kāścinmūlachinnā iva vṛkṣāḥ sahasā dharaṇītale nipatya rudanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:510_0: taṃ ca śabdaṃ rājā śrutvā śākyānāmantrayate sma - kimetaduccairantaḥpure śabdaḥ śrūyate? śākyā vijñāya kathayanti sma - kumāraḥ kila mahārāja antaḥpure na dṛśyate /
S04bsu022_u:511_0: mahāprajāpatyapi gautamī paridevamānā mahītale parivartate sma /
S04bsu022_u:511_1: rājānaṃ śuddhodanamevamāha kṣipraṃ māṃ mahārāja putreṇa samaṅginīṃ kuruṣveti /
S04bsu022_u:513_1: te maṅgaladvāreṇa gacchantaḥ paśyanti sma antarāpathi puṣpavarṣaṃ prapatitam /
S04bsu022_u:514_0: te svalpamantaraṃ gatvā taṃ devaputraṃ paśyanti sma bodhisattvasya kāśikavastrāṇi śirasi kṛtvā āgacchantam /
S04bsu022_u:514_2: mā khalvanenaiṣāṃ vastrāṇāmarthe kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt /
S04bsu022_u:514_3: gṛhṇītainamiti / bhūyaḥ paśyanti sma / tasya pṛṣṭhataścchandakaṃ kaṇṭhakamābharaṇāni cādāyāgacchantam /
S04bsu022_u:514_4: tataste parasparamūcuḥ - mā tāvadbhoḥ sāhasaṃ mā kārṣṭa /
S04bsu022_u:515_0: te chandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - he chandaka,
S04bsu022_u:515_1: mā khalvanenaiva puruṣeṇa kāśikānāṃ vastrāṇāmarthāya kumāro jīvitādvyaparopitaḥ syāt /
S04bsu022_u:515_2: chandaka āha - na hyetat / api tu anena kumārāya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dattāni /
S04bsu022_u:515_4: atha sa devaputrastāni vastrāṇyubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ śirasi kṛtvā tata eva devalokamagamat teṣāṃ pūjārtham /
S04bsu022_u:516_0: evaṃ ca te bhūyaśchandakaṃ paripṛcchanti sma - tatkiṃ manyase chandaka gacchāmo vayam? śakyaḥ kumāraḥ pratinivartayitum? sa āha - mā khalu /
S04bsu022_u:516_2: evaṃ ca tenoktam - na tāvadahaṃ punarapi kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pravekṣyāmi,
S04bsu022_u:517_1: tatastānyābharaṇāni cireṇa kālena bhadrikasya śākyakumārasya mahānāmno 'niruddhasya cābadhyanta sma /
S04bsu022_u:517_2: tāni mahānārāyaṇasaṃghaṭanakāyārthamanye [Vaidya_166] nārāyaṇasaṃhananā na śaknuvanti sma dhārayitum /
S04bsu022_u:517_3: yadā na kaścittāni dhārayituṃ śaknoti sma,
S04bsu022_u:517_4: tadā mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā cintitamabhūt - yāvadahamimānyābharaṇāni paśyāmi,
S04bsu022_u:517_7: tato mahāprajāpatī gautamī tānyābharaṇāni puṣkariṇyāṃ prakṣipati sma /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.102_0: niṣkrāntu śūro yada vidu bodhisattvo nagaraṃ vibuddhaṃ kapilapuraṃ samagram /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.102_1: manyanti sarve śayanagato kumāro anyonya hṛṣṭāḥ pramudita ālabhante //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.103_0: gopā vibuddhā tatha api istrigārā śayanaṃ nirīkṣī na ca dṛśi bodhisattvam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.103_1: utkrośu mukto narapatino agāre hā vañcitāḥ smaḥ kahi gatu bodhisattvo //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.104_0: rājā śruṇitvā dharaṇitale nirasto utkrośu kṛtvā aho mama ekaputro /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.104_1: so stemito hi jalaghaṭasaṃprasikto āśvāsayantī bahuśata śākiyānām //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.105_0: gopā śayāto dharaṇitale nipatya keśāṃ lunātī avaśiri bhūṣaṇāni /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.105_1: aho subhāṣṭaṃ mama puri nāyakenā sarvapriyebhirnaciratu viprayogaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.106_0: rūpā surūpā vimalavicitritāṅgā acchā viśuddhā jagati priyā manāpā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.106_1: dhanyā praśastā divi bhuvi pūjanīyā kva tvaṃ gato 'si mama śayi chorayitvā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.107_0: na pāsyi pānaṃ na ca madhu na pramādaṃ bhūmau śayiṣye jaṭamakuṭaṃ dhariṣye /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.107_1: snānaṃ jahitvā vratatapa ācariṣye yāvanna drakṣye guṇadharu bodhisattvam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.108_0: udyāna sarve aphala apatrapuṣpā hārā viśuddhā tamarajapāṃśutulyāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.108_1: veśmaṃ na śobhī aṭavi puraṃ prakāśaṃ yattena tyaktaṃ naravarapuṃgavena //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.109_0: hā gītavādyāḥ sumadhura mañjughoṣāḥ hā istrigārā vigalita bhūṣaṇābhiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.109_1: hā hemajālaiḥ parisphuṭamantarikṣaṃ na bhūyu drakṣye guṇadharaviprahīṇā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.110_0: mātṛsvasā cā paramasukṛcchraprāptā āśvāsayāti ma rudahi śākyakanye /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.110_1: pūrve ca uktaṃ naravarapuṃgavena kartāsmi loke jaramaraṇātpramokṣam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.111_0: so cā maharṣī kuśalasahasra cīrṇaḥ ṣaḍ yojanāni pratigatu rātriśeṣe /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.111_1: chandasya detī hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni chandā gṛhītvā kapilapuraṃ prayāhi //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.112_0: mātāpitaṇāṃ mama vacanena pṛcche gataḥ kumāro na ca puna śocayethā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.112_1: buddhitva bodhiṃ punarihamāgamiṣye dharmaṃ śruṇitvā bhaviṣyatha śāntacittāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.113_0: chando rudanto pratibhaṇi nāyakasya na me 'sti śaktirbalata parākramo vā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.113_1: haneyu mahyaṃ naravarajñātisaṃghāḥ chandā kva nīto guṇadharu bodhisattvo //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.114_0: mā tāhi chandā pratibhaṇi bodhisattvo tuṣṭā bhavitvā api mama jñātisaṃghāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.114_1: śāstārasaṃjñā tvayi sada bhāviṣyanti premeṇa mahyaṃ tvayamapi vartiṣyante //
S04bsu022_u:519_0: chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni udyānaprāpto naravarapuṃgavasya /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.115_0: chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni udyānaprāpto naravarapuṃgavasya /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.115_2: udyānapālaḥ pramuditu vegajāto ānandaśabdaṃ pratibhaṇi śākiyānām //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.116_0: ayaṃ kumāro hayavaru chandakaśca udyānaprāpto na ca puna śocitavyo /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.116_1: rājā śraṇitvā parivṛtu śākiyebhiḥ udyānaprāpto pramuditu vegajāto //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.117_0: gopā viditvā dṛḍhamati bodhisattvaṃ no cāpi harṣī na ca gira śraddadhāti /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.117_1: asthānametadvinigatu yatkumāro aprāpya bodhiṃ punariha āgameyā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.118_0: dṛṣṭvā tu rājā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca utkrośu kṛtvā dharaṇitale nirasto /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.118_1: hā mahya putrā sukuśalagītavādyā kva tvaṃ gato 'si vijahiya sarvarājyam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.119_0: sādhū bhaṇāhi vacana mameha chandā kiṃ vā prayogaḥ kva ca gatu bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.119_1: kenātha nīto vivarita kena dvārā pūjā ca tasyā katha kṛta devasaṃghaiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.120_0: chando bhaṇātī śṛṇu mama pārthivendrā rātrau prasupte nagari sabālavṛddhe /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.120_1: so mañjughoṣo mama bhaṇi bodhisattvo chandā dadāhi mama laghu aśvarājam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.121_0: so bodhayāmi naragaṇi nārisaṃghaṃ suptā prasuptā na ca gira te śruṇanti /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.121_1: so rodamāno dadi ahu aśvarājaṃ hanta vrajāhī hitakara yena kāmam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.122_0: śakreṇa dvārā vivarita yantrayuktāḥ pālāścatasro hayacaraṇe śiliṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.122_1: ārūḍhi śūre pracalita trisahasrāḥ mārgo nabhe 'smin suvipula yena krānto //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.123_0: ābhā pramuktā vihatatamondhakārā puṣpā patiṃsū turiyaśatā raṇiṃṣū /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.123_1: devāḥ staviṃsū tathapi hi cāpsarāṇi nabhasā prayāto parivṛtu devasaṃghaiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.124_0: chando gṛhītvā hayavaru bhūṣaṇāni antaḥpure so upagatu rodamāno /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.124_1: dṛṣṭvā tu gopā hayavaru chandakaṃ ca saṃmūrchayitvā dharaṇitale nirastā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.125_0: udyukta sarvā suvipula nārisaṃghāḥ vāriṃ gṛhītvā snapayiṣu śākyakanyām /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.125_1: mā haiva kālaṃ kariṣyati śokaprāptā dvābhyāṃ priyābhyāṃ bahu bhavi viprayogo //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.126_0: sthāmaṃ janitvā suduḥkhita śākyakanyā kaṇṭhe 'valambyā hayavaraaśvarāje /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.126_1: anusmaritvā purimaka kāmakrīḍāṃ nānāpralāpī pralapati śokaprāptā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.127_0: hā mahya prītijananā hā mama narapuṃgavā vimalacandramukhā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.127_1: hā mama surūparūpā hā mama varalakṣaṇā vimalatejadharā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.128_0: hā mama aninditāṅgā sujāta anupūrvaudgatā asamā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.128_1: hā mama guṇāgradhāriṃ naramarūbhiḥ pūjitā paramakārūṇikā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.131_0: hā mama sujātajātā lumbinivana uttame bhramaragītarute /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.131_1: hā mama vighuṣṭaśabdā divi bhuvi abhipūjitā vipulajñānadrumā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.132_0: hā mama rasārasāgrā bimboṣṭhā kamalalocanā kanakanibhā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.133_0: hā mama sunāsa subhrū ūrṇābhru mukhāntare sthitā vimalā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.134_1: iti tasya bhūṣaṇāni puṇyehi kṛtāni pārthive prītikarā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.136_0: hā kaṇṭhakā sujātā mama bhartu sahāyakastvayā kva nīto /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.136_1: hā chandakā nikaruṇā na bodhayasi gacchamānake naravariṣṭhe //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.137_0: gacchatyayaṃ hitakaro ekā gira tasminnantari na bhasi kasmāt /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.137_1: itu adya puravarāto gacchati naradamyasārathiḥ kāruṇikaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.138_0: katha vā gato hitakaro kena ca niṣkramito itu sa rājakulāt /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.138_1: katamāṃ diśāmanugato dhanyā vanagulmadevatā yāsya sakhī //
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.139_0: atiduḥkha mahya chandā nidhidarśiya netrauddhṛtā cakṣudadā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_15.140_0: tānapi jahitva nirgatu kiṃ punarima istrikāmaratim /

S04bsu022_u:537_0: iti hi bhikṣava ārāḍaḥ kālāpaḥ paramayā pūjayā māṃ pūjayati sma /

S04bsu022_u:538_0: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvārāḍasya dharmo na nairyāṇiko na niryāti,

S04bsu022_u:555_1_0: samanantaropaviṣṭasya ca bodhisattvasya puṇyaviśeṣeṇa ca jñānaviśeṣeṇa ca pūrvasucaritacaryāphalaviśeṣeṇa ca sarvasamādhiparicayaviśeṣeṇa
S04bsu022_u:555_1_1: ca dhyānapramukhāni sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi samāpattiśatānyāmukhībhavanti sma sākārāṇi soddeśāni yathāpi taccittavaśavartitvāt /
S04bsu022_u:555_2: atha ca bodhisattvaḥ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan utthāyāsanādyena rudrako rāmaputrastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:555_3: upasaṃkramya rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha astyanyo 'pi mārṣa kaściduttare naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattermārgaḥ? so 'bravīt - nāstīti /
S04bsu022_u:556_0: tato bodhisattvasyaitadabhavat - na khalu rudrakasyaivāsti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā /
S04bsu022_u:556_1: mamāpyasti śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ samādhiḥ prajñā /
S04bsu022_u:557_0: atha bodhisattvo rudrakaṃ rāmaputramevamāha - mayāpyeṣa mārṣa dharmo 'dhigato yatra tvaṃ niryātaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:557_1: so 'vocat - tena hyāgaccha, tvaṃ cāhaṃ cemaṃ gaṇaṃ pariharāva iti /
S04bsu022_u:557_2: samānārthe ca bodhisattvaṃ [Vaidya_181] sthāpayati sma ācāryasthāne ca /
S04bsu022_u:557_3: bodhisattva āha - naiṣa mārṣa mārgo nirvṛtaye na virāgāya na nirodhāya nopaśamāya nābhijñāyai na saṃbodhaye na śrāmaṇāya na brāhmaṇāya na nirvāṇāya saṃvartate /
S04bsu022_u:558_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rudrakasya rāmaputrasya saśiṣyasyāvarjanīkṛtva yāvadalamiti kṛtvā prakrāmat - alaṃ mamāneneti /
S04bsu022_u:559_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrake rāmaputre brahmacaryaṃ caranti sma /
S04bsu022_u:559_1: teṣāmetadabhūt - yasya khalu vayamarthāya dīrgharātraṃ ghaṭāmahe udyujyāmahe,
S04bsu022_u:559_2: na ca śaknumo 'ntaṃ vā paryantaṃ cādhigantum,
S04bsu022_u:559_4: taccāsya na rocate / tathā cottari paryeṣate / niḥsaṃśayameṣa śāstā loke bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu022_u:559_6: evaṃ vimṛṣya pañcakā bhadravargīyā rudrakarāmaputrasakāśādapakramya bodhisattvamanvabadhnan /
S04bsu022_u:560_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya magadheṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmat sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:561_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāntarācca rājagṛhasya antarācca gayāyā yo 'nyatamo gaṇa utsavaṃ karoti sma,
S04bsu022_u:561_1: tena ca gaṇena bodhisattvo 'bhinimantrito 'bhūt vāsena bhaktena ca sārdhaṃ pañcakairbhadravargīyaiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:562_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ gayā tāmanusṛtya tāmanuprāpto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:562_1: tatra khalvapi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ prahāṇārthī viharati sma gayāśīrṣe parvate /
S04bsu022_u:562_2: tatrāsya viharatastisra upamāḥ pratibhānti sma aśrutapūrvā anabhijñātapūrvāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:562_3: katamāstisraḥ? ye kecitte khalvapi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo 'navakṛṣṭakāyā viharanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:562_5: yāpi caiṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānatā,
S04bsu022_u:562_6: sāpyanupaśāntā / kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
S04bsu022_u:562_7: atha tarhi abhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:562_8: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣo 'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇīmudake prakṣipya mathnīyāt,
S04bsu022_u:562_10: evameva ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo 'navakṛṣṭakāyā anavakṛṣṭacittāśca viharanti,
S04bsu022_u:562_11: yāpyeṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ kāmeṣu rāgaḥ kāmeṣu chandaḥ kāmeṣu tṛṣṇā kāmeṣu pipāsā kāmeṣu mūrchā kāmeṣu paridāhaḥ kāmeṣvadhyavasānaṃ tadapyanupaśāntam /
S04bsu022_u:562_12: kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
S04bsu022_u:562_14: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamā upamā pratibhāti sma /
S04bsu022_u:563_1: bhūyaścāsyaitadabhūt - ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
S04bsu022_u:563_2: yāpi teṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ kartavyaṃ yāvajjyotiṃ paryeṣata iti /
S04bsu022_u:563_3: sa ārdraṃ kāṣṭhamādāya sthale sthāpayitvā ārdrāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ mathnīyāt,
S04bsu022_u:563_5: evameva ye ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ pūrvavatkāryaṃ yāvadabhavyā uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:563_6: iyaṃ dvitīyā upamā pratibhāti sma pūrvamaśrutā cāvijñātā ca /
S04bsu022_u:564_0: punaraparaṃ ya ime śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bhavantaḥ kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyacittā viharanti,
S04bsu022_u:564_1: yāpi teṣāṃ kāmeṣu nandiḥ / iti sarvaṃ peyālam / tadapyeṣāmupaśāntam / kiṃ cāpi te ātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayante /
S04bsu022_u:564_2: atha khalu punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:564_3: tadyathāpi nāma iha syātpuruṣo 'gnyarthī jyotirgaveṣī jyotiḥ paryeṣamāṇaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:564_4: sa śuṣkaṃ kāṣṭhamādāya śuṣkāṃ cottarāraṇiṃ sthale pratiṣṭhāpya mathnīyāt,
S04bsu022_u:564_6: evameva ya ime bhavantaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇā iti sarvaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedayanta iti /
S04bsu022_u:564_7: atha ca punarbhavyā eva te uttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:564_8: iyaṃ tṛtīyā upamā pratibhāti sma aśrutapūrvā ca avijñātapūrvā ca /
S04bsu022_u:565_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - ahaṃ khalvetarhi kāmebhyo vyapakṛṣṭakāyo viharāmi vyapakṛṣṭacittaśca /
S04bsu022_u:565_1: yāpi me kāmeṣu nandīti sarvaṃ yāvattadapi me upaśāntam /
S04bsu022_u:565_2: kiṃ cāpi ahamātmopakramikāṃ śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāmiti peyālaṃ yāvadvedanāṃ vedmi /
S04bsu022_u:566_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo yathābhipretaṃ gayāyāṃ vihṛtya gayāśīrṣe parvate jaṅgāvihāramanucaṃkramyamāṇo yenorubilvā senāpatigrāmakastadanusṛtastadanuprāpto 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:566_1: tatrādrākṣīnnadīṃ nairañjanāmacchodakāṃ sūpatīrthāṃ prāsādikaiśca drumagulmairalaṃkṛtāṃ samantataśca gocaragrāmām /
S04bsu022_u:566_2: tatra khalvapi bodhisattvasya mano 'tīva prasannamabhūt - samo batāyaṃ bhūmipradeśo ramaṇīyaḥ pratisaṃlayanānurūpaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:567_0_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - pañcakaṣāyakāle 'hamiha jambudvīpe 'vatīrṇo hīnādhimuktikeṣu sattveṣvākīrṇatīrthyavargeṣu
S04bsu022_u:568_0_0: iha ca kecitparatra manyante svargāpavargāvasmākametebhyo nirvartsyeta iti mithyāmārgaprayātā aśaraṇe śaraṇasaṃjñino 'maṅgalye
S04bsu022_u:568_0_1: maṅgalasaṃjñino 'śuddhyā śuddhiṃ manyatoyannvahaṃ tādṛśaṃ vratatapoviśeṣamālabheyaṃ yathā sarvaparapravādinaśca nigṛhītāḥ
S04bsu022_u:568_2: dhyānagocarāṇāṃ ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ ca devānāṃ dhyānaviśeṣopadarśanādāvarjanaṃ kuryāmiti /
S04bsu022_u:569_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattva evaṃ cintayitvā ṣaḍvarṣikaṃ mahāghoraṃ vratatapaḥsuduṣkarātsuduṣkarāṃ duṣkaracaryāmālabhate sma /
S04bsu022_u:569_2: tenocyate duṣkaracaryeti / na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā,
S04bsu022_u:569_6: kena kāraṇenocyate āsphānakamiti? sa caturthadhyānamādita eva samāpadyamāna āśvāsapraśvāsānuparodhayati saṃnirodhayati /
S04bsu022_u:569_7: akalpaṃ tad dhyānamavikalpamaniñjanamapanītamaspandanaṃ sarvatrānugataṃ ca sarvatra cāniśritam /
S04bsu022_u:569_8: na ca tad dhyānaṃ jātu kenacitsamāpannaṃ pūrvaṃ śaiṣyeṇa vā aśaiṣyeṇa vā pratyekabuddhena [Vaidya_184] vā caryāpratipannena vā bodhisattvena /
S04bsu022_u:569_9: ataścāsphānakaṃ nāmocyate / ākāśamaspharaṇamakaraṇamavikaraṇaṃ tacca sarvaṃ spharatīti hyākāśasamaṃ tad dhyānam /
S04bsu022_u:570_0_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyāścaryasaṃdarśanārthaṃ tīrthikānāṃ ca darpanirghātanārthaṃ parapravādināṃ ca nigrahārthaṃ
S04bsu022_u:570_0_1: devānāṃ cāvarjanārthamucchedaśāśvatavādināṃ ca sattvānāṃ krarmakriyāpraṇaṣṭānāṃ karmakriyāvatāraṇārthaṃ puṇyaphalodbhāvanārthaṃ
S04bsu022_u:570_0_2: jñānaphalasaṃdarśanārthaṃ dhyānāṅgavibhajanārtha kāyabalasthāmasaṃdarśanārthaṃ cittaśauryasaṃjananārthaṃ ca asaṃskṛtāyāṃ
S04bsu022_u:570_1: niṣadya ca svakāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇīte sma,
S04bsu022_u:571_0: tato me bhikṣavo haimantikāsvaṣṭakarātriṣu tathā kāyaṃ nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:571_2: bhūmau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:571_3: tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣo durbalataraṃ puruṣaṃ grīvāyāṃ gṛhītvā niṣpīḍayet,
S04bsu022_u:571_4: evameva bhikṣava imaṃ kāyaṃ cetasā nigṛhṇato niṣpīḍayataḥ kakṣābhyāmapi svedāḥ praśravanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:571_6: bhūbhau nipatanti sma avaśyāyanta ūṣmāyanto bāṣpāyantaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:572_0: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahamāsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyam /
S04bsu022_u:572_1: tato me bhikṣava āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyato mukhato nāsikātaścāśvāsapraśvāsā upaniruddhāvabhūtām /
S04bsu022_u:572_3: tadyathāpi nāma karmāragagayā mathyamānāyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati,
S04bsu022_u:572_4: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikābhyāmāśvāsapraśvāsāvuparuddhāvabhūtāṃ śrotachidrābhyāmuccaśabdo mahāśabdo niścarati sma /
S04bsu022_u:573_0: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūya āsphānakaṃ dhyānaṃ dhyāyeyamiti /
S04bsu022_u:573_3: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣavaḥ puruṣaḥ kuṇḍayā śaktyā śiraḥkapālamupahanyād,
S04bsu022_u:573_4: evameva me bhikṣavo mukhanāsikāśrotreṣūparuddheṣu āśvāsapraśvāsā urdhvaṃ śiraḥkapālamupanighnanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:574_0: tāṃ cāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvasya tatra keciddevā evamāhu - kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ kālagato batāyaṃ siddhārthaḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.1_0: mā khalvayaṃ śākyanarendragarbho hyapūrṇasaṃkalpa ihaiva raṇye /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.1_1: kṛtvā trilokaṃ dukhitaṃ hyanāthaṃ kālaṃ kariṣyatyakṛtārtha eva //
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.2_2: vayaṃ purā te tuṣiteṣu nāthā kva sā pratijñā tava śuddhasattva //
S04bsu022_u:576_0: atha te devaputrāstrāyatriṃśeṣu deveṣu gatvā māyādevyā evamarthaṃ śrāvayanti - kālagataḥ kumāraḥ /
S04bsu022_u:576_1: atha māyādevī apsarāgaṇaparivṛtā ardharātrasamaye nairañjanāyāstīre yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāntā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.3_0: yadā jāto 'si me putra vane lumbinisāhvaye /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.4_0: diśāṃ cālokya cature vācā te pravyāhṛtā śubhā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.4_1: iyaṃ me paścimā jātiḥ sā te na paripūritā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.5_1: kṣuṇṇaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ tasya na dṛṣṭā tena nityatā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.6_1: na ca bodhimanuprāpto yāto 'si nidhanaṃ vane //
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.7_0: putrārthe kaṃ prapadyāmi kaṃ va krandāmi duḥkhitā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.8_0: kaiṣā ati tvāṃ karuṇaṃ rudāsi prakīrṇakeśā vinivṛttaśobhā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.9_0: mayā tu daśamāsāṃ vai kukṣau vajra ivā dhṛtaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.9_1: sā te 'haṃ putrakā mātā vilapāmi suduḥkhitā //
S04bsu022_u:579_0: atha bodhisattva āśvāsayannuvāca - na bhetavyaṃ putralālase,
S04bsu022_u:579_2: amoghaṃ buddhaparityāgam / asitanirdeśaṃ ca vyaktaṃ kariṣyāmi /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.10_0: api śatadhā vasudhā vikīryeta meruḥ plave cāmbhasi ratnaśṛṅgaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.10_1: candrārkatārāgaṇa bhū pateta pṛthajano naiva ahaṃ mriyeyam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.10_3: yasmānna śoko tvayi atra kāryo na vai cirād drakṣyasi buddhabodhim //
S04bsu022_u:581_0: sahaśravaṇādeva devī māyā saṃpraharṣitaromakūpajātā bodhisattvaṃ māndāravapuṣpairabhyavakirya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtvā divyatūryaiḥ saṃpravādyamānairyena svabhavanaṃ tenopajagāma /
S04bsu022_u:582_0: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - santyeke śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye alpāhāratayā śuddhiṃ manyante /
S04bsu022_u:582_3: syātkhalu punarbhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ eṣā buddhiḥ - mahattaraṃ tatra kāle kolamāsīditi /
S04bsu022_u:582_4: na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam / atha khalviyadeva tatra kāle kolamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:582_5: tasya me bhikṣava ekameva kolamāhāramāharato 'dvitīyaṃ kāyo 'tyarthaṃ karśito 'bhūddurbalaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:582_6: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava āsītakīparvāṇi vā kālāparvāṇi vā,
S04bsu022_u:582_9: evameva me pārśukā abhūvan / tadyathāpi nāma vāhanakāraśālāyāṃ vā hastiśālāyāṃ vā jīrṇāyāmubhayato vivṛtāyāṃ gopānasyāntarikāśca virājante vyavabhāsante,
S04bsu022_u:582_10: evameva me pārśukā antaḥkāye ubhayato virājante sma vyavabhāsante sma /
S04bsu022_u:582_11: tadyathāpi nāma vartanyā veṇī unnatāvanatā bhavati samaviṣamā,
S04bsu022_u:582_13: tadyathā tiktakālābustaruṇo lūna āmlāno bhavati saṃmlānaḥ samutpuṭakajātaḥ evameva śira āmlānamabhūtsaṃmlānaṃ samutpuṭakajātam /
S04bsu022_u:582_14: tadyathāpi nāma grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse kūpatārakā dūragatā bhavanti,
S04bsu022_u:582_15: kṛcchreṇa saṃprakāśyante, evameva me 'kṣitārakau duragatāvabhūtāṃ kṛcchreṇa saṃprakāśyete sma /
S04bsu022_u:582_18: tato yadāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ pāṇinā kukṣiṃ spṛśāmīti pṛṣṭhikaṇṭakamevāsprākṣam /
S04bsu022_u:582_20: tataḥ kṛcchreṇotthito 'pi pāṃśukṛtāni gātrāṇi pāṇinā pramṛjato me pūtiromāṇi kāyācchīryante sma /
S04bsu022_u:582_21: yāpi me 'bhūtpaurāṇī śubhavarṇatanuḥ sāpyantaradhādyathāpīdaṃ rūkṣapradhānaṃ prahitātmanaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:582_22: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsina evaṃ saṃjānante sma - kālako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:583_0: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayālpāhāratayā pratipadyeyamiti /
S04bsu022_u:583_2: syādbhikṣavo yuṣmākamevaṃ mahattaraṃ taṇḍulaṃ tasmin kāle 'bhūditi /
S04bsu022_u:583_3: na khalvevaṃ draṣṭavyam / athaitāvāneva tasmin kāle taṇḍulo 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:583_4: tasya me bhikṣava ekaṃ taṇḍulamāharataḥ kṣipraṃ kāyo 'bhūditi pūrvavadyāvanmadguracchavirbata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautama iti /
S04bsu022_u:584_1: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - yannvahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayālpāhāratāyai pratipadyeyamiti /
S04bsu022_u:585_0: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - santyeke śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye 'nāhāratayā śuddhiṃ manyante /
S04bsu022_u:585_3: tasya me bhikṣavo 'nāhārasya kāyo 'tīva śuṣko 'bhūt kṛśo durbalaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:585_4: tadyathāpi nāma āsitakīparvāṇi vā kālāparvāṇi vā /
S04bsu022_u:585_6: tadyathā karkaṭakapārśukā vāhanaśālāyāṃ vā gopānasī (pārśve) dviparivartanā veṇīvatpṛṣṭhīkaṇṭakaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:585_7: tiktālābuvacchiraḥkapālam, kūpatārakā ivākṣitārake / so 'haṃ bhikṣavaḥ sādhukamuttiṣṭhāmīti gātrāṇyabhisaṃskurvannavakubjaḥ prāpatam /
S04bsu022_u:585_8: kṛcchreṇāpi cotthitaḥ pāṃśukṛtāni me gātrāṇi pramṛjataḥ pūtimūlāni romāṇyaśīryanta /
S04bsu022_u:585_11: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsino janā evaṃ saṃjānante sma - kālako bata bhoḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:586_0: rājāpi tadā śuddhodanaḥ pratipratidivasaṃ bodhisattvasyāntike dūtaṃ preṣayati sma //
S04bsu022_u:587_0_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lokasyādbhutakriyāsaṃdarśanārthaṃ pūrvavadyāvatkarmakriyāpraṇaṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ karmakriyāvatāraṇārthaṃ
S04bsu022_u:587_0_1: puṇyasaṃcayānāṃ codbhāvanārthaṃ mahājñānasya ca guṇasaṃdarśanārthaṃ dhyānāṅgānāṃ ca vibhajanārthamekatilakolataṇḍulena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi
S04bsu022_u:587_1: adīnamānasaḥ ṣaḍvarṣā bodhisattvo yathā niṣaṇṇa evāsthāt paryaṅkena /
S04bsu022_u:587_4: na ca vātātapavṛṣṭiparitrāṇamakaronna ca daṃśamaśakasarīsṛpānapanayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:587_13: ye ca tatrāgaman grāmakumārakā vā grāmakumārikā vā gopālakā vā paśupālakā vā tṛṇahārikā vā kāṣṭhahārikā vā gomayahārikā vā,
S04bsu022_u:587_15: tena ca krīḍanti sma / pāṃśubhiścainaṃ mrakṣayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:588_1: yadasya karṇaśrotābhyāṃ tṛṇatūlakaṃ prakṣipya nāsāśrotābhyāṃ niṣkāsyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:589_0: ye ca te devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā bodhisattvasya guṇeṣu pratyakṣāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:589_1: te rātriṃdivaṃ samadhiṣṭhā bodhisattvasya pūjāṃ kurvanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:590_0: tatra bodhisattvena tai ṣaḍbhirvarṣairduṣkaracaryāṃ saṃdarśayatā paripūrṇāni dvādaśanayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ tribhiryānaiḥ paripācitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.16_0: na ca yatra svānubhavatī na cāhitaṃ tena tiṣṭhavākyasya /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.18_1: apare bhramanti nagnāḥ satyamidaṃ mohamanyaditi mūḍhāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.23_1: yaṃ duṣkaraṃ na śakyaṃ carituṃ devairmanuṣyairvā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.24_1: yaṃ dhyānaṃ na samarthāḥ pratyekajināpi darśayitum //
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.28_0: kalpaṃ no na vikalpaṃ na ceñjanaṃ nāpimanyena pracāram /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.29_0: na ca ātapātu chāyāṃ chāyāyā nātapaṃ gataścāsau /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.32_1: pāṃśupiśācakamiti taṃ manyante pāṃśunā ca mrakṣanti //
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.33_0: aśucīnā ca kirante vividhāste kāraṇāśca kārenti /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.33_1: na ca iñjate bhramati vā dhyāyatyāsphānakaṃ dhyānam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.34_0: na ca namati no vinamate na kāyaparirakṣaṇā spṛśati /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.34_1: kiṃcinnoccāraprasravaṃ śabdeṣu na saṃtrasī na paraprekṣī //
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.35_1: udarācca pṛṣṭhivaṃśo vidṛśyate vartitā yathā veṇī //
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.37_0: praṇidhiṃ ca kurvate te vayamapi tādṛśa bhavāmahe kṣipram /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.38_0: na ca kevalamātmārthaṃ na dhyānasvādanānna sukhabuddhyā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.39_1: karmakriyā ca darśita yā proktā kāśyape vācā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_17.40_0: krakucchandakasya bodhi bodhiriha sudurlabhā bahubhi kalpaiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:597_0: māraśca bhikṣavaḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaracaryāṃ carataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddho 'bhūt avatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.4_0: jīvato jīvitaṃ śreyo jīvan dharmaṃ cariṣyasi /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.4_1: jīvaṃ hi tāni kurute yāni kṛtvā na śocati //
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.5_0: kṛśo vivarṇo dīnastvaṃ antike maraṇaṃ tava /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.6_0: dadataḥ satataṃ dānaṃ agnihotraṃ ca juhvataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.9_0: aṇumātraṃ hi me puṇyairartho māra na vidyate /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.9_1: artho yeṣāṃ tu puṇyena tānevaṃ vaktumarhasi //
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.10_0: naivāhaṃ maraṇaṃ manye maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.12_0: śoṇite tu viśuṣke vai tato māṃsaṃ viśuṣyati /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.13_1: cittaṃ nāvekṣate kāyaṃ paśya sattvasya śuddhatām //
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.14_0: asti chandaṃ tathā vīryaṃ prajñāpi mama vidyate /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.14_1: taṃ na paśyāmyahaṃ loke vīryādyo māṃ vicālayet //
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.16_0: nāśūro jayate senāṃ jitvā caināṃ na manyate /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.16_1: śūrastu jayate senāṃ laghu māra jayāmi te //
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.17_1: tṛtīyā kṣutpipāsā te tṛṣṇā senā caturthikā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.18_0: pañcamī styānamiddhaṃ te bhayaṃ ṣaṣṭī nirucyate /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.19_0: lobhaślokau ca saṃskārau mithyālabdhaṃ ca yadyaśaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.20_0: eṣā hi namuceḥ senā kṛṣṇabandhoḥ pratāpinaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.21_0: yā te senā dharṣayati lokamenaṃ sadevakam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.22_0: smṛtiṃ sūpasthitāṃ kṛtvā prajñāṃ caiva subhāvitām /
S04bsu022_u:600_0: evamukte māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhī durmanā anāttamanā vipratisārī tatraivāntaradhāt //
S04bsu022_u:601_0_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - ye kecicchramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasvātmopakramikāṃ
S04bsu022_u:601_0_1: śarīropatāpikāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti etāvatparamaṃ te duḥkhamanubhavanti /
S04bsu022_u:601_2: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - anayāpi khalu mayā caryayā anayāpi pratipadā na kaściduttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:601_3: nāyaṃ mārgo bodheḥ / nāyaṃ mārga āyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇasaṃbhavānāmastaṃgamāya /
S04bsu022_u:602_0_0: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhavat - yadahaṃ piturudyāne jambucchāyāyāṃ niṣaṇṇo viviktaṃ kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ
S04bsu022_u:602_0_1: savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya vyāhārṣaṃ yāvaccaturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya vyāhārṣam,
S04bsu022_u:603_0: tasya mamaitadabhūt - nāsau mārgaḥ śakyaḥ evaṃ daurbalyaprāptenābhisaṃboddhum /
S04bsu022_u:603_2: na me paścimā janatā anukampitā syāt /
S04bsu022_u:603_3: na caiṣa mārgo bodheḥ / yannvahamaudārikamāhāramāhṛtya kāyabalasthāmaṃ saṃjanayya paścādbodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkrameyam /
S04bsu022_u:604_0: tatra bhikṣavo ye te lūhādhimuktā devaputrāste mama cetasaścetasaiva parivitarkamājñāya yenāhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya māmevamāhuḥ - mā sma tvaṃ satpuruṣa audārikamāhāramāhareḥ /
S04bsu022_u:605_0: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - ahaṃ khalvanaśana ityātmānaṃ pratijāne,
S04bsu022_u:605_1: sāmantāśca me gocaragrāmavāsino janā evaṃ saṃjānante sma yathānaśanaḥ śramaṇo gautamaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:605_2: itīva me khalu lūhādhimuktā devaputrā romakūpairojaḥ prakṣipanti /
S04bsu022_u:605_4: tato bodhisattvo mṛṣāvādaparihārārthaṃ tān devaputrān pratikṣipyaudārikamāhāramāhartu cittaṃ nāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:606_0: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍvarṣavratatapaḥsamuttīrṇo bodhisattvo 'smādāsanādutthāyaudārikamāhāramāhariṣyāmīti vācaṃ niścārayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:607_0_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ pañcānāṃ bhadravargīyānāmetadabhūt - tayāpi tāvaccaryayā tayāpi tāvatpratipadā śramaṇena gautamena na
S04bsu022_u:607_3: te vārāṇasīṃ gatvā ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve vyāhārṣuḥ /
S04bsu022_u:608_0: tatra bodhisattvamādita eva duṣkaracaryāṃ carantaṃ daśa grāmikaduhitaraḥ kumārya upagacchan darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca /
S04bsu022_u:608_3: balā ca nāma dārikā balaguptā ca supriyā ca vijayasenā ca atimuktakamalā ca sundarī ca kumbhakārī ca uluvillikā ca jaṭilikā ca sujātā ca nāma grāmikaduhitāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:608_4: ābhiḥ kumārikābhirbodhisattvāya sarvāstā yūṣavidhāḥ kṛtvopanāmitā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:608_5: tāścābhyavahṛtya bodhisattvaḥ krameṇa gocaragrāme piṇḍāya caran varṇarūpabalavānabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:608_6: tadagreṇa bodhisattvaḥ sundaraḥ śramaṇo mahāśramaṇa ityācakṣate /
S04bsu022_u:609_0_0: tatra ca bhikṣavaḥ sujātā grāmikaduhitā bodhisattvasya duṣkaracaryāṃ carataḥ ādita eva bodhisattvasya vratatapaḥsamuttāraṇārthaṃ
S04bsu022_u:609_1: evaṃ ca praṇidadhāti sma - mama bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeteti /
S04bsu022_u:610_0: tasya me bhikṣavaḥ ṣaḍvarṣavyativṛttasya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi parijīrṇānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:610_1: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - sacedahaṃ kaupīnapracchādanaṃ labheyam,
S04bsu022_u:611_0: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena sujātāyā grāmikaduhiturdāsī rādhā nāma kālagatābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:611_3: tato 'haṃ tatpāṃśukūlaṃ vāmena pādenākramya dakṣiṇaṃ hastaṃ prasāryāvanato 'bhūttadrahītum /
S04bsu022_u:612_0: atha bhaumā devā antarīkṣāṇāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamanuśrāvayanti sma - āścaryaṃ mārṣā adbhutamidaṃ mārṣāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:612_1: yatra hi nāmaivaṃ mahārājakulaprasūtasya cakravartirājyaparityāginaḥ pāṃśukūle cittaṃ natamiti /
S04bsu022_u:612_2: antarīkṣā devā bhaumānāṃ devānāṃ śabdaṃ śratvā cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamudīrayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:612_4: trāyatriṃśā yāmānām / yāmāstuṣitānām / tuṣitā nirmāṇaratīnām / nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinām /
S04bsu022_u:612_6: iti hi bhikṣavastatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhuvanādekaghoṣa ekasaṃnirnādo 'bhyudgato 'bhūt āścaryamidaṃ mārṣā adbhutamidam /
S04bsu022_u:612_7: yatra hi nāmaivaṃ mahārājakulaprasūtasya cakravartirājyaparityāginaḥ pāṃśukūle cittaṃ natamiti /
S04bsu022_u:613_0: atha bodhisattvasya punarapyetadabhavat - labdhaṃ mayā pāṃśukūlam /
S04bsu022_u:613_1: sacedudakaṃ labheyam, śobhanaṃ syāditi / tatastatraiva devatā pāṇinā mahīṃ parāhanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:614_2: śobhanaṃ syāt / atha tatraiva śakreṇa śilā tatkṣaṇamevopanikṣiptābhūt /
S04bsu022_u:615_0: atha śakro devarājo bodhisattvamevamāha - dadasvedaṃ satpuruṣa mahyam /
S04bsu022_u:615_1: ahaṃ prakṣālayiṣyāmīti / tato bodhisattvaḥ svayaṃkāritāṃ pravrajyāyāḥ saṃdarśayituṃ tatpāṃśukūlaṃ śakrasyādatvā svayameva prakṣālayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:615_3: māreṇa ca pāpīyasā [Vaidya_195] īrṣyādharmaparītena puṣkariṇyā atyucchritāni taṭāni nirmitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:615_5: tatra devatāṃ bodhisattvo lokānuvṛttyā devatānugrahārthaṃ cābravīt - āhara devate vṛkṣaśākhāmiti /
S04bsu022_u:615_8: uttīrya ca tasya kakubhapādapasyādhastāttatpāṃśukūlaṃ saṃghāṭīkṛtya āsīvyati sma /
S04bsu022_u:615_9: adyāpi tat pāṃśukūlaṃ sīvanamityevaṃ saṃjñāyate sma /
S04bsu022_u:616_1: sa divyāni cīvarāṇi kāṣāyaraṅgaraktāni kalpikāni śramaṇasārūpyāṇi bodhisattvāyopanāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:616_2: bodhisattvaśca tāni gṛhītvā pūrvāhṇe nivāsya saṃghāṭīprāvṛtya gocaragrāmābhimukho 'bhut /
S04bsu022_u:617_0: tatra devatābhirurubilvāsenāpatigrāmake nandikagrāmikaduhituḥ sujātāyā ārocitamabhūdardharātrasamaye - yadarthaṃ tvaṃ mahāyajñaṃ yajase tasmādvratāduttīrṇaḥ saḥ /
S04bsu022_u:617_2: tvayā ca pūrve praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam - mama bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta iti /
S04bsu022_u:618_0: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sujātā nandikagrāmaduhitā teṣāṃ devatānāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā śīghraṃ gosahasrasya kṣīrātsaptakṛtsāroddhṛtādagryamojomaṇḍaṃ gṛhṇīte sma /
S04bsu022_u:618_1: gṛhītvā ca sā tatkṣīra(mabhinavama)bhinavaistaṇḍulairabhinavāyāṃ sthālyāmabhinavāṃ cullīmupalipya tadbhojanaṃ sādhayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:618_2: tasmiṃśca sādhyamāne imāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante sma - tasmin khalvapi kṣīre śrīvatsasvastikanandyāvartapadmavardhamānādīni maṅgalyāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:618_4: niḥsaṃśayamidaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuktvā bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpsyati /
S04bsu022_u:618_7: tataḥ sujātā taṃ pāyasaṃ pakvaṃ sthaṇḍilamupalipya puṣpairavakīrya gandhodakenābhyukṣya āsanaṃ prajñāpya satkṛtyottarāṃ nāma ceṭīmāmantrayate sma - gacchottare brāhmaṇamānaya /
S04bsu022_u:618_9: sādhvārya iti pratiśrutya uttarā pūrvāṃ diśamagamat /
S04bsu022_u:618_14: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śuddhāvāsakāyikairdevaputraiḥ sarve 'nyatīrthikā nigṛhītā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:618_15: na kaścit saṃdṛśyate sma / tataḥ sā āgatvā svāminīmevamāha - na khalvārye anyaḥ kaścid dṛśyate śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā,
S04bsu022_u:618_18: sujātā āha - gacchottare sa eva brāhmaṇaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:618_19: sa eva śramaṇaḥ / tasyaivārthe 'yamārambhaḥ / tamevānayeti / sādhvārye ityuttarā gatvā bodhisattvasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatya sujātāyā [Vaidya_196] nāmnopanimantrayate sma /
S04bsu022_u:618_20: tato bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ sujātāyā grāmikaduhiturniveśanaṃ gatvā prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat /
S04bsu022_u:618_21: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sujātā grāmikaduhitā suvarṇamayīṃ pātrīṃ madhupāyasapūrṇāṃ bodhisattvasyopanāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:620_0: atha bodhisattvastadbhojanaṃ pratigṛhya sujātāṃ grāmikaduhitarametadavocat - iyaṃ bhagini suvarṇapātrī /
S04bsu022_u:620_1: kiṃ kriyatām? sā āha - tavaiva bhavatviti /
S04bsu022_u:620_2: bodhisattva āha - na mamedṛśena bhājanena prayojanam /
S04bsu022_u:621_0_0: atha bodhisattvastaṃ piṇḍapātramādāyorubilvāyā niṣkramya nāganadīṃ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nadīṃ nairañjanāmupasaṃkramya taṃ piṇḍapātraṃ
S04bsu022_u:621_0_1: cīvarāṇi caikānte nikṣipya nadīṃ nairañjanāmavatarati sma gātrāṇi śītalīkartum /
S04bsu022_u:622_0: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ snāyato 'nekāni devaputraśatasahasrāṇi divyāgurucandanacūrṇavilepanairnadīmāloḍayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:622_1: divyāni ca nānāvarṇāni kusumāni jale kṣipanti sma yaduta bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe /
S04bsu022_u:623_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena nairañjanā nadī divyairgandhaiḥ puṣpaiśca samākulā vahati sma /
S04bsu022_u:623_2: taṃ devaputrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhyutkṣipya svakasvakāni bhavanāni nayanti sma caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:624_1: tāni sarvāṇi sujātā grāmikaduhitā maṅgalyānīti kṛtvā caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca parigṛhṇīte sma /
S04bsu022_u:625_0: nadyuttīrṇaśca bodhisattvaḥ pulinaṃ nirīkṣate sma upaveṣṭukāmaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:625_1: atha yā nairañjanāyāṃ nadyāṃ nāgakanyā sā dharaṇitalādabhyudgabhya maṇimayaṃ (manoramaṃ) bhadrāsanaṃ bodhisattvāyopanāmayati sma /
S04bsu022_u:625_2: tatra bodhisattvo niṣadya yāvadarthaṃ taṃ madhupāyasaṃ paribhuṅkte sma sujātāyā grāmikaduhituranukampāmupādāya /
S04bsu022_u:625_3: paribhujya ca tāṃ suvarṇapātrīmanapekṣo vāriṇi prākṣipati sma /
S04bsu022_u:625_4: kṣiptamātrāṃ ca tāṃ sāgaro nāgarājaścittikārabahumānajāto gṛhītvā svabhavanābhimukhaḥ prasthito 'bhut pūjārheti kṛtvā /
S04bsu022_u:625_5: atha daśaśatanayanaḥ puraṃdaro garuḍarūpamabhinirmāya vajratuṇḍo bhūtvā sāgarasya nāgarājasyāntikāttāṃ suvarṇapātrīṃ hartumārabdhaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:625_6: yadā na śaknoti sma, tadā svarūpeṇādareṇa yācitvā trāyatriṃśadbhavanaṃ nītavān pūjārthaṃ caityārthaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:625_8: adyāpi ca trāyatriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratisaṃvatsaraṃ pātrīmaho vartate /
S04bsu022_u:625_9: tacca bhadrāsanaṃ tayaiva nāgakanyayā parigṛhītaṃ caityārthaṃ pūjārthaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:626_2: atha tatkṣaṇameva bodhisattvasya puṇyabalena prajñābalena pūrvikā kāye śubhavarṇapuṣkaratā prādurabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.23_0: ṣaḍvarṣa vrata uttaritva bhagavān evaṃ matiṃ cintayan so 'haṃ dhyānaabhijñajñānabalavānevaṃ kṛśāṅgo 'pi san /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.23_1: gaccheyaṃ drumarājamūlaviṭapaṃ sarvajñatāṃ buddhituṃ no me syādanukampitā hi janatā evaṃ bhavet paścimā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_0: ṣaḍvarṣa vrata uttaritva bhagavān evaṃ matiṃ cintayan so 'haṃ dhyānaabhijñajñānabalavānevaṃ kṛśāṅgo 'pi san /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_1: gaccheyaṃ drumarājamūlaviṭapaṃ sarvajñatāṃ buddhituṃ no me syādanukampitā hi janatā evaṃ bhavet paścimā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_2: yattvaudārika bhuktva bhojanavaraṃ kāye balaṃ kṛtvanā gaccheyaṃ drumarājamūlaviṭapaṃ sarvajñatāṃ budhyitum /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_3: mā haivetvarapuṇya devamanujā lūhena jñānekṣiṇo no śaktā siya budhyanāya amṛtaṃ kāyena te durbalāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_4: sā ca grāmikadhīta pūrvacaritā nāmnā sujātā iti
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_5: yajñā nityu yajāti evamanasā siddhe vrataṃ nāyake /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_6: sā devāna niśāmya codana tadā gṛhyā madhūpāyasaṃ
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_10: tīrṇastāraku pārasattva matimāṃ snāne matiṃ cintayan
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_11: oruhyā nadi snāpi śuddhavimalo lokānukampī muniḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_12: devā koṭisahasra hṛṣṭamanasā gandhāmbu cūrṇāni ca
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_13: oruhyā nadi loḍayanti salilaṃ snānārtha sattvottame /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_14: snānā snātvana bodhisattva vimalastīre sthitaḥ sūrataḥ
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_16: kāṣāyāni ca vastra nirmala śubhā tā devaputro dade
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_17: kalpīyāni ca saṃnivāsya bhagavāṃstīre hi nadyāḥ sthitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_18.24_18: nāgākanya udagra hṛṣṭamanasā bhadrāsanaṃ sā nyaṣīt
S04bsu022_u:627_1: dattvā bhojanu sā sujāta matimāṃ svarṇāmaye bhājane
S04bsu022_u:627_2: vanditvā caraṇāni sā pramuditā paribhuṅkṣva me sārathe /
S04bsu022_u:627_3: bhuktvā bhojanu yāvadartha matimān pātrīṃ jale prākṣipat
S04bsu022_u:627_4: tāṃ jagrāha puraṃdaraḥ suraguruḥ pūjāṃ kariṣyāmyaham //
S04bsu022_u:627_5: yada bhuktaṃ ca jinena bhojanavaraṃ odārikaṃ tatkṣaṇe
S04bsu022_u:627_6: tasyā kāyabalaṃ ca tejaśiriyā pūrvaṃ yathā saṃsthitam /
S04bsu022_u:627_7: dharmā kṛtva kathā sujāta maruṇāṃ kṛtvā ca arthaṃ bahuṃ
S04bsu022_u:633_0_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo nadyāṃ nairañjanāyāṃ snātvā ca bhuktvā kāyabalasthāma saṃjanayya yena ṣoḍaśākārasaṃpannapṛthivipradeśe
S04bsu022_u:633_0_1: mahābodhidrumarājamūlaṃ tena pratasthe vijayayā tayā ca gatyā,
S04bsu022_u:633_1_1: salīlagatiḥ vimalagatiḥ śubhagatiradoṣagatiramohagatiraraktagatiḥ siṃhagatiḥ haṃsarājagatirnāgarājagatirnārāyaṇagatiḥ dharaṇitalāsaṃsṛṣṭagatiḥ
S04bsu022_u:634_0: iti hi bhikṣavo yāvacca nadyā nairañjanāyā yāvacca bodhimaṇḍādestasminnantare vātabalāhakairdevaputraiḥ saṃmṛṣṭamabhūt /
S04bsu022_u:634_2: yāvadeva trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau vṛkṣāste sarve yena bodhimaṇḍastenābhinatāgrā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:634_3: ye 'pi ca tadahojātā bāladārikāste 'pi bodhimaṇḍaśīrṣakāḥ svapanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:634_4: ye 'pi ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sumerupramukhāḥ parvatāste 'pi sarve yena bodhimaṇḍastena praṇatā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:634_5: nadīṃ ca nairañjanāmupādāya yāvadbodhimaṇḍo 'sminnantare kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ krośavistāraikapramāṇo mārgo 'bhivyūhito 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:634_6: tasya ca mārgasya vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ pārśvayoḥ saptaratnamayī vedikā abhinirmitā 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:634_7: saptatālānuccaistvena upariṣṭādratnajālasaṃchannā divyachatradhvajapatākāsamalaṃkṛtā iṣukṣepe saptaratnamayāstālā abhinirmitā abhūvan tasyā vedikāyā abhyudgatāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:634_9_0: dvayośca tālayormadhye puṣkariṇī māpitābhūt gandhodakaparipūrṇā suvarṇavālikrāsaṃstṛtā utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā
S04bsu022_u:634_10: taṃ ca mārgamaśītyapsaraḥsahasrāṇi gandhodakena siñcanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:634_12: sarvasya ca tālavṛkṣasya purato ratnavyomakaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu022_u:634_13: sarvasmiṃśca ratnavyomake aśītyapsaraḥ sahasrāṇi candanāgurucūrṇakapuṭāparigṛhītāni kārānusāridhūpaghaṭikāparigṛhītāni sthitānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:635_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ prakampyamānaiḥ kṣetrai raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścārayaṃstūryaśatasahasraiḥ pravādyamānaiḥ,
S04bsu022_u:635_7: anenaivaṃrūpeṇa mārgavyūhena bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍaṃ gacchati sma /
S04bsu022_u:635_9: tāmeva rātriṃ vaśavartī nāma trisāhasramahāsāhasrādhipatirbrahmā sahāpatirbrahmaparṣadamāmantryaivamāha - yatkhalu mārṣā jānīyāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:635_10_0: eṣa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho mahāpratijñānutsṛṣṭo dṛḍhasaṃnāhasaṃnaddho 'parikhinnamānasaḥ sarvabodhisattvacaryāsu
S04bsu022_u:635_10_1: nirjātaḥ sarvapāramitāsu pāraṃgataḥ sarvabodhisattvabhūmiṣu vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvabodhisattvāśayasuviśuddhaḥ sarvasattvendriyeṣvanugataḥ
S04bsu022_u:635_14_0: mahāprajñāprabhotsarjanakaraḥ mahāketurājaḥ aṣṭalokadharmānupaliptaḥ mahāpadmabhūtaḥ sarvadharmadhāraṇyasaṃpramuṣitaḥ mahāsāgarabhūtaḥ
S04bsu022_u:635_16_1: dharmadānena saṃtarpaṇārthaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ dharmacakṣurviśodhanārthaṃ sarvaparapravādīnāṃ sahadharmeṇa nigrahārthaṃ pūrvapratijñāpāripūrisaṃdarśanārthaṃ
S04bsu022_u:635_18: atha khalu vaśavartī mahābrahmā tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:636_0: yasyā tejatu puṇyataśca śiriye brāhmaḥ patho jñāyate maitrī vā karuṇā upekṣa muditā dhyānānyabhijñāstathā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.1_1: pūjāṃ sādhu karotha tasya munino āśivrate sādhanām //
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.1_2: yaṃ gatvā śaraṇaṃ na durgatibhayaṃ prāpnoti naivākṣaṇaṃ
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.1_3: deveṣviṣṭasukhaṃ ca prāpya vipulaṃ brahmālayaṃ gacchati /
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.1_7: śakrābrahmapure ca candrasuriye nāstyasya kaścit samaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.1_9: saiṣo 'dya vrajate mahādrumavaraṃ mārasya jetuṃ camūn //
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.1_10: mūrdhnaṃ yasya na śakyamīkṣitumiha brahmālaye 'pi sthitaiḥ
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.1_13: cittaṃ yasya praśānta doṣarahitaṃ gacchāma tatpūjane //
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.1_14: yeṣāṃ vā mati brahmaśakrabhavane nityaṃ sukha kṣepituṃ
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.1_15: athavā sarvakileśabandhanalatāṃ chettuṃ hi tāṃ jālinīm /
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.1_17: buddhatvaṃ yadi vepsitaṃ tribhuvane pūjetvasau nāyakam //
S04bsu022_u:638_0: iti hi bhikṣavastrisāhasramahāsāhasriko mahābrahmā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ tatkṣaṇaṃ samamadhyatiṣṭhat /
S04bsu022_u:638_2: sarve ca tadā mahāsamudrā dharaṇītalasaṃsthitā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:638_4: imaṃ caiva lokadhātumalaṃkṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca daśasu dikṣu śakrabrahmalokapālairbodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe buddhakṣetraśatasahasrāṇi samalaṃkṛtānyabhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:638_5: bodhisattvaiśca divyamānuṣyakātikrāntaiḥ pūjāvyūhairdaśasu dikṣvaprameyāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi pratimaṇḍitānyabhūvan [Vaidya_202] bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe /
S04bsu022_u:638_6: sarvāṇi ca tāni buddhakṣetrāṇyekamiva buddhakṣetraṃ saṃdṛśyante sma,
S04bsu022_u:638_8: na ca bhūyo lokāntarikā na ca kālaparvatā na ca cakravālamahācakravālāḥ prajñāyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:638_9: sarvāṇi ca tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi bodhisattvasyābhayā sphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:638_11_0: tadyathā - utkhalī ca nāma devaputraḥ sūtkhalī ca nāma prajāpatiśca śūrabalaśca keyūrabalaśca supratisthitaśca mahiṃdharaśca
S04bsu022_u:638_11_1: avabhāsakaraśca vimalaśca dharmeśvaraśca dharmaketuśca siddhapātraśca apratihatanetraśca mahāvyūhaśca śīlaviśuddhanetraśca
S04bsu022_u:638_12: itīme ṣoḍaśa bodhimaṇḍapratipālakā devaputrāḥ sarve 'vaivartyakṣāntipratilabdhāste bodhisattvasya pūjārthaṃ bodhimaṇḍaṃ maṇḍayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:638_13: samantādaśītiyojanāni saptabhī ratnavedikābhiḥ parivṛtaṃ saptabhistālapaṅktibhiḥ saptabhī ratnakiṅkiṇījālaiḥ saptabhī ratnasūtraiḥ parivṛtam,
S04bsu022_u:638_15: ye ca daśasu dikṣu nānālokadhātuṣu vividhā vṛkṣāḥ santyabhijātā abhipūjitā divyamānuṣyakāste 'pi sarve tatra bodhimaṇḍe saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:638_16: yāśca daśasu dikṣu nānāprakārā jalasthalajāḥ puṣpajātayastā api sarvāstatra bodhimaṇḍe saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:638_17: ye 'pi ca daśasu dikṣu nānālokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā bodhimaṇḍālaṃkurvantyapramāṇapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāravyūhaiste 'pi tatra bodhimaṇḍe saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu022_u:639_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhimaṇḍaparipālakairdevaputraistādṛśā vyūhā bodhimaṇḍe abhinirmitā abhūvan,
S04bsu022_u:639_6_0: ete catvāro bodhivṛkṣadevatā bodhisattvasya pūjārthaṃ bodhivṛkṣaṃ māpayanti sma mūlasaṃpannaṃ skandhasaṃpannaṃ śākhāpatrapuṣpaphalasaṃpannaṃ
S04bsu022_u:639_6_1: ārohapariṇāhasaṃpannaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ vistīrṇamaśītistālānuccaistvena tadanurūpeṇa pariṇāhena citraṃ darśanīyaṃ manoramaṃ
S04bsu022_u:639_6_2: saptabhī ratnavedikābhiḥ parivṛtaṃ saptabhī ratnatālapaṅktibhiḥ saptabhī ratnakiṅkiṇījālaiḥ saptabhī ratnasūtraiḥ samantādanuparivṛtairanuparikṣiptaṃ
S04bsu022_u:639_7: sa ca pṛthivīpradeśastrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuvajreṇābhidṛḍhaḥ sāro 'bhedyavajramayaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt yatra bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇo 'bhūdbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:640_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvena bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkramatā tathārūpā kāyātprabhā muktābhūt,
S04bsu022_u:640_15: na ca kasyacitsattvasya tasmin samaye rāgo bādhate dveṣo va moho vā krodho vā lobho vā khilo vā vyāpādo vā īrṣyā vā mātsaryo vā /
S04bsu022_u:640_17: na cyavate sma, nopapadyate sma / sarvasattvāśca tasmin samaye maitracittā hitacittāḥ parasparaṃ mātāpitṛsaṃjñino 'bhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.7_1: duḥkhaṃ praśāntaṃ sattvānāṃ sukhaṃ vindanti vedanām //
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.12_0: rāgadveṣādibhiḥ kleśaiḥ sattvā bādhyanta ye sadā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.14_0: na khilaṃ na ca mātsaryaṃ vyāpādo na ca vigrahaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.17_1: sarve te vipulāḥ kṣetrāḥ dṛśyantyekaṃ yathā tathā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.20_1: te sarve tatra dṛśyante bodhisattvasya tejasā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.26_0: guṇāḥ śakyā na te vācā sarve saṃparikīrtitum /
S04bsu022_u:642_0_0: iti hi bhikṣavastayā bodhisattvasya kāyapramuktayā prabhayā kālikasya nāgarājasya bhavanamavabhāsitamabhūt viśuddhayā vimalayā
S04bsu022_u:642_1: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ kāliko nāgarājastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svasya parivārasya purataḥ sthitvemā gāthā abhāṣat -
S04bsu022_u:642_2: krakuchande yatha ābha dṛṣṭa rucirā dṛṣṭā ca kanakāhvaye
S04bsu022_u:642_5: yenedaṃ bhavanaṃ virocati hi me svarṇaprabhālaṃkṛtam //
S04bsu022_u:642_7: no cāgnerna maṇerna vidyudamalā no ca prabhā jyotiṣām /
S04bsu022_u:642_8: no vā śakraprabhā na brahmaṇa prabhā no ca prabhā āsurī
S04bsu022_u:642_9: ekāntaṃ tamasākulaṃ mama gṛhaṃ prāgduṣkṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:643_1: adyedaṃ bhavanaṃ virājati śubhaṃ madhye raviṃdīptivat
S04bsu022_u:643_2: cittaṃ prīti janeti kāyu sukhito gātrādbhutā śītalā /
S04bsu022_u:643_3: taptā vālika yā śarīri nipatī jātā sa me śītalā
S04bsu022_u:643_5: śīghraṃ gṛhṇata nāgapuṣpa rucirā vastrāṃ sugandhāṃ śubhāṃ
S04bsu022_u:643_7: saṃgītiṃ prakṛrudhva vādya vividhā bherīmṛdaṅgaiḥ śubhaiḥ
S04bsu022_u:643_8: hantā gacchatha pūjanā hitakaraṃ pūjārha sarve jage //
S04bsu022_u:643_12: pūjāṃ tasya karonti hṛṣṭamanaso darśenti mārgo hyayam //
S04bsu022_u:643_13: saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sa hi nāgarāṭ sumuditaścābhyarcya lokottamaṃ
S04bsu022_u:643_15: nāgākanya udagra hṛṣṭamanasaḥ kurvanti pūjāṃ muneḥ
S04bsu022_u:643_19: yatha me dṛṣṭa nimitta pūrvaṛṣiṇāṃ paśyāmi tāneva te
S04bsu022_u:643_20: adya tvaṃ vinihatya mārabalavāniṣṭaṃ padaṃ lapsyase //
S04bsu022_u:643_21: yasyārthe damadānasaṃyama pure sarvā ti tyāgī abhūt
S04bsu022_u:643_24: saiṣā te paripūrṇa sarva praṇidhī adyā jino bheṣyase //
S04bsu022_u:lal_19.35_0: haṃsā kroñcagaṇā yathā ca gagane gacchanti līlānvitaṃ
S04bsu022_u:645_1: yatha vā kāñcanavarṇa ābha rucirā kṣatrāśatā gacchate
S04bsu022_u:645_2: śāntāścāpi yathā apāya nikhilā duḥkhairvimuktā prajāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:645_6: brahmā brahmapurohitāśca amarā utsṛjya dhyānaṃ sukham /
S04bsu022_u:645_7: ye kecittribhave tathaiva ca pure sarve ihābhyāgatāḥ
S04bsu022_u:645_9: mārgaścāpi yathā viśodhitu surairyenādya tvaṃ gacchase
S04bsu022_u:645_11: yatha vā padma viśuddha nirmala śubhā bhittvā mahīmudgatāḥ

S04bsu022_u:lal_21.175_1: vajrāmayāṃ girivarāṃ vikiretkṣaṇācca so cāpi māṃ tarugataṃ na viheṭhayeta //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.176_0: yugamantarasmi sthita māru praduṣṭacitto niṣkoṣa pāṇinamasiṃ pragṛhītva tīkṣṇam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.176_1: uttiṣṭha śīghra śramaṇāsmamatena gaccha mā veṇuyaṣṭi haritāṃ va chinadmi te 'dya //
S04bsu022_u:791_1: sarveyaṃ trisahasra medini yadi māraiḥ prapūrṇā bhavet
S04bsu022_u:791_2: sarveṣāṃ yatha meru parvatavaraḥ pāṇīṣu khaṅgo bhavet /
S04bsu022_u:791_3: te mahyaṃ na samartha loma calituṃ prāgeva māṃ ghātituṃ
S04bsu022_u:791_4: mā dūṣī nativela saṃpranadahe smāremi te 'nadṛḍham //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.178_0: vidhyanti śailaśikharāṃ jvalitāgnivarṇāṃ vṛkṣāṃ samūlaka kṣipī tatha tāmraloham /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.178_1: uṣṭrāśca gogajamukhāstatha bhairavākṣā āśīviṣā bhujaga dṛṣṭiviṣāśca ghorāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.179_0: megheva utthita caturdiśa garjamānā vajrāśanī tatha ayoguḍa varṣamāṇāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.179_1: asiśaktitīṣṇaparaśuṃ saviṣāṃśca bāṇāṃ bhindanti medinitalaṃ pramathanti vṛkṣāṃ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.180_0: bāhūśataiḥ śaraśatāni kṣipanti keci āśīviṣāṃ hutavahāṃśca mukhā sṛjanti /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.180_1: makarādikāṃśca jalajānudadhergṛhītvā vidhyanti keci bhujagāṃ garuḍāśca bhūtvā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.181_1: āsādya medinitalaṃ kṣubhayanti corvīṃ heṣṭhā paskandha salilasya viloḍayanti //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.182_0: kecitpatanti puratastatha pṛṣṭhato 'sya vāme ca dakṣiṇa patanti aho ti vatsa /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.182_1: viparītahastacaraṇā jvalitottamāṅgā netrebhi niścarati vidyudiva pradīptā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.183_0: dṛṣṭvā vikāravikṛtā namucestu senā māyākṛtaṃ ca yatha prekṣati śuddhasattvaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.183_1: naivātra māru na balaṃ na jaganna cātmā udacandrarūpasadṛśo bhramati trilokaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.184_0: cakṣurna istri puruṣo napi cātmanīyaṃ srotaṃ ca ghrāṇa tathā jihva tathaiva kāyaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.184_1: adhyātmaśūnya bahiśūnya pratītya jātā dharmā ime karakavedakavītivṛttāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.185_0: so satyavākyamakarotsada satyavādī yeneha satyavacanenima śūnya dharmāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.185_1: ye keci saumya vinaye anukūlapakṣāḥ te śastra pāṇiṣu nirīkṣiṣu puṣpadāmāṃ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.186_0: so dakṣiṇe karatale racitāgrajāle tāmrairnakhaiḥ suruciraiḥ sahasrāracakre /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.186_1: jāmbūnadārcisadṛśaiḥ śubhapuṇyajuṣṭe mūrdhnātu yāva spṛśate caraṇāṃ salīlam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.187_0: bāhuṃ prasārya yatha vidyudivā nabhasthā ābhāṣate vasumatīniya mahya sākṣī /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.187_1: citrā mi yajña nayutānapi yaṣṭa pūrve na mi jātu yācanaka bandhakṛtā nu dāsye //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.188_0: āpo mi sākṣi tatha teja tathaiva vāyu brahmā prajāpati sajotiṣa candrasūryāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.188_1: buddhā mi sākṣi daśasu sthita ye diśāsu yatha mahya śīlavrataudgata bodhiaṅgāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:792_0: dānaṃ mi sākṣi tatha śīlu tathaiva kṣāntiḥ vīryāpi sākṣi tatha dhyāna tathaiva prajñā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.189_0: dānaṃ mi sākṣi tatha śīlu tathaiva kṣāntiḥ vīryāpi sākṣi tatha dhyāna tathaiva prajñā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.189_2: catura pramāṇa mama sākṣi tathā abhijñā anupūrvabodhicari sarva mameha sākṣī //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.190_0: yāvanti sattva nikhilā daśasu diśāsu yatteṣu puṇya bala śīlu tathaiva jñānam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.190_1: yajñā nirargaḍa ya yaṣṭa śaṭhaḥ kalībhiḥ te mahya roma śatimāṃ kala nopayanti //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.191_0: so pāṇinā dharaṇi āhanate salīlaṃ raṇate iyaṃ vasumatī yatha kaṃsapātrī /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.191_1: māro niśamya ravu mediniye nirastaḥ śṛṇute vacaṃ hanata gṛhṇatu kṛṣṇabandhum //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.192_0: prasvinnagātru hatateju vivarṇavaktro māro jarābhihatu ātmanu saṃprapaśyī /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.192_1: uratāḍa krandatu bhayārtu anāthabhūto bhrāntaṃ mano namucito gatu citta moham //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.193_0: hastyaśvayānaratha bhūmitale nirastāḥ dhāvanti rākṣasa kubhāṇḍa piśāca bhītāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.193_1: saṃmūḍha mārga na labhanti alenatrāṇāḥ pakṣī davāgnipataneva nirīkṣya krāntāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.194_0: mātā svasā pitara putra tathaiva bhrātā pṛcchanti tatra kahi dṛṣṭa kahiṃ gatā vā /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.194_1: anyonya vigraha karonti tathaiva heṭhāḥ prāptā vayaṃ vyasana jīvita nāvakāśaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.195_0: sā mārasena vipulā mahatī akṣobhyā vibhraṣṭa sarva viralīkṛta naiva saṃdhiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.195_1: divasāni sapta abhijāni paraspareṇa ābhāsi dṛṣṭa yadi jīvasi taṃ khu prītāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.196_0: sā vṛkṣadevata tadā karuṇāṃ hi kṛtvā vārīghāṭaṃ grahiya siñcati kṛṣṇabandhum /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.196_1: uttiṣṭha śīghra vraja he ma puno vilamba evaṃ hi teṣa bhavate guruuddharāṇām //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.197_0: duḥkhaṃ bhayaṃ vyasana śoka vināśanaṃ ca dhikkāraśabdamavamānagataṃ ca dainyam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.197_1: prāpto 'smi adya aparādhya suśuddhasatve aśrutva vākya madhuraṃ hitamātmajānām //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.198_0: bhayaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ vyasanaṃ ca dainyaṃ dhikkāraśabdaṃ vadhabandhanaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.198_1: doṣānanekāṃ labhate hyavidvān nirāparādheṣvapi rādhyate yaḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.199_0: devāsurā garuḍa rākṣasa kinnarendrā brahmātha śakra paranirmita sākaniṣṭhāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.199_1: bhāṣanti tasya vijayaṃ jaya lokavīra yatredṛśī namucisena tvayā nirastā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.200_0: hārārdhacandra dhvaja chatrapatāka dentī puṣpāgarū tagaracandanacūrṇavarṣāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.200_1: tūryā parāhaniya vākyamudīrayante acchā drume tuva ca śūra jitārisiṃhā //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.201_0: atraiva cāsanavare labhase 'dya bodhiṃ āveṇikāṃ daśabalāṃ pratisaṃvidaṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.201_1: sarvaṃ ca buddhaviṣayaṃ labhase 'dya śūra maitrā vijitya vipulāṃ śaṭhamārapakṣāṃ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.202_0: iha māradharṣaṇakṛte ca raṇe pravṛtte saṃbodhisattvabalavikrama yebhi dṛṣṭam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_21.202_1: ṣaṭtriṃśakoṭinayutā cature ca viṃśā yebhirmanaḥ praṇihitaṃ varabuddhabodhau //
S04bsu022_u:801_0_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo nihatamārapratyarthiko marditakaṇṭako raṇaśirasi vijitavijayaḥ uchritachatradhvajapatāko viviktaṃ
S04bsu022_u:801_0_1: kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdhamaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati
S04bsu022_u:801_1: savitarkasavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamādadhyātmasaṃprasādāccetasa ekotibhāvādavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma /
S04bsu022_u:801_2: sa prītervirāgādupekṣako viharati sma smṛtimān saṃprajānan sukhaṃ kāyena pratisaṃvedayate sma yattadāryā ācakṣate sma - upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī,
S04bsu022_u:801_4: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇādduḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva ca saumanasyadaurmanasyayorastaṃgamādaduḥkhāsukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati sma /
S04bsu022_u:802_0_0: atha bodhisattvasyathā samāhite citte pariśuddhe paryavadāte prabhāsvare 'naṅgane vigatopakleśe mṛduni karmaṇyupasthite ānijjyaprāpte
S04bsu022_u:802_0_1: rātryāṃ prathame yāme divyasya cakṣuṣo jñānadarśanavidyāsākṣātkriyāyai cittamabhinirharati sma,
S04bsu022_u:803_0: atha bodhisattvo divyena cakṣuṣā pariśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati sma cyavamānānupapadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān sugatān durgatān hīnān praṇītān /
S04bsu022_u:803_1: yathākarmopagān sattvān prajānāti sma - ime bata bhoḥ sattvāḥ kāyaduścaritena samanvāgatāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:803_4: te mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetoḥ kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇādapāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante /
S04bsu022_u:804_0: iti hi divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvānāpaśyati sma cyavamānānupapadyamānān suvarṇān durvarṇān sugatān durgatān hīnān praṇītān yathākarmopagān /
S04bsu022_u:804_1: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavo bodhisattvo rātryāṃ prathame yāme vidyāṃ sākṣātkaroti sma,
S04bsu022_u:805_0_0: atha bodhisattvastathā samāhite citte pariśuddhe paryavadāte prabhāsvare niraṅgane vigatopakleśe mṛduni karmaṇyupasthite
S04bsu022_u:805_0_1: āniñjyaprāpte rātryāṃ madhyame yāme pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānadarśanavidyāsākṣātkriyāyai cittamabhinirharati sma,
S04bsu022_u:805_1: abhinirnāmayati sma, ātmanaḥ parasattvānāṃ cānekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsānanusmarati sma /
S04bsu022_u:805_2_0: tadyathā - ekāmapi jātiṃ dve tisraścatasraḥ pañca daśa viṃśati triṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśajjātiśataṃ [Vaidya_251] jātisahasraṃ
S04bsu022_u:805_2_1: jātiśatasahasram anekānyapi jātiśatasahasrāṇyapi jātikoṭīmapi jātikoṭīśatamapi jātikoṭīsahasramapi jātikoṭīnayutamapi /
S04bsu022_u:805_3_0: anekānyapi jātikoṭīsahasrāṇyapi anekānyapi jātikoṭīśatasahasrāṇyapi anekānyapi jātikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yāvatsaṃvartakalpamapi
S04bsu022_u:805_3_1: vivartakalpamapi saṃvartavivartakalpamapi anekānyapi saṃvartavivartakalpānyanusmarati sma - amutrāhamāsannevaṃnāmā evaṃgotra
S04bsu022_u:805_5: tataścyutvehopapanna iti sākāraṃ soddeśamanekavidhamātmanaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ ca pūrvanivāsamanusmarati sma /
S04bsu022_u:806_0_0: atha bodhisattvastathā samāhitena cittena pariśuddhena paryavadātena prabhāsvareṇa anaṅganena vigatopakleśena mṛdunā karmaṇye
S04bsu022_u:806_0_1: sthitenāniñcyaprāptena rātryāṃ paścime yāme aruṇoddhāṭanakālasamaye nandīmukhyāṃ rātrau
S04bsu022_u:806_2: abhinirnāmayati sma / tasyaitadabhavat - kṛcchraṃ batāyaṃ loka āpanno yaduta jāyate jīryate mriyate cyavate upapadyate /
S04bsu022_u:806_3: atha ca punarasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya niḥsaraṇaṃ na saṃprajānāti jarāvyādhimaraṇādikasya /
S04bsu022_u:806_4: aho batāsya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasyāntaḥkriyā na prajñāyate sarvasya jarāvyādhimaraṇādikasya /
S04bsu022_u:807_0: tato bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - kasmin sati jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:807_1: kiṃpratyayaṃ ca punarjarāmaraṇam? tasyaitadabhūt - jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:808_0: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati jātirbhavati,
S04bsu022_u:808_1: kiṃpratyayā ca punarjātiḥ? tasyaitadabhavat - bhave sati jātirbhavati bhavapratyayā ca punarjātiḥ /
S04bsu022_u:809_0: atha bodhisattvasyaitabhavat - kasmin sati bhavo bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:809_1: kiṃpratyayaśca punarbhavaḥ? tasyaitadabhavat - upādāne sati bhavo bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:810_1: kiṃpratyayaṃ ca punarupādānam? tasyaitadabhavat - tṛṣṇāyāṃ satyāmupādānaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:811_0: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati tṛṣṇā bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:811_1: kiṃpratyayā ca tṛṣṇā? tasyaitadabhavat - vedanāyāṃ satyāṃ tṛṣṇā bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:812_0: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhūt - kasmin sati vedanā bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:812_1: kiṃpratyayā punarvedanā? tasyaitadabhūt - sparśe sati vedanā bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:813_0: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati sparśo bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:813_1: kiṃpratyayaśca punaḥ sparśaḥ? tasyaitadabhavat - ṣaḍāyatane sati sparśo bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:814_0: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati ṣaḍāyatanaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:814_1: kiṃpratyayaṃ ca punaḥ ṣaḍāyatanam? tasyaitadabhavat - nāmarūpe sati ṣaḍāyatanaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:815_1: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati nāmarūpaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:815_2: kiṃpratyayaṃ ca punarnāmarūpam? tasyaitadabhavat - vijñāne sati nāmarūpaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:816_0: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati vijñānaṃ bhavanti,
S04bsu022_u:816_1: kiṃpratyayaṃ punarvijñānam? tasyaitadabhavat - saṃskāreṣu satsu vijñānaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:817_0: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasmin sati saṃskārā bhavanti,
S04bsu022_u:817_1: kiṃpratyayāśca punaḥ saṃskārāḥ? tasyaitadabhavat - avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā bhavanti,
S04bsu022_u:818_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasyaitadabhūt - avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ,
S04bsu022_u:818_1: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam, vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam, nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam,
S04bsu022_u:818_2_0: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaṃ sparśaḥ, sparśapratyayaṃ vedanā, vedanāpratyayaṃ tṛṣṇā, tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam, upādānapratyayaṃ bhavaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:818_3: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
S04bsu022_u:819_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya pūrvamaśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikārādbahulīkārājjñānamudapādi,
S04bsu022_u:819_1: cakṣurudapādi, vidyodapādi, bhūrirudapādi, medhodapādi, prajñodapādi, ālokaḥ prādurbabhūva / kasminnasati jarāmaraṇaṃ na bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:820_0: atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat - kasminnasati jātirna bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:820_1: kasya vā nirodhājjātinirodhaḥ? tasyaitadabhavat - bhave 'sati jātirna bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:821_0: atha bodhisattvasya punarapyetadabhavat - kasminnasati vistareṇa yāvatsaṃskārā na bhavanti,
S04bsu022_u:821_1: kasya vā nirodhātsaṃskāranirodhaḥ? tasyaitadabhavat - avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ saṃskārā na bhavanti,
S04bsu022_u:821_4: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavatīti /
S04bsu022_u:822_0: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvasya pūrvamaśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśomanasikārādbahulīkārājjñānamudapādi,
S04bsu022_u:822_1: cakṣurudapādi vidyodapadi, bhūrirudapādi, medhodapādi, prajñodapādi, ālokaḥ prādurbabhūva / so 'haṃ bhikṣavastasmin samaye idaṃ duḥkhamiti yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam /
S04bsu022_u:822_8: amī saṃskārā ayaṃ saṃskārasamudayo 'yaṃ saṃskāranirodha iyaṃ saṃskāranirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam /
S04bsu022_u:822_9: idaṃ vijñānamayaṃ vijñānasamudayo 'yaṃ vijñānanirodha iyaṃ vijñānanirodhagāminī pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam /
S04bsu022_u:822_10: idaṃ nāmarūpamayaṃ nāmarūpasamudayo 'yaṃ nāmarūpanirodhaḥ iyaṃ nāmarūpanirodhagāminī [Vaidya_253] pratipaditi yathābhūtamajñāsiṣam /

S04bsu022_u:938_1: atha khalu tathāgata ātmanaścemaṃ samyagjñānamadhikṛtya śikhinaśca mahābrahmaṇo 'dhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā śikhinaṃ mahābrahmāṇaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -

S04bsu022_u:lal_25.34_1: praviśanti śraddhā naviheṭhasaṃjñāḥ śṛṇvanti dharmaṃ magadheṣu sattvāḥ //
S04bsu022_u:939_0: atha khalu śikhī mahābrahmā tathāgatasyādhivāsanāṃ viditvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastathāgatasya pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntaradhāt /
S04bsu022_u:940_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo bhaumā devāstasyāṃ velāyāmantarīkṣebhyo devebhyo ghoṣamudīrayanti sma,
S04bsu022_u:940_1: śabdamanuśrāvayanti sma - adya mārṣā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakrapravartanāyai pratiśrutam /
S04bsu022_u:940_2: tadbhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:940_3: parihāsyante bata bho mārṣā asurāḥ kāyāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:940_6: evamevāntarīkṣā devā bhaumebhyo devebhyaḥ pratiśratya cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ ghoṣamudīrayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:940_8: trāyatriṃśā yāmānām, yāmā tuṣitanirmāṇaratīnām, nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartinām,
S04bsu022_u:940_10: śabdamanuśrāvayanti sma - adya mārṣāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena dharmacakrapravartanāyai pratiśrutam /
S04bsu022_u:940_11: tadbhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
S04bsu022_u:940_12: parihāsyante bata bho mārṣā asurāḥ kāyāḥ /

S04bsu022_u:941_0_0: iti hi bhikṣavastatkṣaṇaṃ tanmuhurtaṃ tallavaṃ yāvadbahmakāyikā devāstasmādbhaumādārabhya ekavāgekanirnāda ekanirghoṣo 'bhyudgato
S04bsu022_u:942_0: atha khalu bhikṣavo dharmaruciśca nāmā bodhivṛkṣadevatā dharmakāyaśca dharmamatiśca dharmacārī ca,
S04bsu022_u:942_1_0: ete catvāro bodhivṛkṣadevatāstathāgatasya caraṇayornipatyaivamāhuḥ - kva bhagavān dharmacakraṃ pravartiṣyatīti? evamukte
S04bsu022_u:942_2: te āhuḥ - parīttajanakāyā bhagavan vārāṇasī mahānagarī,
S04bsu022_u:942_4: santyanyāni bhagavan mahānagarāṇi ṛddhāni sphītāni kṣemāni subhikṣāṇi ramaṇīyāni ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṇi udyānavanaparvatapratimaṇḍitāni /
S04bsu022_u:943_1: ṣaṣṭiṃ yajñasahasrakoṭinayutā ye tatra yaṣṭā mayā
S04bsu022_u:943_5: buddhā koṭisahasra naikanavatiḥ pūrve smarāmī aha
S04bsu022_u:950_0_0: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgataḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ sarvabandhanasamucchinnaḥ sarvakleśoddhṛto nirvāntamalakleśo nihatamārapratyarthikaḥ
S04bsu022_u:950_0_2: pañcacakṣuḥsamanvāgato 'nāvaraṇena buddhacakṣuṣā sarvāvantaṃ lokamavalokyaivaṃ cintayati sma - kasmā ayamahaṃ sarvaprathamaṃ
S04bsu022_u:950_0_3: dharmaṃ deśayeyam? katamaḥ sattvaḥ śuddhaḥ svākāraḥ suvineyaḥ suvijñāpakaḥ suviśodhako mandarāgadoṣamoho 'parokṣavijñāno
S04bsu022_u:950_0_4: yo 'śrutavān dharmasya parihīyate? tasmāyahaṃ sarvaprathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam,
S04bsu022_u:950_1: yaśca me dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyānna ca māṃ sa viheṭhayet /
S04bsu022_u:951_0: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhūt - rudrakaḥ khalu rāmaputraḥ śuddhaḥ svākāraḥ suvijñāpakaḥ suviśodhako mandarāgamoho 'parokṣavijñānaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:951_4: adya saptāhakālagata iti / devatā api tathāgatasya caraṇayornipatyaivamāhuḥ - evametadbhagavan,
S04bsu022_u:951_6: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt - mahāhānirvartate rudrakasya rāmaputrasya,
S04bsu022_u:952_0: punarapi bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhūt - ko 'nyaḥ sattvaḥ śuddhaḥ suvineyaḥ pūrvavadyāvanna ca dharmadeśanāṃ viheṭhayediti /
S04bsu022_u:952_1: tato bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat - ayaṃ khalvapyārāḍaḥ kālāpaḥ śuddho yāvanna ca me dharmadeśanāṃ viheṭhayediti /
S04bsu022_u:952_4: śuddhāvāsakāyikā api ca devatā enamarthaṃ tathāgatasyārocayanti sma - evametadbhagavan,
S04bsu022_u:952_7: ya imamevaṃ supraṇītaṃ dharmamaśrutvā kālagata iti /
S04bsu022_u:953_0: punarapi bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhūt - kaḥ khalvanyaḥ sattvaḥ śuddhaḥ svākāro yāvanna ca me dharmadeśanāṃ viheṭhayediti /
S04bsu022_u:954_0: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat - te khalu pañcakā bhadravargīyāḥ śuddhāḥ svākārāḥ suvijñāpakāḥ suviśodhakā mandarāgadoṣamohā aparokṣavijñānāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:955_1: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ pañcakebhyo bhadravargīyebhyaḥ prathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam /
S04bsu022_u:956_0: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgatasya punaretadabhavat - kasminnetarhi pañcakā bhadravargīyāḥ prativasanti? atha tathāgataḥ sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā vyavalokayan paśyati sma /
S04bsu022_u:956_1: adrākṣītpañcakān bhadravargīyān vārāṇasyāṃ viharata ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
S04bsu022_u:956_2: dṛṣṭvā ca tathāgatasyaitadabhavat - yannvahaṃ pañcakebhyo bhadravargīyebhyaḥ sarvaprathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam /
S04bsu022_u:956_3: te hi mama sarvaprathamaṃ dharmaṃ deśitamājñāsyanti /
S04bsu022_u:956_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? caritāvino hi te bhikṣavaḥ suparipaṇḍitaśukladharmāṇo mokṣamārgābhimukhā nibandhāpanītāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:957_0_0: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgata evamanuvicintya bodhimaṇḍādutthāya trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saṃprakampyānupūrveṇa
S04bsu022_u:957_0_1: magadheṣu caryāṃ caran kāśiṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ prakrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:957_1: atha gayāyāṃ bodhimaṇḍasya cāntarādanyatama ājīvako 'drākṣīttathāgataṃ dūrata evāgacchantam /
S04bsu022_u:957_3: upetyaikānte 'sthāt / ekānte sthitaśca bhikṣava ājīvakastathāgatena sārdhaṃ vividhāṃ saṃmodanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā evamāha - viprasannāni te āyuṣman gautama indriyāṇi /
S04bsu022_u:957_4: pariśuddhaḥ paryavadātaḥ pītanirbhāsaśca te chavivarṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma śāradaṃ kālaṃ pāṇḍuravarṇaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ pītanirbhāsaṃ bhavati,
S04bsu022_u:957_5: evameva bhavato gautamasya pariśuddhānīndriyāṇi pariśuddhaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ paryavadātam /
S04bsu022_u:957_6: tadyathāpi nāma tālaphalasya pakvasya samanantaravṛntacyutasya bandhanāśrayaḥ pītanirbhāso bhavati pariśuddhaḥ paryavadātaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:957_7: evameva bhavato gautamasya pariśuddhānīndriyāṇi pariśuddhaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ paryavadātam /
S04bsu022_u:957_8_0: tadyathāpi nāma jāmbūnadavarṇaniṣkaḥ ulkāmukhaprakṛṣṭo dakṣiṇakarmāraputreṇa suparikarmakṛtaḥ pāṇḍukambalopanikṣipto varṇavān
S04bsu022_u:957_10: pariśuddhastvagvarṇaḥ, paryavadātaṃ mukhamaṇḍalam / kasminnāyuṣman gautama brahmacaryamuṣyate? evamukte bhikṣavastathāgatastamājīvakaṃ gāthayā pratyabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:lal_26.1_0: ācāryo na hi me kaścitsadṛśo me na vidyate /
S04bsu022_u:958_0: so 'vocat - arhaṃ khalu gautamamātmānaṃ prātijānīṣe / tathāgato 'vocat -
S04bsu022_u:959_0: so 'vocat - jinaṃ khalu gautama mātmānaṃ pratijānīṣe / tathāgato 'vocat -
S04bsu022_u:lal_26.3_0: jinā hi mādṛśā jñeyā ye prāptā āśravakṣayam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_26.3_1: jitā me pāpakā dharmāstenopaga jino hyaham //
S04bsu022_u:960_1: so 'vocat - kva tarhyāyuṣman gautama gamiṣyasi? tathāgato 'vocat -
S04bsu022_u:lal_26.4_0: vārāṇasīṃ gamiṣyāmi gatvā vai kāśināṃ purīm /
S04bsu022_u:lal_26.5_0: vārāṇasīṃ gamiṣyami gatvā vai kāśināṃ purīm /
S04bsu022_u:lal_26.6_0: vārāṇasīṃ gamiṣyāmi gatvā vai kāśināṃ purīm /
S04bsu022_u:961_0: tadbhaviṣyasi gautama ityuktvā sa ājīvako dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ prākrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:962_0: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgato gayāyāṃ sudarśanena nāgarājena nimantrito 'bhut vāsena bhaktena ca /
S04bsu022_u:962_3: tataḥ sārathipuram / eṣu ca sarveṣu bhikṣavastathāgato gṛhapatibhirbhaktena vāsena copanimantryamāṇo 'nupūrveṇa gaṅgāyā nadyāstīramupāgamat /
S04bsu022_u:963_0: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena gaṅgā mahānadī suparipūrṇā samatīrthakā vahati sma //
S04bsu022_u:964_2: na me 'sti mārṣa tarapaṇyamityuktvā tathāgato vihāyasā pathā tīrātparaṃ tīramagamat /
S04bsu022_u:964_3: tataḥ sa nāvikastaṃ dṛṣṭvātīva vipratisāryabhūt - evaṃvidho dakṣiṇīyo mayā na tārita iti /
S04bsu022_u:964_4: hā kaṣṭamiti kṛtvā mūrchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ patitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:964_5: tata enāṃ prakṛtiṃ nāviko rājñe bimbisārāya ārocayāmāsa - śramaṇaḥ svāmi gautamastarapaṇyaṃ yācamāno nāsti tarapaṇyamityuktvā vihāyasā atastīrātparaṃ tīraṃ gata iti /
S04bsu022_u:964_6: tacchrutvā tadagreṇa rājñā bimbisāreṇa sarvapravrajitānāṃ tarapaṇyamutsṛṣṭamabhavat /
S04bsu022_u:965_0: iti hi bhikṣavastathāgato 'nupūrveṇa janapadacaryāṃ caran yena vārāṇasī mahānagarī tenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu022_u:965_1: upasaṃkramya kālyameva nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya vārāṇasīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat /
S04bsu022_u:965_2: tasyāṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātrapratikrāntaḥ yena ṛṣipatano mṛgadāvo yena ca pañcakā bhadravargīyāstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
S04bsu022_u:965_3: adrākṣuḥ khalu punaḥ pañcakā bhadravargīyāstathāgataṃ dūrata evāgacchantam /
S04bsu022_u:965_4: dṛṣṭvā ca kriyābandhamakārṣuḥ - eṣa sa āyuṣmantaḥ śramaṇo gautama āgacchati sma śaithiliko bāhulikaḥ pradhānavibhraṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:965_5: anena khalvapi tayāpi tāvatpūrvikayā duṣkaracaryayā na śakitaṃ kiṃciduttarimanuṣyadharmādalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaṃ sākṣātkartum /
S04bsu022_u:965_9: na pātracīvaraṃ pratigrahītavyaṃ nāśanaṃ dātavyaṃ na pānīyaṃ paribhogyaṃ na pādapratiṣṭhānaṃ sthāpayitvātiriktānyāsanāni /
S04bsu022_u:965_10: vaktavyaṃ ca - [Vaidya_298] saṃvidyanta imānyāyuṣman gautama atiriktānyāsanāni /
S04bsu022_u:965_13: yathā yathā ca bhikṣavastathāgato yena pañcakā bhadravargīyāstenopasaṃkrāmati sma,
S04bsu022_u:965_14: tathā tathā te svakasvakeṣvāsaneṣu na ramante sma,
S04bsu022_u:965_15: utthātukāmā abhūvan / tadyathāpi nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ pañjaragataḥ syāt,
S04bsu022_u:965_18: evameva yathā yathā tathāgataḥ pañcakānāṃ bhadravargīyāṇāṃ sakāśamupasaṃkrāmati sma,
S04bsu022_u:965_19: tathā tathā pañcakā bhadravargīyāḥ svakasvakeṣvāsaneṣu na ramante sma,
S04bsu022_u:965_20: utthātukāmā abhūvan / tatkasmāt? na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yastathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā āsanānna pratyuttiṣṭhet /
S04bsu022_u:965_21: yathā yathā ca tathāgataḥ pañcakān bhadravargīyānupasaṃkrāmati sma,
S04bsu022_u:965_22: tathā tathā pañcakā bhadravargīyāstathāgatasya śriyaṃ tejaścāsahamānā āsanebhyaḥ prakampyamānāḥ sarve kriyākāraṃ bhittvā cotthāyāsanebhyaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:965_23: kaścitpratyudgacchati sma, kaścitpratyudgamya pātracīvaraṃ pratigṛhṇāti sma /
S04bsu022_u:965_26: evaṃ cāvocat - svāgataṃ te āyuṣman gautama,
S04bsu022_u:965_27: svāgataṃ te āyuṣman gautam / niṣīdedamāsanaṃ prajñaptam / nyaṣīdatkhalvapi bhikṣavastathāgataḥ prajñapta evāsane /
S04bsu022_u:965_28: pañcakā pi bhadravargīyāste tathāgatena sārdhaṃ vividhāṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvaikānte niṣeduḥ /
S04bsu022_u:965_29: ekānte niṣaṇṇāśca te pañcakā bhadravargīyāstathāgatametadavocan - viprasannāni te āyuṣman gautamendriyāṇi,
S04bsu022_u:965_31_0: tadasti te āyuṣman gautama kaściduttarimanuṣyadharmāṃdalamāryajñānadarśanaviśeṣaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ? evamukte bhikṣavastathāgataḥ
S04bsu022_u:965_31_1: pañcakān bhadravargīyānevamāha - mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatamāyuṣmadvādena samudācariṣṭa /
S04bsu022_u:965_33: amṛtaṃ mayā bhikṣavaḥ sākṣātkṛto 'mṛtagāmī ca mārgaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:965_38_0: yathā mayā samyagavavaditāḥ samyaganuśiṣṭā yūyamapyāśravāṇāṃ cetovimuktaṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ ca dṛṣṭa eva dharme sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya
S04bsu022_u:965_38_1: pravedayiṣyatha - kṣīṇā no jātiruṣitaṃ ca brahmacaryam,
S04bsu022_u:965_40: nanu ca yuṣmākaṃ bhikṣava etadabhūt - ayaṃ khalvāyuṣmanta āgacchati śramaṇo gautamaḥ śaithiliko bāhulikaḥ pradhānavibhraṣṭa iti pūrvavat /
S04bsu022_u:965_41: sacedākāṅkṣasi niṣīdeti / teṣāṃ ca ehi bhikṣava ityukte yatkiṃcittīrthikaliṅgaṃ tīrthikadhvajaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:965_44: tadanu chinnāśca keśāḥ / tadyathāpi nāma varṣaśatopasaṃpannasya bhikṣorīryāpathaḥ saṃvṛtto 'bhut /
S04bsu022_u:966_0: atha khalu bhikṣavastasyāṃ velāyāṃ pañcakā bhadravargīyā bhikṣavastathāgatasya caraṇayornipatyātyayaṃ deśayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:966_1: tathāgatasyāntike śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ premaṃ ca prasādaṃ ca gauravaṃ cotpādayanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:966_2: gauravajātāśca bahuvicitrapuṣkariṇyāṃ tathāgatasya snānaparikarma kurvanti sma /
S04bsu022_u:966_3_0: snānapratyuttīrṇasya [Vaidya_299] ca bhikṣavastathāgatasyaitadabhavat - kasmin khalu pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairniṣadya
S04bsu022_u:966_3_1: dharmacakraṃ pravartitam? yasmiṃśca bhikṣavaḥ pṛthivīpradeśe pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhirdharmacakraṃ pravartitamabhūt,
S04bsu022_u:967_0: atha tathāgataḥ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ gauraveṇa trīṇyāsanāni pradakṣiṇīkṛtya siṃha iva nirbhīścaturtha āsane paryaṅkamābhujya niṣīdati sma /
S04bsu022_u:967_1: pañcakā api bhikṣavastathāgatasya pādau śirobhirabhivandya tathāgatasya purato niṣeduḥ /
