S04bsu022_u:987_0_0: atha khalu devaputrā yaistathāgato 'dhīṣṭo 'bhūdasya dharmaparyāyasya saṃprakāśanāya saha maheśvaranandasunandacandanamahitaśāntapraśāntavinīteśvarapramukhā
S04bsu022_u:987_0_1: aṣṭādaśaḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrasahasrāṇi ye tathāgatasya dharmacakrapravartane 'pi saṃnipatitā abhūvan /
S04bsu022_u:987_1_0: tatra bhagavāṃstān maheśvaradevaputrapramukhān śuddhāvāsakāyikān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - ayaṃ sa mārṣā lalitavistaro
S04bsu022_u:987_1_1: nāma dharmaparyāyasūtrānto mahāvaipulyabodhisattvavikrīḍitaḥ buddhaviṣaye lalitapraveśa ātmopanāyikastathāgatena bhāṣitaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:987_4: bodhisattvayānikāśca pudgalā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā dṛḍhataraṃ vīryamālapsyante /
S04bsu022_u:987_8: yuṣmākaṃ ca taddharmadeśanādhyeṣaṇā kuśalamūlaṃ mahārthikaṃ bhaviṣyati mahāphalaṃ mahānuśaṃsam /
S04bsu022_u:988_0: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā asya lalitavistarasya dharmaparyāyasyāñjaliṃ saṃpragṛhītaṃ kariṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:989_0: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣitukāmasya dharmabhāṇakasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñāpayiṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:990_0: ya kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇāya sādhukāraṃ dāsyati,
S04bsu022_u:991_0: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:991_1: amātsaryacittatayā caturdiśamasya dharmaparyāyasya varṇanāṃ bhāṣiṣyate varṇanāṃ coccārayiṣyati - āgacchatemaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitaṃ dhārayata vācayata cintayata svādhyāyateti,
S04bsu022_u:992_0: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ supravartitaṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:992_2: katamānaṣṭau? tadyathā - yaduta dānasaṃbhāraṃ paripūrayiṣyati amātsaryacittatayā /
S04bsu022_u:993_0: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:993_1: evaṃcitto yaduta kathamamī sattvā eṣāmevarūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lābhino bhaveyuriti,
S04bsu022_u:993_3: katamā aṣṭau? tadyathā - rājā bhavati cakravartī,
S04bsu022_u:993_4: iyaṃ prathamā mahāpuṇyatā / caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāmādhipatyaṃ kārayiṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:993_5: iyaṃ dvitīyā mahāpuṇyatā / śakro bhaviṣyati devendraḥ iyaṃ tṛtīyā mahāpuṇyatā /
S04bsu022_u:993_8: iyaṃ pañcamī mahāpuṇyatā / sunirmito bhaviṣyati, iyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī mahāpuṇyatā / vaśavartī bhaviṣyati devarājaḥ,
S04bsu022_u:993_9: iyaṃ saptamī mahāpuṇyatā / brahmā bhaviṣyati mahābrahmā,
S04bsu022_u:993_10: iyaṃ aṣṭamī mahāpuṇyatā / ante ca tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvākuśaladharmaprahīnaḥ sarvakuśaladharmasamanvāgataḥ /
S04bsu022_u:994_0: yaḥ kaścinmārṣā imaṃ lalitavistaraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣyamāṇamavahitaśrotaḥ śroṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:994_2: katamā aṣṭau? tadyathā - yaduta maitrīṃ pratilapsyate sarvadoṣanirghātāya /
S04bsu022_u:995_0: yasmiṃśca mārṣā grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade vā janapadapradeśe vā caṃkrame vā vihāre vā ayaṃ lalitavistaro dharmaparyāyaḥ pracariṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:995_1: tatrāṣṭau bhayāni na prabhaviṣyanti sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam /
S04bsu022_u:995_2: katamānyaṣṭau? tadyathā - yaduta rājasaṃkṣobhabhayaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu022_u:995_11: imāni mārṣāstatrāṣṭau bhayāni na bhaviṣyanti (sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam) /
S04bsu022_u:996_0: saṃkṣepānmārṣā yadi tathāgataḥ kalpasthitikenāyuṣpramāṇena rātriṃdivamadhiṣṭhamāno 'sya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S04bsu022_u:996_1: naivāsya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaparyanto bhavenna ca tathāgatapratibhānasya kṣayo bhavet /
S04bsu022_u:996_2: api tu khalu punarmārṣā yathaiva tathāgatasya śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanamapramāṇamaparyantam,
S04bsu022_u:996_3: evameva mārṣā ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati lekhayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati,
S04bsu022_u:996_4: parṣanmadhye ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati - anena cittena kathamamī sattvā evamudārasya dharmasya lābhinaḥ syuriti,
S04bsu022_u:997_0_0: tataḥ khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapamāmantrayate sma āyuṣmantaṃ cānandaṃ maitreyaṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam - imāmahaṃ
S04bsu022_u:997_0_1: mārṣā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭinayutaśatasahasrasamudānītāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste paridāmyanuparindāmi paramayā
S04bsu022_u:998_0: ityuktvā ca bhagavānasyaiva dharmaparyāyasya bhūyasyā mātrayānuparindanārthaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata -
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.1_0: sattvā dṛṣṭā ye mayā buddhadṛṣṭyā syuste 'rhantaḥ śariputreṇa tulyāḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.2_0: pratyekabuddhāya tu yaśca pūjāṃ kuyādahorātramapi prahṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.2_1: mālyaiḥ prakāraiśca tathāparaiśca tasmādayaṃ puṇyakṛto viśiṣyate //
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.3_0: syuḥ sarvasattvā yadi pratyayairjinā tāṃ pūjayetkaścidihāpramattaḥ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.3_1: puṣpaiśca gandhaiśca vilepanaiśca kalpānanekāṃ satataṃ hi tatparam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.4_0: ekasya yaścaiva tathāgatasya kuryātpraṇāmaṃ api caikaśo 'pi /
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.4_1: prasannācitto 'tha vadennamo 'rhate tasmādidaṃ śreṣṭhataraṃ ca puṇyam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.5_0: buddhā bhaveyuryadi sarvasattvā tāṃ pūjayedyaśca yathaiva pūrvam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.5_1: divyaiśca puṣpairatha mānurṣairvaraiḥ kalpānanekāṃ bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ //
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.6_0: yaścaiva saddharmavilopakātle tyaktvā svakāye ca tathaiva jīvitam /
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.6_1: vadyādahorātramidaṃ hi sūtraṃ viśiṣyate puṇyamidaṃ hi tasmāt //
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.7_0: yasyepsitaṃ pūjayituṃ vināyakāṃ pratyekabuddhāṃśca tathaiva śrāvakāṃ /
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.7_1: dṛḍhaṃ samutpādya sa bodhicitta idaṃ sadā sūtravaraṃ dadhātu //
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.8_1: gṛhe sthitastasya tathāgataḥ sadā tiṣṭhedidaṃ yatra hi sūtraratnam //
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.9_0: pratibhāṃ sa prāpnoti śubhāmanantāṃ ekaṃ padaṃ vakṣyati kalpakoṭī /
S04bsu022_u:lal_27.9_1: na vyañjanā bhraśyati nāpi cārthā dadyācca yaḥ sūtramida parebhyaḥ //
